Dialogue: I do, but... If I don't deal with this now, it's only gonna get harder... Anyway... I can count on you, can't I?

Original: Jessie: A down payment.
Dialogue: A down payment.

Original: Jessie: Doubt we'll be back before morning'case you were planning on traveling light. Make sure you've got everything you need before we leave. I'll wait here.
Dialogue: Doubt we'll be back before morning—'case you were planning on traveling light. Make sure you've got everything you need before we leave. I'll wait here.

Original: Jessie: You all set?
Dialogue: You all set?

Original: On-screen: Ready to go?
Dialogue: Ready to go?

Original: (Upon selecting "No.".)Jessie: Take all the time you need. Nothing a woman likes more than being kept waiting. But seriously, get your ass in gear already!
Dialogue: Take all the time you need. Nothing a woman likes more than being kept waiting. But seriously, get your ass in gear already!

Original: Jessie: Awesome. Meet me at the station before dark. Don't be late!
Dialogue: Awesome. Meet me at the station before dark. Don't be late!

Original: Cloud: It's...just another job...
Dialogue: It's...just another job...

Original: Biggs: Tough break. They changed the times. Last train's already left. Which is why we borrowed these bikes. Need a lift to the plate?
Dialogue: Tough break. They changed the times. Last train's already left. Which is why we borrowed these bikes. Need a lift to the plate?

Original: Jessie: How did you guess...?
Dialogue: How did you guess...?

Original: Wedge: Easy. You've been acting weird. Like, talking about one thing when you're obviously thinking about something else.
Dialogue: Easy. You've been acting weird. Like, talking about one thing when you're obviously thinking about something else.

Original: Biggs: Yeah, and don't get me started on all that pep.
Dialogue: Yeah, and don't get me started on all that pep.

Original: Jessie: All right, I'll give you thatbut how did you know I wanted to head topside? Was I talking in my sleep? What else did I say!?
Dialogue: All right, I'll give you that—but how did you know I wanted to head topside? Was I talking in my sleep? What else did I say!?

Original: Wedge: No. We just figured you wanted to see your parents. That's all.
Dialogue: No. We just figured you wanted to see your parents. That's all.

Original: Biggs: Nailed it, huh?
Dialogue: Nailed it, huh?

Original: Jessie: Yup. Right on the head.
Dialogue: Yup. Right on the head.

Original: Biggs: Soseeing as we don't have any family of our own... How about you let us be a part of yours for a bit? You know, spread the wealth.
Dialogue: So—seeing as we don't have any family of our own... How about you let us be a part of yours for a bit? You know, spread the wealth.

Original: Jessie: Are your parents still around?
Dialogue: Are your parents still around?

Original: Cloud: No.
Dialogue: No.

Original: Jessie: Okay, then. Guess you're all invited! Here's to awkward family reunions!
Dialogue: Okay, then. Guess you're all invited! Here's to awkward family reunions!

Original: Biggs & Wedge: Yeah!
Dialogue: Yeah!

Original: Jessie: I take it you boys have your brand-spanking-new IDs?
Dialogue: I take it you boys have your brand-spanking-new IDs?

Original: Biggs & Wedge: Yes, ma'am!
Dialogue: Yes, ma'am!

Original: Jessie: Then let's lay down some rubber!
Dialogue: Then let's lay down some rubber!

Original: Biggs: Crank that throttle!
Dialogue: Crank that throttle!

Original: Wedge: Okay, you got it!
Dialogue: Okay, you got it!

Original: On-screen: Corkscrew Tunnel
Dialogue: Corkscrew Tunnel

Original: Jessie: You hear me?
Dialogue: You hear me?

Original: Cloud: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Jessie: Just so you know, I'm not going plateside for the reason they think I am. Lookyou saw the way the reactor went up. It was huge, right?
Dialogue: Just so you know, I'm not going plateside for the reason they think I am. Look—you saw the way the reactor went up. It was huge, right?

Original: Cloud: Because of all the mako. Isn't that what you said?
Dialogue: Because of all the mako. Isn't that what you said?

Original: Jessie: Yeah...that was wishful thinking. Deep down, I know it was my fault. I used a more powerful blasting agent than the directions called for. It had nothing to do with the mako.
Dialogue: Yeah...that was wishful thinking. Deep down, I know it was my fault. I used a more powerful blasting agent than the directions called for. It had nothing to do with the mako.

Original: Cloud: Let's say you're right. So what?
Dialogue: Let's say you're right. So what?

Original: Jessie: I'm planning on using a weaker blasting agent this time. But...since I can't get in touch with my supplier, our only option is to loot a warehouse owned by Shinra.
Dialogue: I'm planning on using a weaker blasting agent this time. But...since I can't get in touch with my supplier, our only option is to loot a warehouse owned by Shinra.

Original: Cloud: Shinra? Good luck with that.
Dialogue: Shinra? Good luck with that.

Original: Jessie: With your help, we won't need luck.
Dialogue: With your help, we won't need luck.

Original: Jessie: ID scan! Ready!?
Dialogue: ID scan! Ready!?

Original: Biggs: So far so good!
Dialogue: So far so good!

Original: Jessie: Alright, here comes the hard part!
Dialogue: Alright, here comes the hard part!

Original: Biggs: And that is?
Dialogue: And that is?

Original: Jessie: The fake IDs may have held up, but from this point on, if we get pinged by a scan...
Dialogue: The fake IDs may have held up, but from this point on, if we get pinged by a scan...

Original: Cloud: They'll come for us.
Dialogue: They'll come for us.

Original: Jessie: Yeah, what he said.
Dialogue: Yeah, what he said.

Original: Biggs: Oh, man!
Dialogue: Oh, man!

Original: Wedge: Just like that!?
Dialogue: Just like that!?

Original: Jessie: No need to worry. We've got Cloud, remember?
Dialogue: No need to worry. We've got Cloud, remember?

Original: Jessie: Hey, you do know how to drive, right?
Dialogue: Hey, you do know how to drive, right?

Original: Cloud: SOLDIERs get mandatory training.
Dialogue: SOLDIERs get mandatory training.

Original: Jessie: Well then! You gonna take my breath away? Make my head spin with your amazing skills?
Dialogue: Well then! You gonna take my breath away? Make my head spin with your amazing skills?

Original: Cloud: Don't blame me if ya get sick.
Dialogue: Don't blame me if ya get sick.

Original: Jessie: Right...
Dialogue: Right...

Original: Jessie: That some super-secret technique? You got a fancy name for it?
Dialogue: That some super-secret technique? You got a fancy name for it?

Original: Cloud: Of course not.
Dialogue: Of course not.

Original: Jessie: We've got company!
Dialogue: We've got company!

Original: Cloud: Someone's having fun.
Dialogue: Someone's having fun.

Original: Jessie: How could I not!? "Pursued by villains, a young couple thrust together by fate race through the neon-streaked night..."
Dialogue: How could I not!? "Pursued by villains, a young couple thrust together by fate race through the neon-streaked night..."

Original: Cloud: Get off!
Dialogue: Get off!

Original: Jessie: Oh! My hero!
Dialogue: Oh! My hero!

Original: Biggs: Straight to lethal force!?
Dialogue: Straight to lethal force!?

Original: Jessie: What, so you'd just pull over if they asked nicely?
Dialogue: What, so you'd just pull over if they asked nicely?

Original: Biggs: Eh... You've got a point.
Dialogue: Eh... You've got a point.

Original: Jessie: See!? So don't go holding back now!
Dialogue: See!? So don't go holding back now!

Original: Jessie: "Had the cold-eyed mercenary's heart suddenly begun to melt?"
Dialogue: "Had the cold-eyed mercenary's heart suddenly begun to melt?"

Original: Cloud: Nope.
Dialogue: Nope.

Original: Jessie: I won't forget that. (laughs) Wait, is it just me or did we slow down?
Dialogue: I won't forget that. (laughs) Wait, is it just me or did we slow down?

Original: Cloud: Just you.
Dialogue: Just you.

Original: Biggs: More of 'em!?
Dialogue: More of 'em!?

Original: Jessie: Think we've bitten off more than we can chew! Whadda we do!?
Dialogue: Think we've bitten off more than we can chew! Whadda we do!?

Original: Cloud: Shut up!
Dialogue: Shut up!

Original: Mobile Unit Officer: Targets sighted. Moving to intercept.
Dialogue: Targets sighted. Moving to intercept.

Original: Biggs: Got more company!
Dialogue: Got more company!

Original: Cloud: A-team's here.
Dialogue: A-team's here.

Original: Jessie: Uhh, I don't like the sound of that!
Dialogue: Uhh, I don't like the sound of that!

Original: Wedge: We're not screwed, are we!?
Dialogue: We're not screwed, are we!?

Original: Jessie: Head's updrones!
Dialogue: Head's up—drones!

Original: Biggs: One thing after another... C'mon Wedge, gun it!
Dialogue: One thing after another... C'mon Wedge, gun it!

Original: Wedge: Iamgunning it!
Dialogue: I am gunning it!

Original: Cloud: We're good.
Dialogue: We're good.

Original: Biggs: Nothing about this is good!
Dialogue: Nothing about this is good!

Original: Cloud: You got me.
Dialogue: You got me.

Original: Biggs: Fair enough! Alright then, do your thing!
Dialogue: Fair enough! Alright then, do your thing!

Original: Mobile Unit Officer (1): SOLDIER en route. HQ's saying he's less than a few minutes out.
Dialogue: SOLDIER en route. HQ's saying he's less than a few minutes out.

Original: Mobile Unit Officer (2): Copy.
Dialogue: Copy.

Original: Mobile Unit Officer (1): You think it's "him"?
Dialogue: You think it's "him"?

Original: Mobile Unit Officer (2): Probably. All the more reason to finish this quick. Don't need that kind of trouble.
Dialogue: Probably. All the more reason to finish this quick. Don't need that kind of trouble.

Original: Biggs: That's an ex-SOLDIER for ya. Next to him, we look like kids on trikes.
Dialogue: That's an ex-SOLDIER for ya. Next to him, we look like kids on trikes.

Original: Jessie: You're damn right you do!
Dialogue: You're damn right you do!

Original: Biggs: You're part of that "we" too, you know.
Dialogue: You're part of that "we" too, you know.

Original: Wedge: We made it!
Dialogue: We made it!

Original: Biggs: Woo-hoo! Topside!
Dialogue: Woo-hoo! Topside!

Original: Cloud: Keep going till we hit the station?
Dialogue: Keep going till we hit the station?

Original: Jessie: No, head straight for the warehouse. Awww... Our magical ride is almost at an end...
Dialogue: No, head straight for the warehouse. Awww... Our magical ride is almost at an end...

Original: Biggs: Why ya talking like we're not here?
Dialogue: Why ya talking like we're not here?

Original: Jessie: Because you're not!
Dialogue: Because you're not!

Original: Biggs: Clearly we are!
Dialogue: Clearly we are!

Original: Biggs: Not over yet! Cloud! Little help!?
Dialogue: Not over yet! Cloud! Little help!?

Original: Mobile Unit Officer (1): Time's up. Break off before he shows!
Dialogue: Time's up. Break off before he shows!

Original: Mobile Unit Officer (2): Copy!
Dialogue: Copy!

Original: Jessie: What's going on?
Dialogue: What's going on?

Original: Jessie: Who's that?
Dialogue: Who's that?

Original: Cloud: A SOLDIER.
Dialogue: A SOLDIER.

Original: Roche: Well, hello!
Dialogue: Well, hello!

Original: Biggs: Who's this!?
Dialogue: Who's this!?

Original: Roche: "Too quick for the eye, you cross him, you die!" Now... Mind if I cut in? Woo! Splendid! I've been looking for a new dance partner!
Dialogue: "Too quick for the eye, you cross him, you die!" Now... Mind if I cut in? Woo! Splendid! I've been looking for a new dance partner!

Original: Roche: Private party, huh? That's fine. I'll settle for a race then. Just one.
Dialogue: Private party, huh? That's fine. I'll settle for a race then. Just one.

Original: Cloud: You talking to me?
Dialogue: You talking to me?

Original: Roche: I most certainly am.
Dialogue: I most certainly am.

Original: Cloud: Then no!
Dialogue: Then no!

Original: Roche: Ah, so terribly sorry! Your words fail to reach my ears, sluggish and slow as they are!
Dialogue: Ah, so terribly sorry! Your words fail to reach my ears, sluggish and slow as they are!

Original: Jessie: What's this guy's deal!?
Dialogue: What's this guy's deal!?

Original: Roche: The lady's curiosity has been piqued! My name is Roche, but you may address me by the more accurate appellation: Speed Demon!
Dialogue: The lady's curiosity has been piqued! My name is Roche, but you may address me by the more accurate appellation Speed Demon!

Original: Jessie: Heardthat, huh!?
Dialogue: Heard that, huh!?

Original: Roche: My ears are attuned to the feminine voice!
Dialogue: My ears are attuned to the feminine voice!

Original: Jessie: This guy is the worst.
Dialogue: This guy is the worst.

Original: Roche: Yes. Yes! This is the contest I've been waiting for!
Dialogue: Yes. Yes! This is the contest I've been waiting for!

Original: Roche: Fascinating...
Dialogue: Fascinating...

Original: Jessie: What is he up to now?
Dialogue: What is he up to now?

Original: Cloud: Same shit. Being a dumbass.
Dialogue: Same shit. Being a dumbass.

Original: Roche: Not bad. You have promise, and an abiding affection for your mount. But! One cannot simply ride one's bike! Nay! One must unlock its true potentialbecome one with the machine! Like this!
Dialogue: Not bad. You have promise, and an abiding affection for your mount. But! One cannot simply ride one's bike! Nay! One must unlock its true potential—become one with the machine! Like this!

Original: Cloud: Had enough?
Dialogue: Had enough?

Original: Roche: Don't be absurd. As if I could ever grow tired of your company!
Dialogue: Don't be absurd. As if I could ever grow tired of your company!

Original: Roche: Naughty, naughty! Until one of our flames is forever extinguished, our dance will never end! (laughs) Burn for me!
Dialogue: Naughty, naughty! Until one of our flames is forever extinguished, our dance will never end! (laughs) Burn for me!

Original: Roche: Come on! Let's push it past the redline!
Dialogue: Come on! Let's push it past the redline!

Original: Cloud: Jessie, take over.
Dialogue: Jessie, take over.

Original: Roche: Well, well, well! I do believe this round is yours. (chuckles) Maybe next time we can keep it just between the two of us.
Dialogue: Well, well, well! I do believe this round is yours. (chuckles) Maybe next time we can keep it just between the two of us.

Original: Cloud: Maybe.
Dialogue: Maybe.

Original: Roche: (laughs) Until we meet again, my friend!
Dialogue: (laughs) Until we meet again, my friend!

Original: Biggs: We did it!
Dialogue: We did it!

Original: Wedge: Go team!
Dialogue: Go team!

Original: Jessie: Don't get too excited. Reinforcements are hot on our trail.
Dialogue: Don't get too excited. Reinforcements are hot on our trail.

Original: Jessie: You failed the test.
Dialogue: You failed the test.

Original: Cloud: What test?
Dialogue: What test?

Original: Jessie: Driving.
Dialogue: Driving.

Original: Cloud: I'm great at driving.
Dialogue: I'm great at driving.

Original: Jessie: Hah! Great at scaring your passengers, more like...
Dialogue: Hah! Great at scaring your passengers, more like...

Original: Cloud: Not used to having any.
Dialogue: Not used to having any.

Original: Jessie: Maybe you should just letmedrive.
Dialogue: Maybe you should just let me drive.

Original: Cloud: Nope.
Dialogue: Nope.

Original: Jessie: Gues I'll take one for the team and be your back warmer again.
Dialogue: Gues I'll take one for the team and be your back warmer again.

Original: Jessie: You passed the test!
Dialogue: You passed the test!

Original: Cloud: What test?
Dialogue: What test?

Original: Jessie: Driving.
Dialogue: Driving.

Original: Cloud: Did more than just passs.
Dialogue: Did more than just passs.

Original: Jessie: Not really. You made it by the skin of your teeth, if we're being honest.
Dialogue: Not really. You made it by the skin of your teeth, if we're being honest.

Original: Cloud: Whatever.
Dialogue: Whatever.

Original: Jessie: I bet you held back because I was with you.
Dialogue: I bet you held back because I was with you.

Original: Cloud: Didn't want you to fall.
Dialogue: Didn't want you to fall.

Original: Jessie: So now I'm too weak to stay on a bike? Huh? Huh?
Dialogue: So now I'm too weak to stay on a bike? Huh? Huh?

Original: Cloud: Just hold on tight, will you?
Dialogue: Just hold on tight, will you?

Original: Cloud: What?
Dialogue: What?

Original: Jessie: I might...be falling after all.
Dialogue: I might...be falling after all.

Original: Jessie: Psych!
Dialogue: Psych!

Original: Jessie: You passed the test!
Dialogue: You passed the test!

Original: Cloud: What test?
Dialogue: What test?

Original: Jessie: Driving.
Dialogue: Driving.

Original: Cloud: Been driving for years.
Dialogue: Been driving for years.

Original: Jessie: So you don't need a reward?
Dialogue: So you don't need a reward?

Original: Cloud: No.
Dialogue: No.

Original: Jessie: Well, you got one anyway.
Dialogue: Well, you got one anyway.

Original: Jessie: You can thank me later. I'll wait.
Dialogue: You can thank me later. I'll wait.

Original: Jessie: Giving me the cold shoulder?
Dialogue: Giving me the cold shoulder?

Original: Jessie: Aw, would you look at that... It's the end of the ride.
Dialogue: Aw, would you look at that... It's the end of the ride.

Original: Jessie: We'll go on foot from here. Don't wanna draw too much attention to ourselves.
Dialogue: We'll go on foot from here. Don't wanna draw too much attention to ourselves.

Original: Wedge: Hey, did these things leave a mark?
Dialogue: Hey, did these things leave a mark?

Original: Biggs: (laughs) They got you pretty good.
Dialogue: (laughs) They got you pretty good.

Original: Wedge: Aw...andI'm running on fumes...
Dialogue: Aw...and I'm running on fumes...

Original: Jessie: Don't worry, we'll top you up soon enough. Now let's roll.
Dialogue: Don't worry, we'll top you up soon enough. Now let's roll.

Original: Jessie: Hey! Focus!
Dialogue: Hey! Focus!

Original: Jessie: The residential area's just beyond this gate. Mind doing the honors?
Dialogue: The residential area's just beyond this gate. Mind doing the honors?

Original: Jessie: You've got an arm on ya!
Dialogue: You've got an arm on ya!

Original: On-screen: Sector 7 Employee Housing Area
Dialogue: Sector 7 Employee Housing Area

Original: Jessie: Here we arethe employee housing district. Where they put you when your parents work for Shinra. While their reactors were slowly killing the planet, we were living the good life...
Dialogue: Here we are—the employee housing district. Where they put you when your parents work for Shinra. While their reactors were slowly killing the planet, we were living the good life...

Original: Wedge: C'mere... Aw, no dice... Someone's playing hard to get.
Dialogue: C'mere... Aw, no dice... Someone's playing hard to get.

Original: Biggs: Folks here must be living off three or four times what I do.
Dialogue: Folks here must be living off three or four times what I do.

Original: Jessie: Figures. Still leaves the lights on every night for the girl who only comes home once every other blue moon. Mom's an old-fashioned type like that.
Dialogue: Figures. Still leaves the lights on every night for the girl who only comes home once every other blue moon. Mom's an old-fashioned type like that.

Original: Wedge: Think she'll make us pizza? Her "Midgar Special"?
Dialogue: Think she'll make us pizza? Her "Midgar Special"?

Original: Biggs: She's quite the cook. Quick to whip up finger-lickin' food even if you drop by in the dead of night.
Dialogue: She's quite the cook. Quick to whip up finger-lickin' food even if you drop by in the dead of night.

Original: Jessie: And she loves guests who ask for seconds or thirds.
Dialogue: And she loves guests who ask for seconds or thirds.

Original: Jessie: Okay, let's head in. Cloudyou know what to do. Why don't you wait around the corner over there?
Dialogue: Okay, let's head in. Cloud—you know what to do. Why don't you wait around the corner over there?

Original: Cloud: Ah. Okay.
Dialogue: Ah. Okay.

Original: Wedge: It's a shame you won't get to try the Midgar Special. You would've really liked it.
Dialogue: It's a shame you won't get to try the Midgar Special. You would've really liked it.

Original: Jessie (in Cloud's memory): With your help, we won't need luck. You'll take on just about any job, right? Well, I need you to rob my house. Think you can do that for me?
Dialogue: With your help, we won't need luck. You'll take on just about any job, right? Well, I need you to rob my house. Think you can do that for me?

Original: Jessie (in Cloud's memory): Go in through the back door when the coast is clear. The signal will be obvious.
Dialogue: Go in through the back door when the coast is clear. The signal will be obvious.

Original: Cloud: Once the lights come on, it's go time.
Dialogue: Once the lights come on, it's go time.

Original: Cloud: Time to go.
Dialogue: Time to go.

Original: Jessie (in Cloud's memory): Inside, you'll find a room with two doors. Don't take the one in front of you. You want the room on the right. That's where you'll find it.
Dialogue: Inside, you'll find a room with two doors. Don't take the one in front of you. You want the room on the right. That's where you'll find it.

Original: Jessie: Sorry about dropping in like this again.
Dialogue: Sorry about dropping in like this again.

Original: Jessie's Mom: This will always be your home. Sohow's practice going?
Dialogue: This will always be your home. So—how's practice going?

Original: Jessie (in Cloud's memory): We'll be chatting Mom up in the kitchen, so don't even bother being quiet. There's no way she'll ever hear you. Dad'll be in there, but it's okay.
Dialogue: We'll be chatting Mom up in the kitchen, so don't even bother being quiet. There's no way she'll ever hear you. Dad'll be in there, but it's okay.

Original: Jessie (in Cloud's memory): I need you to grab his Shinra ID card. And yeah, I know I should do it myself, but... (chuckles) but I honestly don't think I'm up to it. Just do this for me, okay?
Dialogue: I need you to grab his Shinra ID card. And yeah, I know I should do it myself, but... (chuckles) but I honestly don't think I'm up to it. Just do this for me, okay?

Original: Jessie: Now thisthis is what I've been waiting for!
Dialogue: Now this—this is what I've been waiting for!

Original: Biggs: Yeah, like a dog!
Dialogue: Yeah, like a dog!

Original: Wedge: Don't mind if I do!
Dialogue: Don't mind if I do!

Original: Biggs: This is amazing!
Dialogue: This is amazing!

Original: Jessie: Alright, here comes a Midgar Special!
Dialogue: Alright, here comes a Midgar Special!

Original: Jessie's Mom: Eat as much as you like!
Dialogue: Eat as much as you like!

Original: Wedge: I'll take another one, please!
Dialogue: I'll take another one, please!

Original: Biggs: You've still got room, Wedge?!
Dialogue: You've still got room, Wedge?!

Original: Jessie: Dang, Mom, how'd you get even better at this?
Dialogue: Dang, Mom, how'd you get even better at this?

Original: Jessie's Mom: Please, take more!
Dialogue: Please, take more!

Original: Wedge: So, got more pizza in the oven?
Dialogue: So, got more pizza in the oven?

Original: Jessie's Mom: Careful, it's hot!
Dialogue: Careful, it's hot!

Original: Biggs: Aw, thank you!
Dialogue: Aw, thank you!

Original: Jessie: Wedge, don't hurt yourself!
Dialogue: Wedge, don't hurt yourself!

Original: Biggs: Now that is a damn good pie.
Dialogue: Now that is a damn good pie.

Original: Wedge: I'm not full yet!
Dialogue: I'm not full yet!

Original: Cloud: This isn't it.
Dialogue: This isn't it.

Original: Cloud: Jessie...
Dialogue: Jessie...

Original: Cloud: What's this?
Dialogue: What's this?

Original: Jessie (in letter): "Dear Mom and Dad", Sorry for not getting in touch sooner, but... I'm working at the Gold Saucer as an actress now. It wasn't easy, and I had a lot of help from people along the way... but I managed to land a starring role. Enclosed are two tickets to my play. Looking forward to seeing you both there."
Dialogue: "Dear Mom and Dad", Sorry for not getting in touch sooner, but... I'm working at the Gold Saucer as an actress now. It wasn't easy, and I had a lot of help from people along the way... but I managed to land a starring role. Enclosed are two tickets to my play. Looking forward to seeing you both there."

Original: Cloud: Jessie Rasberry as...the Princess?
Dialogue: Jessie Rasberry as...the Princess?

Original: Jessie (in Cloud's memory): My dadhe was a maintenance supervisor at the reactor.
Dialogue: My dad—he was a maintenance supervisor at the reactor.

Original: Cloud: Thanks.
Dialogue: Thanks.

Original: Cloud: Time to go.
Dialogue: Time to go.

Original: Cloud: Need to hurry up.
Dialogue: Need to hurry up.

Original: Cloud: Mission accomplished.
Dialogue: Mission accomplished.

Original: Jessie's Mom: When are you going to give up on the Gold Saucer? How long as it been since you even performed?
Dialogue: When are you going to give up on the Gold Saucer? How long as it been since you even performed?

Original: Wedge: A lot of people really rely on Jessie.
Dialogue: A lot of people really rely on Jessie.

Original: Jessie's Mom: As a stagehand though, right? You can be one of those anywhere. So why not come home and get a job at the Sector 8 theater?
Dialogue: As a stagehand though, right? You can be one of those anywhere. So why not come home and get a job at the Sector 8 theater?

Original: Jessie: Uhhh, I'll think about it. You know, I'd really love to stay and chat, but we gotta go.
Dialogue: Uhhh, I'll think about it. You know, I'd really love to stay and chat, but we gotta go.

Original: Jessie's Mom: So soon!?
Dialogue: So soon!?

Original: Jessie: Yeah, well, we hadn't even planned on dropping by. But Wedge wanted some of your famous pizza.
Dialogue: Yeah, well, we hadn't even planned on dropping by. But Wedge wanted some of your famous pizza.

Original: Wedge: So good!
Dialogue: So good!

Original: Jessie's Mom: Sure I can't tempt you with some more?
Dialogue: Sure I can't tempt you with some more?

Original: Wedge: Maybe just a couple slices, Missus R.
Dialogue: Maybe just a couple slices, Missus R.

Original: Biggs & Jessie: Wedge!
Dialogue: Wedge!

Original: Wedge: Hey! I'm...I'm doing it for you guys! You don't want me going to work on an empty stomach.
Dialogue: Hey! I'm...I'm doing it for you guys! You don't want me going to work on an empty stomach.

Original: Jessie (in Cloud's memory): I'm planning on using a weaker blasting agent this time. Since I can't in touch with my supplier, our only option is to loot a warehouse owned by Shinra.
Dialogue: I'm planning on using a weaker blasting agent this time. Since I can't in touch with my supplier, our only option is to loot a warehouse owned by Shinra.

Original: Jessie: Hey there.
Dialogue: Hey there.

Original: Cloud: This it?
Dialogue: This it?

Original: Jessie: Now comes the hard part. I'm gonna use this to sneak into the 7-6 Annex.
Dialogue: Now comes the hard part. I'm gonna use this to sneak into the 7-6 Annex.

Original: Biggs: All right, let's get to it.
Dialogue: All right, let's get to it.

Original: Jessie: Sorry, but you're staying outside. Only I know what to steal from where, so it's gotta be me who goes in.
Dialogue: Sorry, but you're staying outside. Only I know what to steal from where, so it's gotta be me who goes in.

Original: Biggs: So...we came all this way just to eat pizza!?
Dialogue: So...we came all this way just to eat pizza!?

Original: Jessie: (chuckles) You think I'd let you off that easy? You're gonna earn every slice helping Cloud. Just do the thing where you draw everyone's attention away, like you did at my parents'. What's the word again? Maybe I'm more nervous than I thought.
Dialogue: (chuckles) You think I'd let you off that easy? You're gonna earn every slice helping Cloud. Just do the thing where you draw everyone's attention away, like you did at my parents'. What's the word again? Maybe I'm more nervous than I thought.

Original: Cloud: Diversion.
Dialogue: Diversion.

Original: Jessie: Yeah, that! Nice one, military man.
Dialogue: Yeah, that! Nice one, military man.

Original: Wedge: So what, does this mean we're gonna ask some Shinra folks out to dinner?
Dialogue: So what, does this mean we're gonna ask some Shinra folks out to dinner?

Original: Biggs: You know damn well what she means. While you're inside, we make sure the guards are focused on the outside. Yeah?
Dialogue: You know damn well what she means. While you're inside, we make sure the guards are focused on the outside. Yeah?

Original: Jessie: Exactly. Couldn't've put it any better. When you see a flare go up, that's your cue. Rush the front gates and make for the warehouse plaza. The more hell you raise, the more time you buy me.
Dialogue: Exactly. Couldn't've put it any better. When you see a flare go up, that's your cue. Rush the front gates and make for the warehouse plaza. The more hell you raise, the more time you buy me.

Original: Biggs: You're gonna run this guy into the ground, aren'tcha?
Dialogue: You're gonna run this guy into the ground, aren'tcha?

Original: Cloud: How much time do you think you'll need?
Dialogue: How much time do you think you'll need?

Original: Jessie: Not too much. I'll be in and out. I'll send up another flare when I'm done. We rendezvous in the vacant lot up ahead.
Dialogue: Not too much. I'll be in and out. I'll send up another flare when I'm done. We rendezvous in the vacant lot up ahead.

Original: Biggs: Hold on. How are we supposed to get back to the slums? Wait for the first train?
Dialogue: Hold on. How are we supposed to get back to the slums? Wait for the first train?

Original: Jessie: No, I wanna be back before that. Don't worry, I have something worked out. Now, let's get this done.
Dialogue: No, I wanna be back before that. Don't worry, I have something worked out. Now, let's get this done.

Original: Biggs: Well, that diversion's not gonna create itself.
Dialogue: Well, that diversion's not gonna create itself.

Original: Biggs: Jessie's dad was in there, right?
Dialogue: Jessie's dad was in there, right?

Original: Cloud: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Biggs: Mako poisoning. Happened while Jessie was doing a show at the Gold Saucer Ah, but what do you care?
Dialogue: Mako poisoning. Happened while Jessie was doing a show at the Gold Saucer— Ah, but what do you care?

Original: Cloud: No, I wanna hear it.
Dialogue: No, I wanna hear it.

Original: Biggs: Jessie always wanted to be an actress. Worked her ass off for years until finally she caught a break. Top billing. Parents were thrilled. And then...right before opening night...
Dialogue: Jessie always wanted to be an actress. Worked her ass off for years until finally she caught a break. Top billing. Parents were thrilled. And then...right before opening night...

Original: Wedge: Her dad had an accident.
Dialogue: Her dad had an accident.

Original: Biggs: Collapsed from overwork...and in the worst possible place. Mako storage. Lay there half a day before someone found him. Been like that ever since. No change whatsoever. That's what got her into planetology, and led her to seek out Avalanche. How far we've come...
Dialogue: Collapsed from overwork...and in the worst possible place. Mako storage. Lay there half a day before someone found him. Been like that ever since. No change whatsoever. That's what got her into planetology, and led her to seek out Avalanche. How far we've come...

Original: Wedge: Jessie's got a theory about it. Thinks her dad's spirit is stuck nowbetween his body and the heart of the planet. So if we don't shut down the reactors soon...
Dialogue: Jessie's got a theory about it. Thinks her dad's spirit is stuck now—between his body and the heart of the planet. So if we don't shut down the reactors soon...

Original: Biggs: He'll get caught up in the flow and...poof.
Dialogue: He'll get caught up in the flow and...poof.

Original: Biggs: What's so funny?
Dialogue: What's so funny?

Original: Cloud: Just that I understand how you feel. Unlike most of the time.
Dialogue: Just that I understand how you feel. Unlike most of the time.

Original: Biggs: I see...
Dialogue: I see...

Original: Biggs: Mako's the essence of life itself. Of memory and hope. It's not something you burn in a reactor just to keep the lights on. Hell no.
Dialogue: Mako's the essence of life itself. Of memory and hope. It's not something you burn in a reactor just to keep the lights on. Hell no.

Original: Biggs: Ohdon't tell Jessie about this little chat, okay? When she gets pissed, she gets punchy.
Dialogue: Oh—don't tell Jessie about this little chat, okay? When she gets pissed, she gets punchy.

Original: Cloud: Well... No promises.
Dialogue: Well... No promises.

Original: Wedge: He's serious, Cloud! She'll beat the shit out of us!
Dialogue: He's serious, Cloud! She'll beat the shit out of us!

Original: Cloud: Not my problem.
Dialogue: Not my problem.

Original: Biggs: This guy!
Dialogue: This guy!

Original: Wedge: Hey! It's the lot Jessie was talking about. We rendezvous here when we've got what we came for.
Dialogue: Hey! It's the lot Jessie was talking about. We rendezvous here when we've got what we came for.

Original: Biggs: Gotta stay hiddenwait for the signal.
Dialogue: Gotta stay hidden—wait for the signal.

Original: Wedge: It's so quiet...
Dialogue: It's so quiet...

Original: Biggs: Just need to get past this gate.
Dialogue: Just need to get past this gate.

Original: Cloud: Wait. Where are the guards?
Dialogue: Wait. Where are the guards?

Original: Biggs: Looks like someone beat us here.
Dialogue: Looks like someone beat us here.

Original: Wedge: And I don't think it was Jessie.
Dialogue: And I don't think it was Jessie.

Original: Biggs: This had better not get in the way of our plans...
Dialogue: This had better not get in the way of our plans...

Original: Cloud: It won't.
Dialogue: It won't.

Original: On-screen: S7-6 Annex
Dialogue: S7-6 Annex

Original: Biggs: Don't see anyone. What the hell happened?
Dialogue: Don't see anyone. What the hell happened?

Original: Wedge: Hey, man, the plaza's that way. Warehouses are further in. Jessie's supposed to be circling around from the back, right...?
Dialogue: Hey, man, the plaza's that way. Warehouses are further in. Jessie's supposed to be circling around from the back, right...?

Original: Biggs: No need for us to rush. Let's scout it out first.
Dialogue: No need for us to rush. Let's scout it out first.

Original: Cloud: I can handle this solo.
Dialogue: I can handle this solo.

Original: Biggs: What, you're trying to keep us out of it now? Don't be a jackass.
Dialogue: What, you're trying to keep us out of it now? Don't be a jackass.

Original: Wedge: We're in this together!
Dialogue: We're in this together!

Original: Cloud: Don't expect me to save you.
Dialogue: Don't expect me to save you.

Original: Biggs: If you need to check your gear, now's the time. Give the word when you're good to go.
Dialogue: If you need to check your gear, now's the time. Give the word when you're good to go.

Original: Wedge: You can use that vending machine over there to stock up!
Dialogue: You can use that vending machine over there to stock up!

Original: Biggs: Guess there's a training center too. Could go a few rounds before the main event.
Dialogue: Guess there's a training center too. Could go a few rounds before the main event.

Original: On-screen: Commence battle training?
Dialogue: Commence battle training?

Original: Biggs: Remind meyou've got summoning materia, don't you? There's no better way to deal with big groups. You'd be crazy not to equip it.
Dialogue: Remind me—you've got summoning materia, don't you? There's no better way to deal with big groups. You'd be crazy not to equip it.

Original: On-screen: You all set?
Dialogue: You all set?

Original: Biggs: Okay. Let's go over the plan one last time. You start things off by cutting loose where everyone can see you.
Dialogue: Okay. Let's go over the plan one last time. You start things off by cutting loose where everyone can see you.

Original: Wedge: And us?
Dialogue: And us?

Original: Biggs: We're the backup. First, we climb high enough to get a vantage pointthen we go to town on 'em.
Dialogue: We're the backup. First, we climb high enough to get a vantage point—then we go to town on 'em.

Original: Tifa: Heya. So...what did you wanna talk about?
Dialogue: Heya. So...what did you wanna talk about?

Original: Cloud (in flashback): When spring comes, I'm leaving town and going to Midgar.
Dialogue: When spring comes, I'm leaving town and going to Midgar.

Original: Tifa: Should've figured. All the guys are leaving.
Dialogue: Should've figured. All the guys are leaving.

Original: Cloud (in flashback): B-but I'm not like them. I'm not going just to look for work. I'm gonna be a SOLDIER. The best of the best. Like Sephiroth.
Dialogue: B-but I'm not like them. I'm not going just to look for work. I'm gonna be a SOLDIER. The best of the best. Like Sephiroth.

Original: Tifa: The great war hero, huh? Mm... Isn't it pretty hard to become a SOLDIER?
Dialogue: The great war hero, huh? Mm... Isn't it pretty hard to become a SOLDIER?

Original: Cloud (in flashback): Yeah. So I won't be back for a long time.
Dialogue: Yeah. So I won't be back for a long time.

Original: Tifa: Guess not. Think you'll be in the papers?
Dialogue: Guess not. Think you'll be in the papers?

Original: Cloud (in flashback): I'll try.
Dialogue: I'll try.

Original: Tifa: Just...promise me one thing. When we're older, and you're a famous SOLDIER...if I'm ever trapped or in trouble... Promise you'll come and save me.
Dialogue: Just...promise me one thing. When we're older, and you're a famous SOLDIER...if I'm ever trapped or in trouble... Promise you'll come and save me.

Original: Cloud (in flashback): Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Tifa: That's what heroes do. They save people. Please? Just once.
Dialogue: That's what heroes do. They save people. Please? Just once.

Original: Cloud (in flashback): Uhh...
Dialogue: Uhh...

Original: Tifa: Come on, promise me!
Dialogue: Come on, promise me!

Original: Cloud (in flashback): Fine. I promise.
Dialogue: Fine. I promise.

Original: Cloud (in flashback): I heard you're having second thoughts.
Dialogue: I heard you're having second thoughts.

Original: Tifa: I know we have to think big if we're going to make a difference...but not like this. I just... I feel trapped.
Dialogue: I know we have to think big if we're going to make a difference...but not like this. I just... I feel trapped.

Original: Wedge: That's the signal!
Dialogue: That's the signal!

Original: Biggs: All according to plan.
Dialogue: All according to plan.

Original: Cloud: Let's go.
Dialogue: Let's go.

Original: Biggs: Right!
Dialogue: Right!

Original: Wedge: Yeah!
Dialogue: Yeah!

Original: Security Officer: I don't see any intruders. Maybe they went home.
Dialogue: I don't see any intruders. Maybe they went home.

Original: Security Officer: Hey! Over there!
Dialogue: Hey! Over there!

Original: Security Officer: T-target sighted!
Dialogue: T-target sighted!

Original: Security Officer: Light him up!
Dialogue: Light him up!

Original: Cloud: Give up?
Dialogue: Give up?

Original: Security Officer: K-kill the bastard!
Dialogue: K-kill the bastard!

Original: Security Officer: They're up there too!
Dialogue: They're up there too!

Original: Security Officer: We've spotted more intruders. Send backup.
Dialogue: We've spotted more intruders. Send backup.

Original: Security Officer: They have a sniper. Get him first!
Dialogue: They have a sniper. Get him first!

Original: Security Officer: Focus on the other one! Quickly, before we're surrounded!
Dialogue: Focus on the other one! Quickly, before we're surrounded!

Original: Security Officer: You're gonna pay!
Dialogue: You're gonna pay!

Original: Biggs: Oh, you gotta be shitting me.
Dialogue: Oh, you gotta be shitting me.

Original: Biggs: Gimme a bit more time and I got you.
Dialogue: Gimme a bit more time and I got you.

Original: Security Officer: Give it up!
Dialogue: Give it up!

Original: Security Officer: Puttin' up a fight, huh!?
Dialogue: Puttin' up a fight, huh!?

Original: Biggs: Goodbye! And good riddance.
Dialogue: Goodbye! And good riddance.

Original: Elite Shock Trooper: Don't let them escape!
Dialogue: Don't let them escape!

Original: Wedge: And down she goes!
Dialogue: And down she goes!

Original: Biggs: Look at us amateurs putting in the work.
Dialogue: Look at us amateurs putting in the work.

Original: Wedge: Don't worryI've got this!
Dialogue: Don't worry—I've got this!

Original: Wedge: (screams) Catch me if you caaan! (screams)
Dialogue: (screams) Catch me if you caaan! (screams)

Original: Wedge: Tasty treats! Come and get 'em!
Dialogue: Tasty treats! Come and get 'em!

Original: Wedge: Don't eat me! Please don't eat me!
Dialogue: Don't eat me! Please don't eat me!

Original: Wedge: Midgar Special, don't fail me now!
Dialogue: Midgar Special, don't fail me now!

Original: Wedge: Think I ran off the pizza...
Dialogue: Think I ran off the pizza...

Original: Biggs: (laughs) Helluva show, man! If only the ladies loved you that much!
Dialogue: (laughs) Helluva show, man! If only the ladies loved you that much!

Original: Wedge: I'm glad someone's enjoying themselves...
Dialogue: I'm glad someone's enjoying themselves...

Original: Biggs: Of course they store mechs here...
Dialogue: Of course they store mechs here...

Original: Cloud: You ready?
Dialogue: You ready?

Original: Biggs: Hell yeah!
Dialogue: Hell yeah!

Original: Wedge: More than you know! Look what I found. Let's give these jerks a taste of their own medicine!
Dialogue: More than you know! Look what I found. Let's give these jerks a taste of their own medicine!

Original: Wedge: Hurry! Lead the sweepers toward the mines!
Dialogue: Hurry! Lead the sweepers toward the mines!

Original: Wedge: Now that's what I call teamwork!
Dialogue: Now that's what I call teamwork!

Original: Security Officer: Stay where you are!
Dialogue: Stay where you are!

Original: Biggs: Well, shit.
Dialogue: Well, shit.

Original: Security Officer: All right, assholes! Show me your hands!
Dialogue: All right, assholes! Show me your hands!

Original: Roche: (laughs) Well, aren't we having a wonderful time kicking the hornet's nest!
Dialogue: (laughs) Well, aren't we having a wonderful time kicking the hornet's nest!

Original: Roche: You know what I want. A second dancejust the two of us.
Dialogue: You know what I want. A second dance—just the two of us.

Original: Roche: You turned the key... The engine roars with excitement... It hungers to be set free!
Dialogue: You turned the key... The engine roars with excitement... It hungers to be set free!

Original: Cloud: Fall back.
Dialogue: Fall back.

Original: Biggs: Right. C'mon!
Dialogue: Right. C'mon!

Original: Roche: It's been a long time since I fought a duel out of the saddle. But...for all the miles on the clock...
Dialogue: It's been a long time since I fought a duel out of the saddle. But...for all the miles on the clock...

Original: Roche: I'm just as fast as I ever was!
Dialogue: I'm just as fast as I ever was!

Original: Roche: At last, our long-awaited dance begins! Here's to a fair fight, my friend!
Dialogue: At last, our long-awaited dance begins! Here's to a fair fight, my friend!

Original: Roche: I told you we were gonna push it past the redline!
Dialogue: I told you we were gonna push it past the redline!

Original: Cloud: Satisfied?
Dialogue: Satisfied?

Original: Roche: (laughs) With such fleeting pleasure? Hardly. There are higher heights to which you and I can still soar...
Dialogue: (laughs) With such fleeting pleasure? Hardly. There are higher heights to which you and I can still soar...

Original: Security Officer: Okay, boys! Give 'em everything you've got! But kill the swordsman first!
Dialogue: Okay, boys! Give 'em everything you've got! But kill the swordsman first!

Original: Roche: We really must do this again. Until then...try not to die. I'll see you on the road, my friend.
Dialogue: We really must do this again. Until then...try not to die. I'll see you on the road, my friend.

Original: Cloud: Goddammit!
Dialogue: Goddammit!

Original: Cloud: Let's go!
Dialogue: Let's go!

Original: Biggs: Right!
Dialogue: Right!

Original: Cloud: Wedge!
Dialogue: Wedge!

Original: Wedge: Run! Run while you can!
Dialogue: Run! Run while you can!

Original: Trooper: Friendly! Friendly! Stand down!
Dialogue: Friendly! Friendly! Stand down!

Original: Trooper: Your team shouldn't be here.
Dialogue: Your team shouldn't be here.

Original: Wedge: Glad yours is...
Dialogue: Glad yours is...

Original: Biggs: C'mere.
Dialogue: C'mere.

Original: Biggs: Wedge'll be fine. But you won't be if they start asking questions.
Dialogue: Wedge'll be fine. But you won't be if they start asking questions.

Original: Cloud: And who are "they"?
Dialogue: And who are "they"?

Original: Biggs: First guests to the party. Another Avalanche cell. Our holier-than-thou friends from the old guard... It's always their way or the highway. Lately they've been a real pain in the ass... Till now.
Dialogue: First guests to the party. Another Avalanche cell. Our holier-than-thou friends from the old guard... It's always their way or the highway. Lately they've been a real pain in the ass... Till now.

Original: Cloud: So then why are they here?
Dialogue: So then why are they here?

Original: Biggs: Beats me. We've been on the outs ever since our cell got labeled too extreme... though they're the ones running around with mil-spec gear. Word is they've cut a deal with Wutai... Promised 'em all the materia in Midgar, apparently. Think there's any truth to that?
Dialogue: Beats me. We've been on the outs ever since our cell got labeled too extreme... though they're the ones running around with mil-spec gear. Word is they've cut a deal with Wutai... Promised 'em all the materia in Midgar, apparently. Think there's any truth to that?

Original: Cloud: You tell me.
Dialogue: You tell me.

Original: Biggs: Sometimes I think we're the only ones who've realized the war is over.
Dialogue: Sometimes I think we're the only ones who've realized the war is over.

Original: Biggs: Okaymission complete. Let's make our way back to the lot.
Dialogue: Okay—mission complete. Let's make our way back to the lot.

Original: Cloud: Right.
Dialogue: Right.

Original: Biggs: Looking a lot more crowded now.
Dialogue: Looking a lot more crowded now.

Original: Cloud: Security's out in force.
Dialogue: Security's out in force.

Original: Biggs: Just what we need.
Dialogue: Just what we need.

Original: Cloud: So, are we not gonna wait for Wedge?
Dialogue: So, are we not gonna wait for Wedge?

Original: Biggs: If we stuck around or went back, he'd only get upset.
Dialogue: If we stuck around or went back, he'd only get upset.

Original: Cloud: Why's that?
Dialogue: Why's that?

Original: Biggs: Guess a SOLDIER wouldn't understand... I'll tell him you were worried about him, though. Who knowsmight just make his day.
Dialogue: Guess a SOLDIER wouldn't understand... I'll tell him you were worried about him, though. Who knows—might just make his day.

Original: Security Officer: ...And many of our citizens have already been disturbed by the alarms. Squad A will set up here and search for suspects. B will establish a perimeterroadblocks included. Contain the situation! Rumors of violence against Public Security will only serve to frighten the people. You will tell any concerned citizens that this was a false alarm!
Dialogue: ...And many of our citizens have already been disturbed by the alarms. Squad A will set up here and search for suspects. B will establish a perimeter—roadblocks included. Contain the situation! Rumors of violence against Public Security will only serve to frighten the people. You will tell any concerned citizens that this was a false alarm!

Original: Jessie: You made it! Over here!
Dialogue: You made it! Over here!

Original: Jessie: Could you have been any louder? I mean, it made my job a lot easier, but Wait, where's Wedge?
Dialogue: Could you have been any louder? I mean, it made my job a lot easier, but— Wait, where's Wedge?

Original: Jessie: Wedge!? That was close...
Dialogue: Wedge!? That was close...

Original: Cloud: We'll go get him.
Dialogue: We'll go get him.

Original: Biggs: Hey, buddy. How you doing?
Dialogue: Hey, buddy. How you doing?

Original: Biggs: C'mon...
Dialogue: C'mon...

Original: Wedge: Not my finest hour...
Dialogue: Not my finest hour...

Original: Biggs: You get hit?
Dialogue: You get hit?

Original: Wedge: Just winged, I think... Or shot!
Dialogue: Just winged, I think... Or shot!

Original: Biggs: Really? Let me see...
Dialogue: Really? Let me see...

Original: Jessie: Are we seriously doing this here? That's...wow.
Dialogue: Are we seriously doing this here? That's...wow.

Original: Wedge: You guys are the worst...
Dialogue: You guys are the worst...

Original: Jessie: Your ass is fine. Maybe singed, but the only casualty is your underwear. This is like a bruise or a mild burn at worst!
Dialogue: Your ass is fine. Maybe singed, but the only casualty is your underwear. This is like a bruise or a mild burn at worst!

Original: Wedge: Nowthatwas a gunshot.
Dialogue: Now that was a gunshot.

Original: Jessie: Is that a smile I spy?
Dialogue: Is that a smile I spy?

Original: Cloud: It's not safe here. We should go.
Dialogue: It's not safe here. We should go.

Original: Biggs, Jessie, & Wedge: Copy that!
Dialogue: Copy that!

Original: Wedge: So how do we get back to the slums?
Dialogue: So how do we get back to the slums?

Original: Jessie: With a little trick I've been dying to try out...
Dialogue: With a little trick I've been dying to try out...

Original: Biggs: Man, can't believe HQ was running an op tonight of all nights.
Dialogue: Man, can't believe HQ was running an op tonight of all nights.

Original: Cloud: Coincidence?
Dialogue: Coincidence?

Original: Biggs: That or a bad omen. If they're ramping up for something, could get messy. Add it to the pile of complications to think about.
Dialogue: That or a bad omen. If they're ramping up for something, could get messy. Add it to the pile of complications to think about.

Original: Jessie: Right, this is it! Through here and we're home free.
Dialogue: Right, this is it! Through here and we're home free.

Original: Wedge: Where exactly are we going?
Dialogue: Where exactly are we going?

Original: Jessie: When we get there, you'll know! Now that I've got my blasting agent, we should have everything we need for our next mission!
Dialogue: When we get there, you'll know! Now that I've got my blasting agent, we should have everything we need for our next mission!

Original: Biggs: Sure hope so.
Dialogue: Sure hope so.

Original: Cloud: Yeah...m-me too. For your dad's sake.
Dialogue: Yeah...m-me too. For your dad's sake.

Original: Biggs: Hey! What the hell, man!?
Dialogue: Hey! What the hell, man!?

Original: Jessie: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Wedge: UhCloud was just saying how he hopes to come back and try the Midgar Special next time!
Dialogue: Uh—Cloud was just saying how he hopes to come back and try the Midgar Special next time!

Original: Jessie: Really, huh?Cloudsaid that?
Dialogue: Really, huh? Cloud said that?

Original: Biggs: Sure did! Wants a whole pie to himself, isn't that right?
Dialogue: Sure did! Wants a whole pie to himself, isn't that right?

Original: Cloud: That's...that's right...
Dialogue: That's...that's right...

Original: Jessie: Really...? Well, okay then! Maybe I'll lend Mom a hand next time too!
Dialogue: Really...? Well, okay then! Maybe I'll lend Mom a hand next time too!

Original: Wedge: That'd be awesome!
Dialogue: That'd be awesome!

Original: Biggs: Super-duper awesome!
Dialogue: Super-duper awesome!

Original: On-screen: Sector 7 Plate Edge
Dialogue: Sector 7 Plate Edge

Original: Jessie: Should be somewhere around here... Bingo! I half figured my dad got it wrong, but nope! They're here just like he said!
Dialogue: Should be somewhere around here... Bingo! I half figured my dad got it wrong, but nope! They're here just like he said!

Original: Biggs: Parachutes?
Dialogue: Parachutes?

Original: Wedge: Huh? Whaddya mean "half figured"!?
Dialogue: Huh? Whaddya mean "half figured"!?

Original: Jessie: Fifty-fifty is pretty good odds, if you ask me! This is gonna be fun!
Dialogue: Fifty-fifty is pretty good odds, if you ask me! This is gonna be fun!

Original: Jessie: Thanks guys. I really appreciate you coming all this way with me. And like I said before, I'd be grateful if you kept this between us until after the mission. I don't wanna...complicate things.
Dialogue: Thanks guys. I really appreciate you coming all this way with me. And like I said before, I'd be grateful if you kept this between us until after the mission. I don't wanna...complicate things.

Original: Biggs: Sure. Okay, who's ready to fly!?
Dialogue: Sure. Okay, who's ready to fly!?

Original: Jessie: Me! Me!
Dialogue: Me! Me!

Original: Biggs: Hey Cloudyou let him down gently, alright?
Dialogue: Hey Cloud—you let him down gently, alright?

Original: Cloud: Yep.
Dialogue: Yep.

Original: Jessie: Wait, I almost forgot! One more thing!
Dialogue: Wait, I almost forgot! One more thing!

Original: Biggs: S-stop it! What in the hell are you trying to
Dialogue: S-stop it! What in the hell are you trying to—

Original: Jessie: Easy! You'll make us fall!
Dialogue: Easy! You'll make us fall!

Original: Biggs: Not if you do first!
Dialogue: Not if you do first!

Original: Jessie: Swing by my place afterso I can "pay you in full."
Dialogue: Swing by my place after—so I can "pay you in full."

Original: Biggs: Huh!? Now!? (screams)
Dialogue: Huh!? Now!? (screams)

Original: Wedge: Wait! Gimme a minute!
Dialogue: Wait! Gimme a minute!

Original: Cloud: No.
Dialogue: No.

Original: Wedge: Why do you have to be such a hard-ass, bro?
Dialogue: Why do you have to be such a hard-ass, bro?

Original: Cloud: I ain't your bro.
Dialogue: I ain't your bro.

Original: Wedge: I wish I could've done more... Just got hurt
Dialogue: I wish I could've done more... Just got hurt—

Original: Cloud: You did enough. You took one for the team. Be proud.
Dialogue: You did enough. You took one for the team. Be proud.

Original: Wedge: Yeah...? Yeah...
Dialogue: Yeah...? Yeah...

Original: Biggs: Feels like we're flying high these days!
Dialogue: Feels like we're flying high these days!

Original: Jessie: (chuckles) Now more than ever!
Dialogue: (chuckles) Now more than ever!

Original: Biggs: He's a keeper all right.
Dialogue: He's a keeper all right.

Original: Jessie: Yeah! Together we can take on the world!
Dialogue: Yeah! Together we can take on the world!

Original: On-screen: Sector 7 Slums
Dialogue: Sector 7 Slums

Original: Wedge: I'll head home on my own. After all, I'm only a little sore...
Dialogue: I'll head home on my own. After all, I'm only a little sore...

Original: Cloud: It's cool, we'll go together.
Dialogue: It's cool, we'll go together.

Original: Wedge: Aw, thanks, bro!
Dialogue: Aw, thanks, bro!

Original: Cloud: Cut that out.
Dialogue: Cut that out.

Original: Wedge: This way!
Dialogue: This way!

Original: Wedge: Think Jessie and Biggs made it back safe?
Dialogue: Think Jessie and Biggs made it back safe?

Original: Cloud: I guess.
Dialogue: I guess.

Original: Wedge: Cool if we check on them? We'll pass by their places anyway.
Dialogue: Cool if we check on them? We'll pass by their places anyway.

Original: Cloud: Sure.
Dialogue: Sure.

Original: Wedge: Well, this is Biggs's place. I guess he hasn't made it home yet.
Dialogue: Well, this is Biggs's place. I guess he hasn't made it home yet.

Original: Cloud: Guess not.
Dialogue: Guess not.

Original: Wedge: Hope he isn't "worst case-ing" it again. He's got a habit of overthinking things. Worrying about all the possible outcomes till his head hurts.
Dialogue: Hope he isn't "worst case-ing" it again. He's got a habit of overthinking things. Worrying about all the possible outcomes till his head hurts.

Original: Cloud: Wouldn't've guessed.
Dialogue: Wouldn't've guessed.

Original: Wedge: And when he worries, I worry. Anyway, let's head on over to Jessie's!
Dialogue: And when he worries, I worry. Anyway, let's head on over to Jessie's!

Original: Wedge: This is where Jessie lives. Men are not allowed inside.
Dialogue: This is where Jessie lives. Men are not allowed inside.

Original: Cloud: Hmm...
Dialogue: Hmm...

Original: Wedge: Lots of pretty girls trying to make it big onstage live here. So don't hang around or they might get the wrong idea.
Dialogue: Lots of pretty girls trying to make it big onstage live here. So don't hang around or they might get the wrong idea.

Original: Cloud: Huh.
Dialogue: Huh.

Original: Wedge: I'm telling you this for your own good, Cloud! People around here love to gossip.
Dialogue: I'm telling you this for your own good, Cloud! People around here love to gossip.

Original: Cloud: They know about Jessie and Avalanche?
Dialogue: They know about Jessie and Avalanche?

Original: Wedge: Nah, it's all good. They think she's an actress. Oh...and one more thing, bro. It's all a game to her. Don't fall for it!
Dialogue: Nah, it's all good. They think she's an actress. Oh...and one more thing, bro. It's all a game to her. Don't fall for it!

Original: Cloud: You lost me.
Dialogue: You lost me.

Original: Wedge: (laughs) Life's a stage and love's the play!
Dialogue: (laughs) Life's a stage and love's the play!

Original: Wedge: Guys aren't allowed, remember!?
Dialogue: Guys aren't allowed, remember!?

Original: Wedge: Hey there, Biggums, Reggie, Smalls... Brought a new friend to meet you! These little guys are on guard duty today.
Dialogue: Hey there, Biggums, Reggie, Smalls... Brought a new friend to meet you! These little guys are on guard duty today.

Original: Cloud: Okay...
Dialogue: Okay...

Original: Wedge: Thanks for seeing me home!
Dialogue: Thanks for seeing me home!

Original: Cloud: Really sorry about your ass.
Dialogue: Really sorry about your ass.

Original: Wedge: S'all good, bro!
Dialogue: S'all good, bro!

Original: Cloud: It's kinda weird when you call me th
Dialogue: It's kinda weird when you call me th—

Original: Wedge: Hey, don't be scared! Deep down, he's a big softie.
Dialogue: Hey, don't be scared! Deep down, he's a big softie.

Original: Cloud: Hell with it...
Dialogue: Hell with it...

Original: Wedge: Hey, bro! Wanna chill with me and the gang for a bit?
Dialogue: Hey, bro! Wanna chill with me and the gang for a bit?

Original: Cloud: Uh, who's the gang?
Dialogue: Uh, who's the gang?

Original: Wedge: The cats, dummy. Who else? Biggumus Rex, Reginaldo, Mister Smalls...
Dialogue: The cats, dummy. Who else? Biggumus Rex, Reginaldo, Mister Smalls...

Original: Cloud: Right...
Dialogue: Right...

Original: Wedge: Mind checking on the others again for me? Thanks! Oh, and have a good night!
Dialogue: Mind checking on the others again for me? Thanks! Oh, and have a good night!

Original: Jessie: Well, if it isn't Cloud Strife! Was wondering when you'd show up. Without further ado... Here you are. Thanks for stepping up, "merc." And now for the cherry on top.
Dialogue: Well, if it isn't Cloud Strife! Was wondering when you'd show up. Without further ado... Here you are. Thanks for stepping up, "merc." And now for the cherry on top.

Original: Cloud: Okay, I get it. Mind letting me breathe?
Dialogue: Okay, I get it. Mind letting me breathe?

Original: Jessie: Depends. Mind coming over tomorrow night? My roommates should all be out for a while.
Dialogue: Depends. Mind coming over tomorrow night? My roommates should all be out for a while.

Original: Cloud: Are you seriously that desperate? Just let go already.
Dialogue: Are you seriously that desperate? Just let go already.

Original: Jessie: Only if you promise to come back tomorrow night. Deal?
Dialogue: Only if you promise to come back tomorrow night. Deal?

Original: On-screen: Will you come back tomorrow night?
Dialogue: Will you come back tomorrow night?

Original: Cloud: No promises, but I'll think it over.
Dialogue: No promises, but I'll think it over.

Original: Jessie: Really? You will!? I make a mean pizza, I'll have you know! Marche, luche, black milly, red shellyI use only the best ingredients! Sound good?
Dialogue: Really? You will!? I make a mean pizza, I'll have you know! Marche, luche, black milly, red shelly—I use only the best ingredients! Sound good?

Original: Cloud: Never heard of any of that stuff.
Dialogue: Never heard of any of that stuff.

Original: Jessie: Awww, you aresoadorable, you know that!? You just leave everything to meit'll be great!
Dialogue: Awww, you are so adorable, you know that!? You just leave everything to me—it'll be great!

Original: Cloud: Not happening.
Dialogue: Not happening.

Original: Jessie: Ah, sorry... Little too in-your-face? I'll just have to change it up then.
Dialogue: Ah, sorry... Little too in-your-face? I'll just have to change it up then.

Original: Jessie: (laughs) Nighty night!
Dialogue: (laughs) Nighty night!

Original: Jessie: Psych!
Dialogue: Psych!

Original: Cloud: Bad idea...
Dialogue: Bad idea...

Original: Biggs: Oh, hey, Cloud! Survived the jump? How's Wedge?
Dialogue: Oh, hey, Cloud! Survived the jump? How's Wedge?

Original: Cloud: He's fine.
Dialogue: He's fine.

Original: Biggs: Well, that's good to hear. Tomorrow's a really big day for all of us. When Wedge said he'd been shot, I was afraid we'd have to call off the whole damn thing. Heading topside in secret... Don't think I could've faced Barret if something had happened. But Jessie'd been acting weird and I knew I couldn't just ignore her.
Dialogue: Well, that's good to hear. Tomorrow's a really big day for all of us. When Wedge said he'd been shot, I was afraid we'd have to call off the whole damn thing. Heading topside in secret... Don't think I could've faced Barret if something had happened. But Jessie'd been acting weird and I knew I couldn't just ignore her.

Original: Cloud: Biggs.
Dialogue: Biggs.

Original: Biggs: She must be prepping the bomb right now. But will she be able to finish before morning? I should go and see if she needs any
Dialogue: She must be prepping the bomb right now. But will she be able to finish before morning? I should go and see if she needs any—

Original: Cloud: Biggs!
Dialogue: Biggs!

Original: Biggs: Huh? Sorry. Our chute was blown pretty far off course. It...felt like a bad omen or something...so...
Dialogue: Huh? Sorry. Our chute was blown pretty far off course. It...felt like a bad omen or something...so...

Original: Cloud: Get some rest. You need it.
Dialogue: Get some rest. You need it.

Original: Biggs: Roger.
Dialogue: Roger.

Original: Cloud: Night.
Dialogue: Night.

Original: Biggs: Night. And thanks. Really.
Dialogue: Night. And thanks. Really.

Original: Cloud: She's probably asleep.
Dialogue: She's probably asleep.

Original: On-screen: Go to sleep?
Dialogue: Go to sleep?

Original: Tifa: Cloud?
Dialogue: Cloud?

Original: Cloud: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Tifa: You were out for a while.
Dialogue: You were out for a while.

Original: Cloud: Just walking.
Dialogue: Just walking.

Original: Tifa: I ran into Johnny, by the way. Said not to worry, he was getting out of town.
Dialogue: I ran into Johnny, by the way. Said not to worry, he was getting out of town.

Original: Cloud: Oh, that guy.
Dialogue: Oh, that guy.

Original: Tifa: You...weren't thinking of leaving Midgar anytime soon, were you?
Dialogue: You...weren't thinking of leaving Midgar anytime soon, were you?

Original: Cloud: Well, seems this old friend of mine's in a tight spot... Long time ago I said I'd be there for her. Made a promise, so...
Dialogue: Well, seems this old friend of mine's in a tight spot... Long time ago I said I'd be there for her. Made a promise, so...

Original: Tifa: Can't say this is quite what I had in mind when I put that on you way back when.
Dialogue: Can't say this is quite what I had in mind when I put that on you way back when.

Original: Cloud: If you wanna talk, I'm listening.
Dialogue: If you wanna talk, I'm listening.

Original: Tifa: Huh? What's with you all of a sudden?
Dialogue: Huh? What's with you all of a sudden?

Original: Cloud: With me?
Dialogue: With me?

Original: Tifa: Like you're losing that hard edge.
Dialogue: Like you're losing that hard edge.

Original: Cloud: That bad?
Dialogue: That bad?

Original: Tifa: Not at allI like it. Maybe Marlene won't be so scared of you next time...
Dialogue: Not at all—I like it. Maybe Marlene won't be so scared of you next time...

Original: Tifa: (chuckles) I'm really glad to have you back, Cloud. Really glad.
Dialogue: (chuckles) I'm really glad to have you back, Cloud. Really glad.

Original: Tifa: It's pretty late, huh? I'd like to catch up more, but we should probably both get some sleep, yeah?
Dialogue: It's pretty late, huh? I'd like to catch up more, but we should probably both get some sleep, yeah?

Original: Cloud: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Tifa: Good night then.
Dialogue: Good night then.

Original: Cloud: Good night, Tifa...
Dialogue: Good night, Tifa...

Original: Tifa: Cloud!
Dialogue: Cloud!

Original: Cloud: What's wrong?
Dialogue: What's wrong?

Original: Tifa: Come with me! Quickly!
Dialogue: Come with me! Quickly!

Original: Tifa: We were getting ready to set out when those things showed up and came after us!
Dialogue: We were getting ready to set out when those things showed up and came after us!

Original: Cloud: The others?
Dialogue: The others?

Original: Tifa: Barret and Jessie are holding their ground, but for how long I don't know...
Dialogue: Barret and Jessie are holding their ground, but for how long I don't know...

Original: Cloud: Let's go.
Dialogue: Let's go.

Original: Tifa: Right.
Dialogue: Right.

Original: Cloud: Ready?
Dialogue: Ready?

Original: Tifa: You know it!
Dialogue: You know it!

Original: Cloud: Let's head for the bar.
Dialogue: Let's head for the bar.

Original: Tifa: Okay!
Dialogue: Okay!

Original: Cloud: Is this even working?
Dialogue: Is this even working?

Original: Cloud: We kill it?
Dialogue: We kill it?

Original: Cloud: There's no end to this.
Dialogue: There's no end to this.

Original: Tifa: What are these things?
Dialogue: What are these things?

Original: Cloud: No idea. Pretty sure you can't even see them unless they make physical contact first...
Dialogue: No idea. Pretty sure you can't even see them unless they make physical contact first...

Original: Tifa: And that's all you can tell me?
Dialogue: And that's all you can tell me?

Original: Cloud: I can tell you they're not invincible.
Dialogue: I can tell you they're not invincible.

Original: Tifa: I guess that's something.
Dialogue: I guess that's something.

Original: Tifa: More of them!? We're running out of time.
Dialogue: More of them!? We're running out of time.

Original: Cloud: Any other way?
Dialogue: Any other way?

Original: Tifa: Yeahover here!
Dialogue: Yeah—over here!

Original: Cloud: Again?
Dialogue: Again?

Original: Tifa: Are they trying to stop us from reaching the others?
Dialogue: Are they trying to stop us from reaching the others?

Original: Tifa: Cloud. This way.
Dialogue: Cloud. This way.

Original: Tifa: Oh, you gotta be kidding me. It's like trying to fight a hurricane.
Dialogue: Oh, you gotta be kidding me. It's like trying to fight a hurricane.

Original: Cloud: Stay on your feet.
Dialogue: Stay on your feet.

Original: Tifa: You don't have to tell me that.
Dialogue: You don't have to tell me that.

Original: Jessie: Barret!
Dialogue: Barret!

Original: Barret: Gimme a break!
Dialogue: Gimme a break!

Original: Tifa: Jessie! Barret!
Dialogue: Jessie! Barret!

Original: Barret: Where you been!?
Dialogue: Where you been!?

Original: Jessie: They just keep coming! We've gotta do something!
Dialogue: They just keep coming! We've gotta do something!

Original: Tifa: Hang on!
Dialogue: Hang on!

Original: Cloud: Tifa!
Dialogue: Tifa!

Original: Tifa: Cloud!
Dialogue: Cloud!

Original: Cloud: I'm coming!
Dialogue: I'm coming!

Original: Cloud: Move!
Dialogue: Move!

Original: On-screen: The enigmatic spectre is vulnerable.
Dialogue: The enigmatic spectre is vulnerable.

Original: Tifa: What is it doing now?
Dialogue: What is it doing now?

Original: Cloud: Be careful.
Dialogue: Be careful.

Original: Tifa: So this thing's not gonna give up without a fight, huh?
Dialogue: So this thing's not gonna give up without a fight, huh?

Original: Barret: How's your ammo?
Dialogue: How's your ammo?

Original: Jessie: Running low
Dialogue: Running low—

Original: Jessie: Shit!
Dialogue: Shit!

Original: Tifa: Jessie!
Dialogue: Jessie!

Original: Barret: Dammit!
Dialogue: Dammit!

Original: Tifa: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Cloud: The hell...?
Dialogue: The hell...?

Original: Barret: Jessie!
Dialogue: Jessie!

Original: Tifa: You okay?
Dialogue: You okay?

Original: Jessie: Me and my two left feet...
Dialogue: Me and my two left feet...

Original: Tifa: Easy now!
Dialogue: Easy now!

Original: Barret: We ain't putting on a damn show!
Dialogue: We ain't putting on a damn show!

Original: Barret: The hell were those things? Some kind of...I dunno! Guess I shouldn't be surprised, though. Nevercantell what weird shit'll come crawling out of the scrap down here. It's those reactors, I'm telling you...
Dialogue: The hell were those things? Some kind of...I dunno! Guess I shouldn't be surprised, though. Never can tell what weird shit'll come crawling out of the scrap down here. It's those reactors, I'm telling you...

Original: Cloud: It hurt?
Dialogue: It hurt?

Original: Jessie: Wish I could say it didn't, but yeah... (chuckles)
Dialogue: Wish I could say it didn't, but yeah... (chuckles)

Original: Jessie: God, this is so embarrassing... Hate playing the damsel in distress...
Dialogue: God, this is so embarrassing... Hate playing the damsel in distress...

Original: Cloud: It happens.
Dialogue: It happens.

Original: Wedge: What did you do to your leg!? D-does it hurt?
Dialogue: What did you do to your leg!? D-does it hurt?

Original: Jessie: Not nearly as much as the fuss everyone's making.
Dialogue: Not nearly as much as the fuss everyone's making.

Original: Tifa: Still, I think you ought to avoid putting any
Dialogue: Still, I think you ought to avoid putting any—

Original: Jessie: I'm fine!
Dialogue: I'm fine!

Original: Barret: That's enough! You're out, Jessie.
Dialogue: That's enough! You're out, Jessie.

Original: Jessie: Huh? What about the mission? We already sent Biggs in, remember? Don't tell me you're thinking of calling it off!?
Dialogue: Huh? What about the mission? We already sent Biggs in, remember? Don't tell me you're thinking of calling it off!?

Original: Barret: Nah, we got this...
Dialogue: Nah, we got this...

Original: Jessie: The hell you do!
Dialogue: The hell you do!

Original: Wedge: If you need someone to step up, I'm your man! (coughs)
Dialogue: If you need someone to step up, I'm your man! (coughs)

Original: Barret: Okay... So here's the thing...
Dialogue: Okay... So here's the thing...

Original: Cloud: I'm gonna need a raise.
Dialogue: I'm gonna need a raise.

Original: Barret: Consider it done!
Dialogue: Consider it done!

Original: Barret: Aight, everyoneCloud's in. The mission is on!
Dialogue: Aight, everyone—Cloud's in. The mission is on!

Original: Jessie: Go and raise some hell for me, okay?
Dialogue: Go and raise some hell for me, okay?

Original: Barret: Listen, WedgeI need you to hang back and guard the home front.
Dialogue: Listen, Wedge—I need you to hang back and guard the home front.

Original: Wedge: But I'm in perfect health!
Dialogue: But I'm in perfect health!

Original: Barret: Which makes you the perfect choice to look after Jessie and Marlene.
Dialogue: Which makes you the perfect choice to look after Jessie and Marlene.

Original: Barret: Let's get this show on the road... to Mako Reactor 5! Once you've got your gear in order, head to the station for the meet. Got it?
Dialogue: Let's get this show on the road... to Mako Reactor 5! Once you've got your gear in order, head to the station for the meet. Got it?

Original: Barret: This'll help you get squared away. Don't tell me I never did nothing for ya. I'm counting on you, SOLDIER boy...
Dialogue: This'll help you get squared away. Don't tell me I never did nothing for ya. I'm counting on you, SOLDIER boy...

Original: Wedge: Ah, forgot to give this to you, bro. Your prize for taking the top spot on the darts leaderboard. You earned it. After you guys come back from the plate, maybe we can play a round together?
Dialogue: Ah, forgot to give this to you, bro. Your prize for taking the top spot on the darts leaderboard. You earned it. After you guys come back from the plate, maybe we can play a round together?

Original: Jessie: Relegated to stagehand once again. I'm starting to think I'll never have a starring role...
Dialogue: Relegated to stagehand once again. I'm starting to think I'll never have a starring role...

Original: Cloud: There's always next time.
Dialogue: There's always next time.

Original: Jessie: What's this? Words of encouragement? (chuckles) Thanks, I need them.
Dialogue: What's this? Words of encouragement? (chuckles) Thanks, I need them.

Original: (Upon talking to Jessie again if the player selected "No promises" in response to her on the previous day. After this, her usual lines will repeat.)Jessie: Hurry back now. You don't want my home-cooked pizza to get cold.
Dialogue: Hurry back now. You don't want my home-cooked pizza to get cold.

Original: Tifa: Alright, let's get going.
Dialogue: Alright, let's get going.

Original: Cloud: Sure...afteryou take a deep breath.
Dialogue: Sure...after you take a deep breath.

Original: Tifa: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Cloud: I can tell you're nervous.
Dialogue: I can tell you're nervous.

Original: Tifa: That obvious, huh?
Dialogue: That obvious, huh?

Original: Tifa: Okay. I'm ready now.
Dialogue: Okay. I'm ready now.

Original: New Recruit: Sir... I got my hands on tickets for theLovelessmusical. Would you like to go with me?
Dialogue: Sir... I got my hands on tickets for the Loveless musical. Would you like to go with me?

Original: Senior Officer: You do realize, we're on duty. The slums are Avalanche territory. Stay sharp.
Dialogue: You do realize, we're on duty. The slums are Avalanche territory. Stay sharp.

Original: New Recruit: Right. Sorry, sir! It's just that...never mind.
Dialogue: Right. Sorry, sir! It's just that...never mind.

Original: New Recruit: I heard they've deployed SOLDIER operatives, too. It's been a while since they'd done that. I wanted to be a SOLDIER, but as you can see
Dialogue: I heard they've deployed SOLDIER operatives, too. It's been a while since they'd done that. I wanted to be a SOLDIER, but as you can see—

Original: Senior Officer: Cut the chatter. We're working!
Dialogue: Cut the chatter. We're working!

Original: New Recruit: Right! Sorry, sir.
Dialogue: Right! Sorry, sir.

Original: Senior Officer: You're not Avalanche, are you?
Dialogue: You're not Avalanche, are you?

Original: New Recruit: Oh man... A bomb threat? I'm not ready for this...
Dialogue: Oh man... A bomb threat? I'm not ready for this...

Original: Senior Officer: Seen anything suspicious?
Dialogue: Seen anything suspicious?

Original: New Recruit: I don't know who's scarierAvalanche or my superior.
Dialogue: I don't know who's scarier—Avalanche or my superior.

Original: Chadley: Cloud. You have exceeded my expectations.
Dialogue: Cloud. You have exceeded my expectations.

Original: Barret: Alright, people. Mission starts the moment we board that train. You sure you ready for this?
Dialogue: Alright, people. Mission starts the moment we board that train. You sure you ready for this?

Original: On-screen: Get on the train?
Dialogue: Get on the train?

Original: Barret: Well then, what're you waiting for!? Finish up so we can get going.
Dialogue: Well then, what're you waiting for!? Finish up so we can get going.

Original: Tifa: Do you think Biggs is...on schedule?
Dialogue: Do you think Biggs is...on schedule?

Original: Barret: All we can do is hope...
Dialogue: All we can do is hope...

Original: Cloud: Today really gotta be the day, huh?
Dialogue: Today really gotta be the day, huh?

Original: Barret: Ain't no stopping this train we're on, son. A lotta people risked their lives to get it rolling... Already put the word out more's coming, too... "Shut them all down by today, or we shut another down for you." Ain't on us. Not us...
Dialogue: Ain't no stopping this train we're on, son. A lotta people risked their lives to get it rolling... Already put the word out more's coming, too... "Shut them all down by today, or we shut another down for you." Ain't on us. Not us...

Original: Barret: Play it cool.
Dialogue: Play it cool.

Original: Announcement: This is an announcement from the Shinra Electric Power Company. The terrorist group "Avalanche" has issued another bomb threat. In response, we have raised the threat level and entered a state of heightened alert. All lines are currently experiencing delays. We anticipate that our arrival at Sector 4 will be later than scheduled.
Dialogue: This is an announcement from the Shinra Electric Power Company. The terrorist group "Avalanche" has issued another bomb threat. In response, we have raised the threat level and entered a state of heightened alert. All lines are currently experiencing delays. We anticipate that our arrival at Sector 4 will be later than scheduled.

Original: Barret: The target's Mako Reactor 5. From the station, we take the backstreets. Once we're inside the facility, it's the same deal as last time.
Dialogue: The target's Mako Reactor 5. From the station, we take the backstreets. Once we're inside the facility, it's the same deal as last time.

Original: Cloud: Head for mako storage.
Dialogue: Head for mako storage.

Original: Barret: And thenblowit all to hell.
Dialogue: And then blow it all to hell.

Original: Barret: Let's do this one for Jessie and Wedge. They deserve it.
Dialogue: Let's do this one for Jessie and Wedge. They deserve it.

Original: Tifa: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Cloud: Sure.
Dialogue: Sure.

Original: Tifa: I didn't think word would spread this fast. There's barely anyone on this train. And none of them look happy to be here.
Dialogue: I didn't think word would spread this fast. There's barely anyone on this train. And none of them look happy to be here.

Original: Barret: Might stand out as a group. You two stay here.
Dialogue: Might stand out as a group. You two stay here.

Original: Tifa: Cloud.
Dialogue: Cloud.

Original: Announcement: The train will be passing an ID checkpoint shortly.
Dialogue: The train will be passing an ID checkpoint shortly.

Original: Tifa: Here comes the first hurdle...
Dialogue: Here comes the first hurdle...

Original: Cloud: Not much of one.
Dialogue: Not much of one.

Original: Tifa: I know, I know. But that doesn't mean I don't have butterflies in my stomach.
Dialogue: I know, I know. But that doesn't mean I don't have butterflies in my stomach.
