Original: Tifa: Hey, would you mind keeping an eye on things the next car over? I'm worried there might be trouble.
Dialogue: Hey, would you mind keeping an eye on things the next car over? I'm worried there might be trouble.

Original: Cloud: Why's that?
Dialogue: Why's that?

Original: Tifa: Barret's always on edge before missions, but you know he's a good guy underneath it all. The people on this train don't.
Dialogue: Barret's always on edge before missions, but you know he's a good guy underneath it all. The people on this train don't.

Original: Cloud: He'll be fine.
Dialogue: He'll be fine.

Original: Tifa: Maybe...but I won't be until I know for sure.
Dialogue: Maybe...but I won't be until I know for sure.

Original: Cloud: (sighs) Be right back.
Dialogue: (sighs) Be right back.

Original: Tifa: Thanks.
Dialogue: Thanks.

Original: Shinra Middle Manager: So do youstillsupport those terrorists? Avalanche is a blight on Midgar. Their bomb threat has thrown our offices into chaos, let alone the reactor itself. It's total insanity! But we won't lose heart! No! Everyone at Shinra agrees. The reactor will stay online!
Dialogue: So do you still support those terrorists? Avalanche is a blight on Midgar. Their bomb threat has thrown our offices into chaos, let alone the reactor itself. It's total insanity! But we won't lose heart! No! Everyone at Shinra agrees. The reactor will stay online!

Original: Barret: Heh. Is that right?
Dialogue: Heh. Is that right?

Original: Shinra Middle Manager: What? You got a problem with that?
Dialogue: What? You got a problem with that?

Original: Barret: Do I have aproblemwith that? Oh, you can bet
Dialogue: Do I have a problem with that? Oh, you can bet—

Original: Cloud: He doesn't.
Dialogue: He doesn't.

Original: Barret: Hmph. Asshole...
Dialogue: Hmph. Asshole...

Original: Cloud: You know you're better than that.
Dialogue: You know you're better than that.

Original: Barret: (hums "Victory Fanfare")
Dialogue: (hums "Victory Fanfare")

Original: Announcement: Emergency ID scan in progress.
Dialogue: Emergency ID scan in progress.

Original: Tifa: No way!
Dialogue: No way!

Original: Announcemnet: Unauthorized IDs detected. Threat level: critical. Inspection and containment sweep initiated, commencing at the rear of the train.
Dialogue: Unauthorized IDs detected. Threat level critical. Inspection and containment sweep initiated, commencing at the rear of the train.

Original: Tifa: Not good!
Dialogue: Not good!

Original: Barret: Get over here! Now!
Dialogue: Get over here! Now!

Original: Passenger: What the hell!?
Dialogue: What the hell—!?

Original: Tifa: Take care of them, Cloud!
Dialogue: Take care of them, Cloud!

Original: Cloud: On it.
Dialogue: On it.

Original: Annoincement: Lockdown protocol initiated. This train car will enter lockdown in three minutes.
Dialogue: Lockdown protocol initiated. This train car will enter lockdown in three minutes.

Original: Tifa: You have to get to the next car!
Dialogue: You have to get to the next car!

Original: Barret: Keep moving, people!
Dialogue: Keep moving, people!

Original: NPC: Whadda we do!?
Dialogue: Whadda we do!?

Original: Barret: Get to car two!
Dialogue: Get to car two!

Original: NPC: I...I can't...
Dialogue: I...I can't...

Original: Barret: You wanna survive this? Then move!
Dialogue: You wanna survive this? Then move!

Original: NPC: Y-y-yessir!
Dialogue: Y-y-yessir!

Original: Tifa: Cloud!
Dialogue: Cloud!

Original: Barret: Move it!
Dialogue: Move it!

Original: Announcement: Lockdown protocol initiated. This train will enter lockdown shortly.
Dialogue: Lockdown protocol initiated. This train will enter lockdown shortly.

Original: Announcement: Lockdown complete. One unauthorized passenger detained. Inspection will continue until all unauthorized passengers are detained.
Dialogue: Lockdown complete. One unauthorized passenger detained. Inspection will continue until all unauthorized passengers are detained.

Original: Cloud: Dammit.
Dialogue: Dammit.

Original: Tifa: Just go! How many are there!?
Dialogue: Just go! How many are there!?

Original: Announcement: Three unauthorized passengers successfully contained. Neutralizing threat.
Dialogue: Three unauthorized passengers successfully contained. Neutralizing threat.

Original: Barret: We gotta jump...
Dialogue: We gotta jump...

Original: On-screen: Corkscrew Tunnel
Dialogue: Corkscrew Tunnel

Original: Cloud: Tifa... Barret...
Dialogue: Tifa... Barret...

Original: Tifa: Please! You have to get out of here!
Dialogue: Please! You have to get out of here!

Original: Shinra Middle Manager: Whwhat are you doing!?
Dialogue: Wh—what are you doing!?

Original: Tifa: Trying to keep you alive.
Dialogue: Trying to keep you alive.

Original: Shinra Middle Manager: But I work for Shinra. I'm the enemy.
Dialogue: But I work for Shinra. I'm the enemy.

Original: Tifa: I don't care. I don't want anyone to die. Please!
Dialogue: I don't care. I don't want anyone to die. Please!

Original: Shinra Middle Manager: I'll look after the others.
Dialogue: I'll look after the others.

Original: Tifa: My turn!
Dialogue: My turn!

Original: Cloud: There's no end to them...
Dialogue: There's no end to them...

Original: Announcement: Three unauthorized passengers successfully contained. Neutralizing threat.
Dialogue: Three unauthorized passengers successfully contained. Neutralizing threat.

Original: Barret: Looks like you're right, SOLDIER boy.
Dialogue: Looks like you're right, SOLDIER boy.

Original: Cloud: Screw this.
Dialogue: Screw this.

Original: Barret: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Cloud: The station will be crawling with security. We gotta jump.
Dialogue: The station will be crawling with security. We gotta jump.

Original: Barret: Screwthat!
Dialogue: Screw that!

Original: Cloud: Need to slow the train down.
Dialogue: Need to slow the train down.

Original: Barret: Sounds like a Biggs plan E.
Dialogue: Sounds like a Biggs plan E.

Original: Barret: Okay, y'all watch and learn. I'm gonna jump. Gonna do it. Gonna show you how it's done!
Dialogue: Okay, y'all watch and learn. I'm gonna jump. Gonna do it. Gonna show you how it's done!

Original: Cloud: Tifa!
Dialogue: Tifa!

Original: On-screen: Corkscrew Tunnel.
Dialogue: Corkscrew Tunnel.

Original: Cloud: You okay?
Dialogue: You okay?

Original: Tifa: Yeah...
Dialogue: Yeah...

Original: Cloud: Alright, you ready?
Dialogue: Alright, you ready?

Original: Tifa: Ready.
Dialogue: Ready.

Original: Barret (in the distance): Ha ha ha!
Dialogue: Ha ha ha!

Original: Tifa: That's gotta be him!
Dialogue: That's gotta be him!

Original: Tifa: Hey, thanks. For when we jumped from the train, I mean.
Dialogue: Hey, thanks. For when we jumped from the train, I mean.

Original: Cloud: No biggie. You're pretty light, you know.
Dialogue: No biggie. You're pretty light, you know.

Original: Tifa: You always know what to say.
Dialogue: You always know what to say.

Original: Barret (in the distance): Ha ha ha!
Dialogue: Ha ha ha!

Original: Cloud: Where are they?
Dialogue: Where are they?

Original: Cloud: Tifa!
Dialogue: Tifa!

Original: Tifa: They just won't quit!
Dialogue: They just won't quit!

Original: Barret (in the distance): Ha ha ha!
Dialogue: Ha ha ha!

Original: Tifa: Whew! Thanks for the assist!
Dialogue: Whew! Thanks for the assist!

Original: Cloud: Glad to see you're okay. Sowhere's Barret?
Dialogue: Glad to see you're okay. So—where's Barret?

Original: Tifa: Somewhere over there, I think.
Dialogue: Somewhere over there, I think.

Original: Tifa: After Barret jumped, I knew I had to go right after, but...
Dialogue: After Barret jumped, I knew I had to go right after, but...

Original: Cloud: Don't worry about it.
Dialogue: Don't worry about it.

Original: Tifa: Cool as ever, I see.
Dialogue: Cool as ever, I see.

Original: Cloud: If I wasn't, they would've never made me a SOLDIER.
Dialogue: If I wasn't, they would've never made me a SOLDIER.

Original: Tifa: Good point.
Dialogue: Good point.

Original: Heidegger: (laughs) Well done, well done! I felt sure we had them, didn't you?
Dialogue: (laughs) Well done, well done! I felt sure we had them, didn't you?

Original: Subordinate: Sir!
Dialogue: Sir!

Original: Heidegger: Born survivors, these sewer rats. Speaking of which, where's the third?
Dialogue: Born survivors, these sewer rats. Speaking of which, where's the third?

Original: Subordinate: In custody, sir.
Dialogue: In custody, sir.

Original: Heidegger: Return it to the wild.
Dialogue: Return it to the wild.

Original: Subordinate: Yessir! Right away!
Dialogue: Yessir! Right away!

Original: On-screen: Corkscrew Tunnel - Section C
Dialogue: Corkscrew Tunnel - Section C

Original: Security Officer: It's them! We have a visual on the targets! Requesting immediate assistance!
Dialogue: It's them! We have a visual on the targets! Requesting immediate assistance!

Original: Tifa: He's close! Come on!
Dialogue: He's close! Come on!

Original: Tifa: There! Barret!
Dialogue: There! Barret!

Original: Barret: Tifa! Could use some help here!
Dialogue: Tifa! Could use some help here!

Original: Tifa: We're coming!
Dialogue: We're coming!

Original: Barret: Make it quick! Should be some stairs over there!
Dialogue: Make it quick! Should be some stairs over there!

Original: Tifa: We'd better hurry.
Dialogue: We'd better hurry.

Original: Cloud: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Barret: I've had it up to here with you damn robo-bugs! I'm gonna rip off those spindly legs of yours one by one!
Dialogue: I've had it up to here with you damn robo-bugs! I'm gonna rip off those spindly legs of yours one by one!

Original: Barret: I ain't going down without a fight!
Dialogue: I ain't going down without a fight!

Original: Tifa: That doesn't sound good!
Dialogue: That doesn't sound good!

Original: Cloud: Let's go.
Dialogue: Let's go.

Original: Tifa: Barret!
Dialogue: Barret!

Original: Barret: Great! Gimme a hand!
Dialogue: Great! Gimme a hand!

Original: Grenadier: Confirmed! It's the three who jumped from the train! Don't let any of them escape!
Dialogue: Confirmed! It's the three who jumped from the train! Don't let any of them escape!

Original: Barret: This calls for a song! Duhn-duhn-duhn-duhn, duhn duhn,duhn-da-duhn!
Dialogue: This calls for a song! Duhn-duhn-duhn-duhn, duhn duhn, duhn-da-duhn!

Original: Tifa: That's gotta be the last of them...right?
Dialogue: That's gotta be the last of them...right?

Original: Barret: Aw, who cares? We can take 'em! Now let's confirm our position and get back on mission! That reactor's waiting!
Dialogue: Aw, who cares? We can take 'em! Now let's confirm our position and get back on mission! That reactor's waiting!

Original: Barret: Looks like it's gonna be plan E.
Dialogue: Looks like it's gonna be plan E.

Original: Cloud: Go on.
Dialogue: Go on.

Original: Barret: Plan A was if everything went off without a stitch. From the station, it would've been a straight shot to the reactor. Didn't work out, but we knew going in we had to have alternatives. Backup plans, 'case we had to get off early.
Dialogue: Plan A was if everything went off without a stitch. From the station, it would've been a straight shot to the reactor. Didn't work out, but we knew going in we had to have alternatives. Backup plans, 'case we had to get off early.

Original: Barret: From closer in to further outB, C, D, and so on.
Dialogue: From closer in to further out—B, C, D, and so on.

Original: Cloud: Up to what?
Dialogue: Up to what?

Original: Tifa: ... To E.
Dialogue: ... To E.

Original: Cloud: Lucky us...
Dialogue: Lucky us...

Original: Barret: (laughs) You're damn right!
Dialogue: (laughs) You're damn right!

Original: Tifa: Anyway, we were riding the train between Sector 4 and the main pillar when we had to bail out. And we ended up on the adjacent line, which should take us to Reactor 5.
Dialogue: Anyway, we were riding the train between Sector 4 and the main pillar when we had to bail out. And we ended up on the adjacent line, which should take us to Reactor 5.

Original: Barret: That's right. So for now we follow the tracks. Not too far, though. Need to switch to a different route before we hit the station. 'Cause you can bet your ass it's gonna be crawling with securityall on high alert.
Dialogue: That's right. So for now we follow the tracks. Not too far, though. Need to switch to a different route before we hit the station. 'Cause you can bet your ass it's gonna be crawling with security—all on high alert.

Original: Tifa: Let's move.
Dialogue: Let's move.

Original: Barret: Our friends in Sector 5 marked the route, so don't worry about getting lost. It's a straight shot to victory, people! All we gotta do...istakeit!
Dialogue: Our friends in Sector 5 marked the route, so don't worry about getting lost. It's a straight shot to victory, people! All we gotta do...is take it!

Original: Heidegger: You have nothing to worry about, sir. Preparations for the grand finale are proceeding without incident. I have the utmost confidence that everything will play out as you intended...
Dialogue: You have nothing to worry about, sir. Preparations for the grand finale are proceeding without incident. I have the utmost confidence that everything will play out as you intended...

Original: Heidegger: Yes, of course. I will not fail you, sir.
Dialogue: Yes, of course. I will not fail you, sir.

Original: Subordinate: Sir. Analytics reports that the results fall within the admissible range. However, the casualty rate significantly exceeds previous proje
Dialogue: Sir. Analytics reports that the results fall within the admissible range. However, the casualty rate significantly exceeds previous proje—

Original: Heidegger: (groans) Remind me what your job is. Is it to question the wisdom of your superiors and bemoan your personal hardships?
Dialogue: (groans) Remind me what your job is. Is it to question the wisdom of your superiors and bemoan your personal hardships?

Original: Subordinate: Sir?
Dialogue: Sir?

Original: Heidegger: Casualty rate? You think I care about the casualty rate? They are pawns in a greater game. If your stock runs low, then go round up more for Sector 3 or wherever else. Use your head and bring me solutions instead of problems for a change, yes?
Dialogue: Casualty rate? You think I care about the casualty rate? They are pawns in a greater game. If your stock runs low, then go round up more for Sector 3 or wherever else. Use your head and bring me solutions instead of problems for a change, yes?

Original: Subordinate: Sir!
Dialogue: Sir!

Original: Heidegger: It is so hard to find good help these days. Which is why the president ought to count his blessings. What would he do without me? (laughs)
Dialogue: It is so hard to find good help these days. Which is why the president ought to count his blessings. What would he do without me? (laughs)

Original: On-screen: Corkscrew Tunnel - Section C
Dialogue: Corkscrew Tunnel - Section C

Original: Tifa: The reactor's the other way.
Dialogue: The reactor's the other way.

Original: Barret: You got any sense of direction at all?
Dialogue: You got any sense of direction at all?

Original: Barret: You wanna keep going this way, you best explain yourself.
Dialogue: You wanna keep going this way, you best explain yourself.

Original: Tifa: I think the reactor's in the other direction.
Dialogue: I think the reactor's in the other direction.

Original: Barret: When the time comes, remember: we just gotta follow the nose.
Dialogue: When the time comes, remember we just gotta follow the nose.

Original: Cloud: What?
Dialogue: What?

Original: Tifa: Stamp's nose.
Dialogue: Stamp's nose.

Original: Barret: We look for graffiti, then head in whichever direction its nose points. But pay attention to railway signals too. You see blue lights, you're going the right way.
Dialogue: We look for graffiti, then head in whichever direction its nose points. But pay attention to railway signals too. You see blue lights, you're going the right way.

Original: Barret: Follow the blue lights and we'll reach the reactor.
Dialogue: Follow the blue lights and we'll reach the reactor.

Original: Barret: You gotta check the signals, son. The signals!
Dialogue: You gotta check the signals, son. The signals!

Original: Barret: Biggs is way ahead of us. Jessie was gonna back him up, so it wouldn't surprise me if he needs our help. So let's not keep him waiting.
Dialogue: Biggs is way ahead of us. Jessie was gonna back him up, so it wouldn't surprise me if he needs our help. So let's not keep him waiting.

Original: Tifa: Right.
Dialogue: Right.

Original: Elite Grenadier: You're not going anywhere!
Dialogue: You're not going anywhere!

Original: Barret: There's one.
Dialogue: There's one.

Original: Barret: The hell you off to?
Dialogue: The hell you off to?

Original: Barret: In nose we trust.
Dialogue: In nose we trust.

Original: Tifa: Good things our colleagues put up all that Stamp graffiti. Without it, we'd be lost for sure.
Dialogue: Good things our colleagues put up all that Stamp graffiti. Without it, we'd be lost for sure.

Original: Tifa: What's that?
Dialogue: What's that?

Original: Barret: Nothing good.
Dialogue: Nothing good.

Original: Tifa: Guys...I think it might be a nest!
Dialogue: Guys...I think it might be a nest!

Original: Barret: All kinds of creepy-crawlies make themselves at home in the plate, then get messed up even more by the mako.
Dialogue: All kinds of creepy-crawlies make themselves at home in the plate, then get messed up even more by the mako.

Original: Tifa: Mako did this?
Dialogue: Mako did this?

Original: Barret: No. Not mako. Shinra.
Dialogue: No. Not mako. Shinra.

Original: Barret: What?
Dialogue: What?

Original: Cloud: That black-and-white world of yours.
Dialogue: That black-and-white world of yours.

Original: Barret: Ya like it, huh? You know there's room for one more.
Dialogue: Ya like it, huh? You know there's room for one more.

Original: Cloud: I'll think about it.
Dialogue: I'll think about it.

Original: Barret: That's disgusting!
Dialogue: That's disgusting!

Original: Tifa: More of 'em!?
Dialogue: More of 'em!?

Original: Barret: What is this? A science experiment!?
Dialogue: What is this? A science experiment!?

Original: Barret: What now!?
Dialogue: What now!?

Original: Tifa: It's huge!
Dialogue: It's huge!

Original: Barret: So you must be the queen, huh!?
Dialogue: So you must be the queen, huh!?

Original: Barret: I ain't no exterminator. Why I gotta kill all these nasty-ass bugs?
Dialogue: I ain't no exterminator. Why I gotta kill all these nasty-ass bugs?

Original: Tifa: Those things really creep me out.
Dialogue: Those things really creep me out.

Original: Barret: A train's gonna get derailed by 'em one of these days.
Dialogue: A train's gonna get derailed by 'em one of these days.

Original: Tifa: Shinra should do something.
Dialogue: Shinra should do something.

Original: Barret: After an accident they will.
Dialogue: After an accident they will.

Original: Tifa: When it's too late then.
Dialogue: When it's too late then.

Original: Barret: There's good ol' Stamp. Check his nose.
Dialogue: There's good ol' Stamp. Check his nose.

Original: Tifa: This isn't bad, y'know...
Dialogue: This isn't bad, y'know...

Original: Barret: Yeah, they really captured the essence of corporate propaganda.
Dialogue: Yeah, they really captured the essence of corporate propaganda.

Original: Tifa: Check it out. I guess Shinra's doing something about those monsters after all.
Dialogue: Check it out. I guess Shinra's doing something about those monsters after all.

Original: Barret: Doing a half-assed job looks like.
Dialogue: Doing a half-assed job looks like.

Original: Security Officer: Man, how'd we get such a shit detail?
Dialogue: Man, how'd we get such a shit detail?

Original: Flametrooper: Screw it. Let's just give it a quick once-over and call it a day.
Dialogue: Screw it. Let's just give it a quick once-over and call it a day.

Original: Security Officer: How did you get in here!?
Dialogue: How did you get in here!?

Original: Security Officer: It's those three terrorists from the train!
Dialogue: It's those three terrorists from the train!

Original: Barret: Alright. Let's figure out where the hell we are.
Dialogue: Alright. Let's figure out where the hell we are.

Original: Barret: Where you going!?
Dialogue: Where you going!?

Original: Barret: There's an old rail yard not far from here. What we're looking for's somewhere inside.
Dialogue: There's an old rail yard not far from here. What we're looking for's somewhere inside.

Original: Cloud: And that is...?
Dialogue: And that is...?

Original: Barret: A secret passageway.
Dialogue: A secret passageway.

Original: Subordinate: We've compiled our report on Avalanche's combat capabilities and are
Dialogue: We've compiled our report on Avalanche's combat capabilities and are—

Original: Heidegger: Report, report, report! What good do you think a damn report will do anyone!?
Dialogue: Report, report, report! What good do you think a damn report will do anyone!?

Original: Subordinate: I don't...
Dialogue: I don't...

Original: Heidegger: Have you already forgotten the war with Wutai? An enemy spared is an enemy who will repay your "kindness" with blood. We must crush themthoroughly and completely, without hesitation or mercy! Shinra cannot and will not settle for anything less. Will you!?
Dialogue: Have you already forgotten the war with Wutai? An enemy spared is an enemy who will repay your "kindness" with blood. We must crush them—thoroughly and completely, without hesitation or mercy! Shinra cannot and will not settle for anything less. Will you!?

Original: Subordinate: But...but sir
Dialogue: But...but sir—

Original: Heidegger: If so...I can only assume that you and your men no longer wish to serve in your current positions. Is that correct?
Dialogue: If so...I can only assume that you and your men no longer wish to serve in your current positions. Is that correct?

Original: Subordinate: We'll prepare the prototype in Section E for immediate deployment. Right now, dammit!
Dialogue: We'll prepare the prototype in Section E for immediate deployment. Right now, dammit!

Original: Heidegger: Another day, another victory! How do I do it!? (laughs)
Dialogue: Another day, another victory! How do I do it!? (laughs)

Original: On-screen: Corkscrew Tunnel - Section E
Dialogue: Corkscrew Tunnel - Section E

Original: Barret: Gotta love the irony of Shinra's smarmy lapdog leading the way to its master's destruction.
Dialogue: Gotta love the irony of Shinra's smarmy lapdog leading the way to its master's destruction.

Original: Security Officer: Intruders!
Dialogue: Intruders!

Original: Barret: We're going to the rail yard, remember?
Dialogue: We're going to the rail yard, remember?

Original: Tifa: Just so you know, this way leads to the station, not the rail yard.
Dialogue: Just so you know, this way leads to the station, not the rail yard.

Original: Barret: I told you this ain't the right way!
Dialogue: I told you this ain't the right way!

Original: Tifa: You really don't like Stamp, do you, Barret?
Dialogue: You really don't like Stamp, do you, Barret?

Original: Barret: It's not that I hate him. I hate the fact Shinra took a loyal animal like that and co-opted it for their own self-serving agenda.
Dialogue: It's not that I hate him. I hate the fact Shinra took a loyal animal like that and co-opted it for their own self-serving agenda.

Original: Tifa: Poor old Stamp.
Dialogue: Poor old Stamp.

Original: Barret: Starting to remind me of one Marlene's picture books. The one that's full of nothing but mazes...
Dialogue: Starting to remind me of one Marlene's picture books. The one that's full of nothing but mazes...

Original: Tifa: Think you're making progress and then you hit a wall.
Dialogue: Think you're making progress and then you hit a wall.

Original: Cloud: Knock it down.
Dialogue: Knock it down.

Original: Tifa: You're starting to sound like Barret.
Dialogue: You're starting to sound like Barret.

Original: Cloud: Never mind.
Dialogue: Never mind.

Original: Barret: It's a good plan!
Dialogue: It's a good plan!

Original: On-screen: Corkscrew Tunnel - Rail Yard
Dialogue: Corkscrew Tunnel - Rail Yard

Original: Barret: Hey! Hold up! This way.
Dialogue: Hey! Hold up! This way.

Original: Tifa: Security is a lot tighter than I thought it would be.
Dialogue: Security is a lot tighter than I thought it would be.

Original: Barret: If they wanna stand between us and the rail yard, that's their choice.
Dialogue: If they wanna stand between us and the rail yard, that's their choice.

Original: Flametrooper: Get 'em!
Dialogue: Get 'em!

Original: Flametrooper: You bastards aren't going to get away this time!
Dialogue: You bastards aren't going to get away this time!

Original: Barret: No getting through that gate! Let's take the stairs.
Dialogue: No getting through that gate! Let's take the stairs.

Original: Barret: We should be reaching that secret passage real soon. I knew plan E wouldn't fail us. Shoulda called it "plan excellent"! Whatcha think, Mister Ex-SOLDIER?
Dialogue: We should be reaching that secret passage real soon. I knew plan E wouldn't fail us. Shoulda called it "plan excellent"! Whatcha think, Mister Ex-SOLDIER?

Original: Cloud: Biggs made the plan, right?
Dialogue: Biggs made the plan, right?

Original: Barret: I provided some input.
Dialogue: I provided some input.

Original: Cloud: Hope not too much.
Dialogue: Hope not too much.

Original: Barret: What's that s'posed to mean?
Dialogue: What's that s'posed to mean?

Original: Tifa: Thought this place was abandoned.
Dialogue: Thought this place was abandoned.

Original: Barret: Guess not.
Dialogue: Guess not.

Original: Elite Security Officer: Give it up, assholes, or we'll blow you to hell!
Dialogue: Give it up, assholes, or we'll blow you to hell!

Original: Elite Security Officer: Surrender!
Dialogue: Surrender!

Original: Tifa: So many guards.
Dialogue: So many guards.

Original: Barret: Too many...
Dialogue: Too many...

Original: Barret: Keep looking for faithful little Stamp. He'll lead us to the passageway.
Dialogue: Keep looking for faithful little Stamp. He'll lead us to the passageway.

Original: Cloud: This it?
Dialogue: This it?

Original: Cloud: Get back!
Dialogue: Get back!

Original: Tifa: What the!?
Dialogue: What the—!?

Original: Barret: That all you got!?
Dialogue: That all you got!?

Original: Cloud: Someone's mad.
Dialogue: Someone's mad.

Original: Barret: Take your best shot, asshole!
Dialogue: Take your best shot, asshole!

Original: Cloud: Huh. Looks like an old model.
Dialogue: Huh. Looks like an old model.

Original: Barret: So it's an antique.
Dialogue: So it's an antique.

Original: Cloud: Don't underestimate it. It's slow, but it hits hard.
Dialogue: Don't underestimate it. It's slow, but it hits hard.

Original: Barret: The hell!? Tough bastard.
Dialogue: The hell—!? Tough bastard.

Original: Tifa: What do we do?
Dialogue: What do we do?

Original: Cloud: Aim for its legs. Bring it down.
Dialogue: Aim for its legs. Bring it down.

Original: Barret: I think you've got its attention, Cloud!
Dialogue: I think you've got its attention, Cloud!

Original: Cloud: I'll draw its fire. You two stay on the offensive.
Dialogue: I'll draw its fire. You two stay on the offensive.

Original: Tifa: I think it hates me.
Dialogue: I think it hates me.

Original: Barret: Hah, look at that! It's tough being Mr. Popular.
Dialogue: Hah, look at that! It's tough being Mr. Popular.

Original: Tifa: Not again!
Dialogue: Not again!

Original: Right Front Leg: You crippled the right front leg.
Dialogue: You crippled the right front leg.

Original: Right Rear Leg: You crippled the right rear leg.
Dialogue: You crippled the right rear leg.

Original: Left Front Leg: You crippled the left front leg.
Dialogue: You crippled the left front leg.

Original: Left Rear Leg: You crippled the left rear leg.
Dialogue: You crippled the left rear leg.

Original: Tifa: Hey, see that?
Dialogue: Hey, see that?

Original: Cloud: That's its hearta mako generator.
Dialogue: That's its heart—a mako generator.

Original: Barret: I'm guessin' we aim for that!
Dialogue: I'm guessin' we aim for that!

Original: Tifa: What are those?
Dialogue: What are those?

Original: Cloud: More drones.
Dialogue: More drones.

Original: Tifa: Get out of our way!
Dialogue: Get out of our way!

Original: Cloud: Bastards.
Dialogue: Bastards.

Original: Barret: Damn! Think we gotta take these down first.
Dialogue: Damn! Think we gotta take these down first.

Original: Barret: This is where I shine!
Dialogue: This is where I shine!

Original: Barret: That it!?
Dialogue: That it!?

Original: Tifa: Now what?
Dialogue: Now what?

Original: Cloud: Could be a system error.
Dialogue: Could be a system error.

Original: Barret: Thing's probably busted!
Dialogue: Thing's probably busted!

Original: Barret: What's it doing now?
Dialogue: What's it doing now?

Original: Tifa: I think
Dialogue: I think—

Original: Cloud: Get away from the tracks!
Dialogue: Get away from the tracks!

Original: Cloud: It can electrify the tracks.
Dialogue: It can electrify the tracks.

Original: Cloud: Watch out for the surge!
Dialogue: Watch out for the surge!

Original: Barret: Shit! It's still going!
Dialogue: Shit! It's still going!

Original: Tifa: Now what?
Dialogue: Now what?

Original: Cloud: Destroy the pilot! That'll expose the generator!
Dialogue: Destroy the pilot! That'll expose the generator!

Original: Cloud: All clear.
Dialogue: All clear.

Original: Barret: And stay down!
Dialogue: And stay down!

Original: Cloud: Let's go.
Dialogue: Let's go.

Original: Tifa: Sure.
Dialogue: Sure.

Original: Barret: Alright, this way.
Dialogue: Alright, this way.

Original: Heidegger: This won't do.
Dialogue: This won't do.

Original: Subordinate: Sir, Analytics reports that the feed went down...after an anomaly was registered during the test.
Dialogue: Sir, Analytics reports that the feed went down...after an anomaly was registered during the test.

Original: Heidegger: An "anomaly"? Or an excuse for your failure to properly prepare the armor?
Dialogue: An "anomaly"? Or an excuse for your failure to properly prepare the armor?

Original: Subordinate: N-no sir! All modules were confirmed fully operational! It's far more likelygiven the circumstancesthat the sensors were overloaded.
Dialogue: N-no sir! All modules were confirmed fully operational! It's far more likely—given the circumstances—that the sensors were overloaded.

Original: Heidegger: Is that so?
Dialogue: Is that so?

Original: Subordinate: All the sensors in Section E are...inoperable.
Dialogue: All the sensors in Section E are...inoperable.

Original: Subordinate: The president.
Dialogue: The president.

Original: Heidegger: Yes... Yes... Everything is fine, sir. Better, eventhere's been a development.
Dialogue: Yes... Yes... Everything is fine, sir. Better, even—there's been a development.

Original: Heidegger: Yes... Understood, sir.
Dialogue: Yes... Understood, sir.

Original: Heidegger: We know exactly where they were headed. If the armor is intact, then you'd best determine the nature of this anomaly soon. Should you fail to do so... You will deal with our intruders. Personally.
Dialogue: We know exactly where they were headed. If the armor is intact, then you'd best determine the nature of this anomaly soon. Should you fail to do so... You will deal with our intruders. Personally.

Original: Subordinate: ...Y-yessir.
Dialogue: ...Y-yessir.

Original: Heidegger: Don't worry. I treat my people more than fairly. So don't disappoint me.
Dialogue: Don't worry. I treat my people more than fairly. So don't disappoint me.

Original: Barret: The passage is beyond these shipping containers. Let's slip through 'em.
Dialogue: The passage is beyond these shipping containers. Let's slip through 'em.

Original: Barret: Talk about a tight squeeze...
Dialogue: Talk about a tight squeeze...

Original: Tifa: You okay?
Dialogue: You okay?

Original: Barret: Yeah...
Dialogue: Yeah...

Original: Tifa: So, you bump into any giant robots like that in Reactor 1?
Dialogue: So, you bump into any giant robots like that in Reactor 1?

Original: Barret: Yeah, except the bastard looked like a scorpion! Speaking of which...what would you say that last one looked like?
Dialogue: Yeah, except the bastard looked like a scorpion! Speaking of which...what would you say that last one looked like?

Original: Tifa: Huh? Uh... Well...
Dialogue: Huh? Uh... Well...

Original: Cloud: Looks dead now.
Dialogue: Looks dead now.

Original: On-screen: Service Tunnel
Dialogue: Service Tunnel

Original: Barret: Lo and behold.
Dialogue: Lo and behold.

Original: Barret: All aboard...
Dialogue: All aboard...

Original: Barret: Just so you know...it's not gonna get any easier.
Dialogue: Just so you know...it's not gonna get any easier.

Original: Cloud: When did it ever?
Dialogue: When did it ever?

Original: Barret: Through here and straight on to Reactor 5.
Dialogue: Through here and straight on to Reactor 5.

Original: Tifa: You make it sound so simple...
Dialogue: You make it sound so simple...

Original: Barret: Only 'cause it is. That there's the reactor support pillar.
Dialogue: Only 'cause it is. That there's the reactor support pillar.

Original: Cloud: So what's the plan?
Dialogue: So what's the plan?

Original: Barret: After plan E comes F, G, and then H!
Dialogue: After plan E comes F, G, and then H!

Original: Cloud: Thought E was the last.
Dialogue: Thought E was the last.

Original: Tifa: This here is Section F.
Dialogue: This here is Section F.

Original: Barret: We cut through Section G and head for H.
Dialogue: We cut through Section G and head for H.

Original: Tifa: A cargo platform in H will get us closer to the reactor. Biggs should be somewhere over there.
Dialogue: A cargo platform in H will get us closer to the reactor. Biggs should be somewhere over there.

Original: Tifa: Looks like the sun's going down on Midgar...
Dialogue: Looks like the sun's going down on Midgar...

Original: Barret: Right. Double time! We got a date with a reactor.
Dialogue: Right. Double time! We got a date with a reactor.

Original: On-screen: Sector 4 Plate
Dialogue: Sector 4 Plate

Original: Barret: Nothing but air below us.
Dialogue: Nothing but air below us.

Original: Cloud: Shut up and move.
Dialogue: Shut up and move.

Original: Tifa: Just don't look down, okay?
Dialogue: Just don't look down, okay?

Original: Barret: Easy for you to say.
Dialogue: Easy for you to say.

Original: Barret: Section G's through here, huh?
Dialogue: Section G's through here, huh?

Original: Cloud: This a switch for the lamp?
Dialogue: This a switch for the lamp?

Original: Tifa: This oughta open it.
Dialogue: This oughta open it.

Original: Tifa: No good?
Dialogue: No good?

Original: Cloud: Needs power, I think.
Dialogue: Needs power, I think.

Original: Barret: That looks more like what we need...
Dialogue: That looks more like what we need...

Original: Cloud: Control room.
Dialogue: Control room.

Original: Tifa: Let's check it out.
Dialogue: Let's check it out.

Original: Barret: Hey. You see something over there?
Dialogue: Hey. You see something over there?

Original: Tifa: Maybe the gate didn't budge because there's not enough power to spare?
Dialogue: Maybe the gate didn't budge because there's not enough power to spare?

Original: Barret: Gotta figure this out.
Dialogue: Gotta figure this out.

Original: Tifa: Maybe no one uses that entrance.
Dialogue: Maybe no one uses that entrance.

Original: Barret: I'm getting the feeling no one's come down here for a long time.
Dialogue: I'm getting the feeling no one's come down here for a long time.

Original: Tifa: No "plate inspectors," huh.
Dialogue: No "plate inspectors," huh.

Original: Announcement: Error. Insufficient power.
Dialogue: Error. Insufficient power.

Original: Cloud: Of course.
Dialogue: Of course.

Original: Tifa: Hey guys, look at this. Instructions for dealing with a power shortage.
Dialogue: Hey guys, look at this. Instructions for dealing with a power shortage.

Original: Cloud: Kill the lights, and we free up power for the gate and other stuff.
Dialogue: Kill the lights, and we free up power for the gate and other stuff.

Original: Tifa: "Sun lamps"... You think these are the plate suns? The closest thing we have to the real thing.
Dialogue: "Sun lamps"... You think these are the plate suns? The closest thing we have to the real thing.

Original: Barret: Gotta put out a sun just to open a gate, huh?
Dialogue: Gotta put out a sun just to open a gate, huh?

Original: Tifa: But if we go through with it, the grounders in Sector 4 will suffer...
Dialogue: But if we go through with it, the grounders in Sector 4 will suffer...

Original: Barret: Now or latersun's going out for good once we blow the reactor.
Dialogue: Now or later—sun's going out for good once we blow the reactor.

Original: Tifa: That's true.
Dialogue: That's true.

Original: Cloud: Let's go.
Dialogue: Let's go.

Original: Tifa: All these lamps... You'd think they'd be able to balance the load by now though.
Dialogue: All these lamps... You'd think they'd be able to balance the load by now though.

Original: Barret: Maybe. If the maintenance guys or whoever weren't playing hooky.
Dialogue: Maybe. If the maintenance guys or whoever weren't playing hooky.

Original: Tifa: The lamps are important, but when you think about how much mako it must take to keep them running...
Dialogue: The lamps are important, but when you think about how much mako it must take to keep them running...

Original: Tifa: That's gotta be one. Man, look at the size of it.
Dialogue: That's gotta be one. Man, look at the size of it.

Original: Barret: That a console I see near the top of that ladder? A, uh, pretty tall ladder too.
Dialogue: That a console I see near the top of that ladder? A, uh, pretty tall ladder too.

Original: Cloud: I'll go.
Dialogue: I'll go.

Original: Tifa: Okay. We'll wait down here.
Dialogue: Okay. We'll wait down here.

Original: Console: Emergency power supply confirmed. Disengaging locking mechanisms.
Dialogue: Emergency power supply confirmed. Disengaging locking mechanisms.

Original: Barret: Okay! That's that.
Dialogue: Okay! That's that.

Original: Tifa: Great job, Cloud!
Dialogue: Great job, Cloud!

Original: Barret: Next stop: Section G!
Dialogue: Next stop Section G!

Original: Tifa: Yep! And after that, Reactor 5!
Dialogue: Yep! And after that, Reactor 5!

Original: Tifa: Not again...
Dialogue: Not again...

Original: Barret: Great. I'm sure those things'll welcome us just as warmly as before. Tell you what, the rot runs deep in this damn pizza.
Dialogue: Great. I'm sure those things'll welcome us just as warmly as before. Tell you what, the rot runs deep in this damn pizza.

Original: On-screen: Section G - Middle Level
Dialogue: Section G - Middle Level

Original: Barret: Don't mind us, y'alljust passing through!
Dialogue: Don't mind us, y'all—just passing through!

Original: Cloud: If only.
Dialogue: If only.

Original: Cloud: No way to cross that.
Dialogue: No way to cross that.

Original: Tifa: Gotta go where the catwalks take us.
Dialogue: Gotta go where the catwalks take us.

Original: Tifa: They busted?
Dialogue: They busted?

Original: Cloud: Powered down, is my guess.
Dialogue: Powered down, is my guess.

Original: Barret: Lucky us, am I right? One less thing for us to worry about.
Dialogue: Lucky us, am I right? One less thing for us to worry about.

Original: Barret: Filling the air that we gotta breathe with their shit.
Dialogue: Filling the air that we gotta breathe with their shit.

Original: Tifa: Monsters sure seem to like it. What's up with that?
Dialogue: Monsters sure seem to like it. What's up with that?

Original: Barret: It's like in the tunnels. They get twisted by the mako. But it all goes back to Shinra.
Dialogue: It's like in the tunnels. They get twisted by the mako. But it all goes back to Shinra.

Original: On-screen: Section G - Lower Level
Dialogue: Section G - Lower Level

Original: Barret: You know the best way to not get lost is to believe that you're not. Mind over matter.
Dialogue: You know the best way to not get lost is to believe that you're not. Mind over matter.

Original: Tifa: Isn't that from one of Marlene's books?
Dialogue: Isn't that from one of Marlene's books?

Original: Barret: Yup, one of her favorites! Loves it when I read it to her before bedtime, doing all the voices.
Dialogue: Yup, one of her favorites! Loves it when I read it to her before bedtime, doing all the voices.

Original: Tifa: "Life in the Endless Maze," am I right? (chuckles) I remember.
Dialogue: "Life in the Endless Maze," am I right? (chuckles) I remember.

Original: Tifa: You okay?
Dialogue: You okay?

Original: Cloud: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Barret: Hah. Going for that materia, weren't you?
Dialogue: Hah. Going for that materia, weren't you?

Original: Tifa: So close, and yet so far. This path's no good now.
Dialogue: So close, and yet so far. This path's no good now.

Original: Barret: I'm sure there's another way to get there.
Dialogue: I'm sure there's another way to get there.

Original: Tifa: Hm... Nothing we can do but search.
Dialogue: Hm... Nothing we can do but search.

Original: Barret: And when we find it, we can finally snag that materia.
Dialogue: And when we find it, we can finally snag that materia.

Original: On-screen: Section G - Upper Level
Dialogue: Section G - Upper Level

Original: Tifa: Hey, let's take a moment to get our bearings.
Dialogue: Hey, let's take a moment to get our bearings.

Original: Barret: We're still in G, right?
Dialogue: We're still in G, right?

Original: Tifa: Yeah. And to reach Mako Reactor 5, we need to go through Section H.
Dialogue: Yeah. And to reach Mako Reactor 5, we need to go through Section H.

Original: Cloud: Okay.
Dialogue: Okay.

Original: Tifa: Unfortunately, I didn't spot a connecting catwalk to Section H. Did you?
Dialogue: Unfortunately, I didn't spot a connecting catwalk to Section H. Did you?

Original: Barret: Well, we can always do another lap.
Dialogue: Well, we can always do another lap.

Original: Cloud: Go for ten, why don'tcha.
Dialogue: Go for ten, why don'tcha.

Original: Tifa: The only other route that I can think of would be...
Dialogue: The only other route that I can think of would be...

Original: Cloud: Along the wall.
Dialogue: Along the wall.

Original: Tifa: Up for giving it a try? It might not work out, but it's the only idea I've got.
Dialogue: Up for giving it a try? It might not work out, but it's the only idea I've got.

Original: Cloud: It's not a bad one.
Dialogue: It's not a bad one.

Original: Barret: So we're shooting for those giant fans over there? Okay. At least we've got a clear landmark to guide us.
Dialogue: So we're shooting for those giant fans over there? Okay. At least we've got a clear landmark to guide us.

Original: Tifa: Those ventilation fans?
Dialogue: Those ventilation fans?

Original: Barret: Keeping the plate's air clean by pushing the smog into the slums. Whole system's designed to make shit roll downhill faster.
Dialogue: Keeping the plate's air clean by pushing the smog into the slums. Whole system's designed to make shit roll downhill faster.

Original: Tifa: You lost?
Dialogue: You lost?

Original: Tifa: Hey, look! I think we can climb onto that pipe!
Dialogue: Hey, look! I think we can climb onto that pipe!

Original: Cloud: Sure seems that way.
Dialogue: Sure seems that way.

Original: Barret: Dammit.
Dialogue: Dammit.

Original: Barret: I feel no fear...yeah, no fear...no fear...no fear...no fear...no fearlittle fear!
Dialogue: I feel no fear...yeah, no fear...no fear...no fear...no fear...no fear—little fear!

Original: Barret: Hey guys, uh...you know, these fans are really loud and...
Dialogue: Hey guys, uh...you know, these fans are really loud and...

Original: Cloud: You chickening out?
Dialogue: You chickening out?

Original: Barret: Hell no! I'm just worried that your bony ass is gonna get blown off the side and shit!
Dialogue: Hell no! I'm just worried that your bony ass is gonna get blown off the side and shit!

Original: Tifa: Enough. We gotta keep moving.
Dialogue: Enough. We gotta keep moving.

Original: Barret: O-okay then! Follow me!
Dialogue: O-okay then! Follow me!

Original: Barret: No worse than a windy day, huh?
Dialogue: No worse than a windy day, huh?

Original: Tifa: One with a tornado warning maybe. Don't look at the fan! Whatever you do!
Dialogue: One with a tornado warning maybe. Don't look at the fan! Whatever you do!

Original: Barret: Right.
Dialogue: Right.

Original: Tifa: Made it through in one piece.
Dialogue: Made it through in one piece.

Original: Barret: Think that took a couple years off my life. II mean, uh, not really! Couple seconds maybe. Three tops!
Dialogue: Think that took a couple years off my life. I—I mean, uh, not really! Couple seconds maybe. Three tops!

Original: Tifa: Section H is just up ahead! Slow and steady, guys.
Dialogue: Section H is just up ahead! Slow and steady, guys.

Original: Cloud: And that's our objective?
Dialogue: And that's our objective?

Original: Tifa: The cargo platform? Yeah, I'm pretty sure that's the one.
Dialogue: The cargo platform? Yeah, I'm pretty sure that's the one.

Original: Tifa: Hey, what's that behind the fan over there?
Dialogue: Hey, what's that behind the fan over there?

Original: Cloud: Isn't that
Dialogue: Isn't that—

Original: Barret: Hey! Don't be a dumbass! Tifa told you not to look at the fan!
Dialogue: Hey! Don't be a dumbass! Tifa told you not to look at the fan!

Original: On-screen: Section H - Sun Lamp 1
Dialogue: Section H - Sun Lamp 1

Original: Barret: This is it. The cargo platform Biggs was talking about. Let's not keep him waiting.
Dialogue: This is it. The cargo platform Biggs was talking about. Let's not keep him waiting.

Original: Announcement: Error. Insufficient power.
Dialogue: Error. Insufficient power.

Original: Barret: You're kidding me.
Dialogue: You're kidding me.

Original: Cloud: Needs three light's worth, looks like.
Dialogue: Needs three light's worth, looks like.

Original: Tifa: But that's... That's all of them, isn't it?
Dialogue: But that's... That's all of them, isn't it?

Original: Barret: All or nothing...
Dialogue: All or nothing...

Original: Tifa: Let's regroup here if we get lost. Remember the H-01 sign.
Dialogue: Let's regroup here if we get lost. Remember the H-01 sign.

Original: Cloud: Right.
Dialogue: Right.

Original: Barret: Lessee now... Closest light oughta be...
Dialogue: Lessee now... Closest light oughta be...

Original: Cloud: That one.
Dialogue: That one.

Original: Tifa: "By the light of these magnificent lamps... we shall lead our brothers and sisters of the undercity to a brighter future."
Dialogue: "By the light of these magnificent lamps... we shall lead our brothers and sisters of the undercity to a brighter future."

Original: Barret: Say what?
Dialogue: Say what?

Original: Tifa: It's from a speech President Shinra gave talking about the importance of the sun lamps.
Dialogue: It's from a speech President Shinra gave talking about the importance of the sun lamps.

Original: Barret: Brighter future, my ass. Shinra's leading us down a one-way path to darkness and death.
Dialogue: Brighter future, my ass. Shinra's leading us down a one-way path to darkness and death.

Original: Announcement: Error. Insufficient power.
Dialogue: Error. Insufficient power.

Original: Cloud: Gotta power down a sun lamp first.
Dialogue: Gotta power down a sun lamp first.

Original: Tifa: Look! There's the switch.
Dialogue: Look! There's the switch.

Original: Barret: Let's flip it and go.
Dialogue: Let's flip it and go.

Original: Announcement: Rerouting power. Please wait.
Dialogue: Rerouting power. Please wait.

Original: Tifa: That's one down.
Dialogue: That's one down.

Original: Barret: Only two more lights to go.
Dialogue: Only two more lights to go.

Original: Announcement: Reinitializing intrusion prevention system.
Dialogue: Reinitializing intrusion prevention system.

Original: Tifa: "Intrusion prevention"?
Dialogue: "Intrusion prevention"?

Original: Cloud: Back online 'cause of us.
Dialogue: Back online 'cause of us.

Original: Barret: No need to fret, y'all. A few rusted mechs ain't gonna keep us from reaching the reactor.
Dialogue: No need to fret, y'all. A few rusted mechs ain't gonna keep us from reaching the reactor.

Original: Announcement: Intruders detected. Engaging countermeasures.
Dialogue: Intruders detected. Engaging countermeasures.

Original: Cloud: Mid-range turrets, huh?
Dialogue: Mid-range turrets, huh?

Original: Barret: Hey, Cloud! Hang back while I deal with these pests.
Dialogue: Hey, Cloud! Hang back while I deal with these pests.

Original: Tifa: Just made our lives a lot harder.
Dialogue: Just made our lives a lot harder.

Original: Cloud: We restored power to more than just security, remember?
Dialogue: We restored power to more than just security, remember?

Original: Tifa: We can move this catwalk!
Dialogue: We can move this catwalk!

Original: Barret: Think back. Anybody see a connecting catwalk?
Dialogue: Think back. Anybody see a connecting catwalk?

Original: On-screen: Section H - Sun Lamp 2
Dialogue: Section H - Sun Lamp 2

Original: Barret: Which way to the next light?
Dialogue: Which way to the next light?

Original: Tifa: If we can't make sense of this place we're gonna get lost.
Dialogue: If we can't make sense of this place we're gonna get lost.

Original: Barret: Well at least we know where the big-ass things are.
Dialogue: Well at least we know where the big-ass things are.

Original: Barret: And that makes two lights down.
Dialogue: And that makes two lights down.

Original: Tifa: Meaning we've only got one left.
Dialogue: Meaning we've only got one left.

Original: Barret: The end's in sight, y'all!
Dialogue: The end's in sight, y'all!

Original: Cloud: Should be able to climb down from here.
Dialogue: Should be able to climb down from here.

Original: Barret: This'll hold, right?
Dialogue: This'll hold, right?

Original: Cloud: That the Sector 4 slums down there?
Dialogue: That the Sector 4 slums down there?

Original: Tifa: Huh? You wanna check them out sometime? I can show you around.
Dialogue: Huh? You wanna check them out sometime? I can show you around.

Original: Barret: We'll check them out now if we fall!
Dialogue: We'll check them out now if we fall!

Original: Tifa: You think they'll miss those three plate suns?
Dialogue: You think they'll miss those three plate suns?

Original: Barret: I say the real sun's the only one we need! To hell with Shinra and their night-lights.
Dialogue: I say the real sun's the only one we need! To hell with Shinra and their night-lights.

Original: Tifa: We're right back where we started. Hmm... Where was that last light again?
Dialogue: We're right back where we started. Hmm... Where was that last light again?

Original: On-screen: Section H - Sun Lamp 3
Dialogue: Section H - Sun Lamp 3

Original: Tifa: Almost done. It's a shame we had to wander around so much.
Dialogue: Almost done. It's a shame we had to wander around so much.

Original: Barret: Well. No Stamps here to guide us. No Jessie or Wedge to back us up neither.
Dialogue: Well. No Stamps here to guide us. No Jessie or Wedge to back us up neither.

Original: Tifa: Yeah... Speaking of which, what should we tell Biggs? I don't want him to worry.
Dialogue: Yeah... Speaking of which, what should we tell Biggs? I don't want him to worry.

Original: Barret: Uhh, you takin' a detour? Well, aight then.
Dialogue: Uhh, you takin' a detour? Well, aight then.

Original: Barret: If there's no viable path, we'll just have to make one.
Dialogue: If there's no viable path, we'll just have to make one.

Original: Tifa: And that makes three. Enough to finally get our cargo platform moving.
Dialogue: And that makes three. Enough to finally get our cargo platform moving.

Original: Cloud: Better be.
Dialogue: Better be.

Original: Barret: Okay! Let's head on back to the H-01 sign.
Dialogue: Okay! Let's head on back to the H-01 sign.

Original: Tifa: I hope that Jessie's injury isn't anything serious.
Dialogue: I hope that Jessie's injury isn't anything serious.

Original: Barret: The best thing you can do to speed her recovery is to kick Shinra ass in her stead.
Dialogue: The best thing you can do to speed her recovery is to kick Shinra ass in her stead.

Original: Tifa: I know. I know. And Cloud's gotta cover for Wedge too.
Dialogue: I know. I know. And Cloud's gotta cover for Wedge too.

Original: Cloud: When do we link up with Biggs?
Dialogue: When do we link up with Biggs?

Original: Barret: Soon enough, don't you worry.
Dialogue: Soon enough, don't you worry.

Original: Tifa: He knew we might be late, so he came up with a few ways to kill time.
Dialogue: He knew we might be late, so he came up with a few ways to kill time.

Original: Barret: Oughta reach him long before he dies of boredom.
Dialogue: Oughta reach him long before he dies of boredom.

Original: Tifa: And we're back at the cargo platform.
Dialogue: And we're back at the cargo platform.

Original: Barret: Get ready, Mako Reactor 5. We're coming.
Dialogue: Get ready, Mako Reactor 5. We're coming.

Original: Announcement: Auxiliary power supply confirmed. Reactivating cargo platform.
Dialogue: Auxiliary power supply confirmed. Reactivating cargo platform.

Original: Announcement: Cargo platform activated. Awaiting input.
Dialogue: Cargo platform activated. Awaiting input.

Original: Barret: So long, underplate. I hate you too.
Dialogue: So long, underplate. I hate you too.

Original: Announcement: Error. Insufficient power.
Dialogue: Error. Insufficient power.

Original: Tifa: We need to disable a lamp first.
Dialogue: We need to disable a lamp first.

Original: Barret: Where could they be going...? Embarking on an adventure to find some treasure!?
Dialogue: Where could they be going...? Embarking on an adventure to find some treasure!?

Original: Announcement: Ventilation system service mode active. Access maintenance terminal to complete procedure.
Dialogue: Ventilation system service mode active. Access maintenance terminal to complete procedure.

Original: Cloud: Does this control the fans?
Dialogue: Does this control the fans?

Original: Tifa: We stop it?
Dialogue: We stop it?

Original: Announcement: Switching ventilation system to maintenance mode. Please complete the maintenance access procedure within the designated time limit.
Dialogue: Switching ventilation system to maintenance mode. Please complete the maintenance access procedure within the designated time limit.

Original: Barret: Man, what are we even doing?
Dialogue: Man, what are we even doing?

Original: Announcement: Error. Error. Maintenance access procedure not completed within time limit. Reactivating ventilation system.
Dialogue: Error. Error. Maintenance access procedure not completed within time limit. Reactivating ventilation system.

Original: Announcement: Access denied. Ventilation system is currently active.
Dialogue: Access denied. Ventilation system is currently active.

Original: Announcement: Access granted. Disengaging time lock.
Dialogue: Access granted. Disengaging time lock.

Original: Cloud: Okay.
Dialogue: Okay.

Original: Barret: What?
Dialogue: What?

Original: Barret: This is summoning materia!
Dialogue: This is summoning materia!

Original: Tifa: Wow...
Dialogue: Wow...

Original: Barret: What kind of badass will pop outta this one?
Dialogue: What kind of badass will pop outta this one?

Original: Cloud: We'll see.
Dialogue: We'll see.

Original: Tifa: Wonder what the reactor's like.
Dialogue: Wonder what the reactor's like.

Original: Barret: Dark. Dismal. A slaughterhouse where they butcher the planet. Then there's the smell. The mako. Be ready for it.
Dialogue: Dark. Dismal. A slaughterhouse where they butcher the planet. Then there's the smell. The mako. Be ready for it.

Original: Tifa: Right...
Dialogue: Right...

Original: Barret: Hear that, guys? It's the reactor calling us. Beckoning us, saying "Bring it on, Avalanche."
Dialogue: Hear that, guys? It's the reactor calling us. Beckoning us, saying "Bring it on, Avalanche."

Original: Tifa: Even after all that fighting, no one's coming for us?
Dialogue: Even after all that fighting, no one's coming for us?

Original: Cloud: No need. This is Shinra's city. They probably have cameras everywhere.
Dialogue: No need. This is Shinra's city. They probably have cameras everywhere.

Original: Tifa: Why didn't you say something sooner?
Dialogue: Why didn't you say something sooner?

Original: Cloud: Way too late to bail now.
Dialogue: Way too late to bail now.

Original: Barret: It's like walking a tightrope. When you're on it, only two ways off.
Dialogue: It's like walking a tightrope. When you're on it, only two ways off.

Original: Tifa: Better keep my balance.
Dialogue: Better keep my balance.

Original: Cloud: You'd be good at it.
Dialogue: You'd be good at it.

Original: Tifa: I wonder.
Dialogue: I wonder.

Original: On-screen: Interplate Utility Access
Dialogue: Interplate Utility Access

Original: Cloud: Tifa?
Dialogue: Tifa?

Original: Tifa: It's nothing. Just thinking about the next step. Didn't think I'd be this nervous.
Dialogue: It's nothing. Just thinking about the next step. Didn't think I'd be this nervous.

Original: Barret: Some things you never get used to.
Dialogue: Some things you never get used to.

Original: Tifa: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Biggs: Mercy!
Dialogue: Mercy!

Original: Biggs: Wait... Cloud? Where's Jessie and Wedge?
Dialogue: Wait... Cloud? Where's Jessie and Wedge?

Original: Barret: Report.
Dialogue: Report.

Original: Biggs: Topside's going nuts after some terrorists jumped off a train. Nice and quiet here, though. So quiet I had no trouble securing your route into the reactor.
Dialogue: Topside's going nuts after some terrorists jumped off a train. Nice and quiet here, though. So quiet I had no trouble securing your route into the reactor.

Original: Barret: You magnificent son of a bitch, bring it in!
Dialogue: You magnificent son of a bitch, bring it in!

Original: Biggs: Sowhere are the others?
Dialogue: So—where are the others?

Original: Tifa: Jessie got hurt and couldn't make it.
Dialogue: Jessie got hurt and couldn't make it.

Original: Biggs: Bad?
Dialogue: Bad?

Original: Barret: Not so bad she couldn't rope in this guy.
Dialogue: Not so bad she couldn't rope in this guy.

Original: Biggs: Thanks for stepping up.
Dialogue: Thanks for stepping up.

Original: Cloud: It's a jump.
Dialogue: It's a jump.

Original: Biggs: Worked out pretty good, you picking that train you did. While Shinra scours Sector 4... You can waltz right on into Sector 5. It's a bit of a squeeze, but it ought to get you where you need to go.
Dialogue: Worked out pretty good, you picking that train you did. While Shinra scours Sector 4... You can waltz right on into Sector 5. It's a bit of a squeeze, but it ought to get you where you need to go.

Original: Barret: Little dark and foreboding for my taste...
Dialogue: Little dark and foreboding for my taste...

Original: Biggs: Beggars can't be choosers. Ohand you'll be needing your grappling guns, of course. All set?
Dialogue: Beggars can't be choosers. Oh—and you'll be needing your grappling guns, of course. All set?

Original: Barret: Ready to take on the world and then some!
Dialogue: Ready to take on the world and then some!

Original: Tifa: Make sure everyone gets clear, okay?
Dialogue: Make sure everyone gets clear, okay?

Original: Biggs: Will do!
Dialogue: Will do!

Original: Barret: Okay, y'all. Keep these grappling guns close. Secure 'em to your belt or whatever so you don't lose 'em. When we're done, we'll be using these babies to get down safe. All of us.
Dialogue: Okay, y'all. Keep these grappling guns close. Secure 'em to your belt or whatever so you don't lose 'em. When we're done, we'll be using these babies to get down safe. All of us.

Original: Cloud: Got it.
Dialogue: Got it.

Original: Security Officer: More to the left. Left! Hurry it up!
Dialogue: More to the left. Left! Hurry it up!

Original: Security Officer: Fix those lights!
Dialogue: Fix those lights!

Original: NPC: Excuse me, sir. Your tie?
Dialogue: Excuse me, sir. Your tie?

Original: Heidegger: Quickly now. Quickly!
Dialogue: Quickly now. Quickly!

Original: On-screen: Mako Reactor 5 - Interior
Dialogue: Mako Reactor 5 - Interior

Original: Barret: That's it. That's the smell. This place reeks of mako.
Dialogue: That's it. That's the smell. This place reeks of mako.

Original: Tifa: Looks like we made it.
Dialogue: Looks like we made it.

Original: Barret: Layout's the same as Reactor 1?
Dialogue: Layout's the same as Reactor 1?

Original: Cloud: Yeah. We're near mako storage.
Dialogue: Yeah. We're near mako storage.

Original: Barret: Let's move.
Dialogue: Let's move.

Original: Barret: I'm not seeing a way down...
Dialogue: I'm not seeing a way down...

Original: Tifa: Here maybe?
Dialogue: Here maybe?

Original: Barret: Well now! That could work.
Dialogue: Well now! That could work.

Original: Barret: I'm next.
Dialogue: I'm next.

Original: Tifa: Kinda scary, huh?
Dialogue: Kinda scary, huh?

Original: Cloud: S'all in the mind.
Dialogue: S'all in the mind.

Original: Barret: Hey! Check it out. They sic this big boy on us, we'd be screwed six ways from Sunday.
Dialogue: Hey! Check it out. They sic this big boy on us, we'd be screwed six ways from Sunday.

Original: Cloud: Mechanized units like these were designed to take out giant monsters. Probably a new prototype. If they do decide to deploy it, then our best bet would be to run like hell.
Dialogue: Mechanized units like these were designed to take out giant monsters. Probably a new prototype. If they do decide to deploy it, then our best bet would be to run like hell.

Original: Barret: Then let's hope he sleeps through the explosion.
Dialogue: Then let's hope he sleeps through the explosion.

Original: Tifa: Where is everybody?
Dialogue: Where is everybody?

Original: Barret: You mean Shinra? Got spooked and cleared out, is my guess.
Dialogue: You mean Shinra? Got spooked and cleared out, is my guess.

Original: Tifa: Almost there...
Dialogue: Almost there...

Original: Tifa: The smell... It takes me back...
Dialogue: The smell... It takes me back...

Original: Tifa: Guys!
Dialogue: Guys!

Original: Barret: Well, well! What we got here!?
Dialogue: Well, well! What we got here!?

Original: Cloud: Turrets up top.
Dialogue: Turrets up top.

Original: Barret: I can deal with those things!
Dialogue: I can deal with those things!

Original: Tifa: So...it was like this last time?
Dialogue: So...it was like this last time?

Original: Barret: Little more chaoticain't that right?
Dialogue: Little more chaotic—ain't that right?

Original: Cloud: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: On-screen: Sector 5 Reactor - Core
Dialogue: Sector 5 Reactor - Core

Original: Tifa (in flashback): Sephiroth... SOLDIERs... Mako... Shinra...
Dialogue: Sephiroth... SOLDIERs... Mako... Shinra...

Original: Tifa (in flashback): I'm sick of this! I'm sick of all of this!
Dialogue: I'm sick of this! I'm sick of all of this!

Original: Barret: Hey! SOLDIER boy!
Dialogue: Hey! SOLDIER boy!

Original: Cloud: Tifa
Dialogue: Tifa—

Original: Tifa: What?
Dialogue: What?

Original: Cloud: How much time we need?
Dialogue: How much time we need?

Original: Barret: Got all the time in the world. This one comes with a remote detonator.
Dialogue: Got all the time in the world. This one comes with a remote detonator.

Original: Tifa: Courtesy of Jessie.
Dialogue: Courtesy of Jessie.

Original: Barret: We withdraw to a safe distancethen...kaboom!
Dialogue: We withdraw to a safe distance—then...kaboom!

Original: Cloud: "Safe" distance?
Dialogue: "Safe" distance?

Original: Barret: What? No such thing?
Dialogue: What? No such thing?

Original: Barret: We get out the same way we got in. Let's double back.
Dialogue: We get out the same way we got in. Let's double back.

Original: Barret: What theWhere you goin'!?
Dialogue: What the—Where you goin'!?

Original: Cloud: Weirdly perfect timing.
Dialogue: Weirdly perfect timing.

Original: Tifa: Wait a minute. Is someone watching us?
Dialogue: Wait a minute. Is someone watching us?

Original: Heidegger: (laughs) Greetings, my dear sewer rats! As architect of our populace engagement campaign, I, Heidegger, head of Public Security... bid you welcome.
Dialogue: (laughs) Greetings, my dear sewer rats! As architect of our populace engagement campaign, I, Heidegger, head of Public Security... bid you welcome.

Original: Barret: The chief warmonger.
Dialogue: The chief warmonger.

Original: Heidegger: You should be flattered. Right now, you command the undivided attention of every soul in Midgar.
Dialogue: You should be flattered. Right now, you command the undivided attention of every soul in Midgar.

Original: Tifa: What is this!?
Dialogue: What is this!?

Original: Announcer: Breaking news from Mako Reactor 5. Shinra has confirmed the reactor to be the target of the bomb threat issued by the terrorist group Avalanche. Members of the group were observed entering the facility, and security is currently sweeping it for explosive devices. We now go live to the scene...
Dialogue: Breaking news from Mako Reactor 5. Shinra has confirmed the reactor to be the target of the bomb threat issued by the terrorist group Avalanche. Members of the group were observed entering the facility, and security is currently sweeping it for explosive devices. We now go live to the scene...

Original: Reporter: I'm here in the Sector 5 undercity. Having confirmed the terrorists' target... the Shinra Emergency Operations Center has issued an evacuation advisory. Residents are outraged that the tragedy of Mako Reactor 1 was only the first attack... in a campaign of violence.
Dialogue: I'm here in the Sector 5 undercity. Having confirmed the terrorists' target... the Shinra Emergency Operations Center has issued an evacuation advisory. Residents are outraged that the tragedy of Mako Reactor 1 was only the first attack... in a campaign of violence.

Original: NPC: No more bombings! No more bombings!
Dialogue: No more bombings! No more bombings!

Original: Announcer: President Shinra has issued a statement providing assurances that the terrorists will soon be brought to justice.
Dialogue: President Shinra has issued a statement providing assurances that the terrorists will soon be brought to justice.

Original: Heidegger: And so, to a people beset by chaos and uncertainty, we will offer the finest comfort: bread and circus!
Dialogue: And so, to a people beset by chaos and uncertainty, we will offer the finest comfort bread and circus!

Original: Barret: The big boy!
Dialogue: The big boy!

Original: Heidegger: I give you Shinra's latest triumph of technology! The airbuster! Your executioner! (laughs)
Dialogue: I give you Shinra's latest triumph of technology! The airbuster! Your executioner! (laughs)

Original: Subordinate: Engineering on the line. Currently, the airbuster is only sixty percent operational. The estimates were optimistic...
Dialogue: Engineering on the line. Currently, the airbuster is only sixty percent operational. The estimates were optimistic...

Original: Heidegger: I'm on air!
Dialogue: I'm on air!

Original: Heidegger: To the imbecile in charge down thereyou are hereby ordered to seize those intruders and bring them to me!
Dialogue: To the imbecile in charge down there—you are hereby ordered to seize those intruders and bring them to me!

Original: Elite Shock Trooper: Come quietly or there'll be trouble!
Dialogue: Come quietly or there'll be trouble!

Original: Barret: Shhh.
Dialogue: Shhh.

Original: Heidegger: Attention all security forces! I repeatyou are to bring the insurgents to the command center without further delay. What's Engineering's progress on getting that airbuster operational?
Dialogue: Attention all security forces! I repeat—you are to bring the insurgents to the command center without further delay. What's Engineering's progress on getting that airbuster operational?

Original: Heidegger: ...Still only sixty percent!? Bullshit! I swear, if you fail me, I'll throw you off the plate myself! So get it done already!
Dialogue: ...Still only sixty percent!? Bullshit! I swear, if you fail me, I'll throw you off the plate myself! So get it done already!

Original: Barret: Shut the hell up!
Dialogue: Shut the hell up!

Original: Tifa: I don't believe it... We played right into Shinra's hands!
Dialogue: I don't believe it... We played right into Shinra's hands!

Original: Barret: Yeah. And their bullshit news is already peddling their false narrative.
Dialogue: Yeah. And their bullshit news is already peddling their false narrative.

Original: Tifa: So we're screwed.
Dialogue: So we're screwed.

Original: Barret: No no no no no! Hell no! Listen! They wanna turn this into a spectacle? Then I say let's give 'em one! Let's take down Shinra's big-ass mech in front of everybody!
Dialogue: No no no no no! Hell no! Listen! They wanna turn this into a spectacle? Then I say let's give 'em one! Let's take down Shinra's big-ass mech in front of everybody!

Original: Cloud: Okay. I'm sold.
Dialogue: Okay. I'm sold.

Original: On-screen: Mako Reactor 5 - Assembly Plant
Dialogue: Mako Reactor 5 - Assembly Plant

Original: Security Officer (1): You heard the man! Get these components prepped for the airbuster ASAP!
Dialogue: You heard the man! Get these components prepped for the airbuster ASAP!

Original: Security Officer (2): It's ready, sir!
Dialogue: It's ready, sir!

Original: Security Officer (1): Component outbound from B8.
Dialogue: Component outbound from B8.

Original: Engineering Officer: Copy, B8.
Dialogue: Copy, B8.

Original: Security Officer (1): Intruders!
Dialogue: Intruders!

Original: Security Officer (2): Take 'em out!
Dialogue: Take 'em out!

Original: Barret: All clear! Now let's see what these bastards were up to...
Dialogue: All clear! Now let's see what these bastards were up to...

Original: Tifa: Barret, Cloud! Over here!
Dialogue: Barret, Cloud! Over here!

Original: Barret: Huh? Find something?
Dialogue: Huh? Find something?

Original: Cloud: Keycard. Might come in handy.
Dialogue: Keycard. Might come in handy.

Original: Barret: You think!? Nice work!
Dialogue: You think!? Nice work!

Original: Tifa: You really that impatient, Cloud?
Dialogue: You really that impatient, Cloud?

Original: Tifa: It looks like a few of its components are still in transit...
Dialogue: It looks like a few of its components are still in transit...

Original: Barret: (chuckles) We'll see about that.
Dialogue: (chuckles) We'll see about that.

Original: Cloud: Could tamper a little with its loadout...
Dialogue: Could tamper a little with its loadout...

Original: Tifa: And give ourselves an edge?
Dialogue: And give ourselves an edge?

Original: Cloud: There should be a console somewhere...
Dialogue: There should be a console somewhere...

Original: Barret: This the console you talking about?
Dialogue: This the console you talking about?

Original: Barret: Think you can get it to work?
Dialogue: Think you can get it to work?

Original: Cloud: Needs a keycard.
Dialogue: Needs a keycard.

Original: Barret: Well, let's find it then!
Dialogue: Well, let's find it then!

Original: Barret: Try that keycard of yours.
Dialogue: Try that keycard of yours.

Original: Tifa: You find it?
Dialogue: You find it?

Original: Cloud: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Barret: Good job! Now, let's check out that console.
Dialogue: Good job! Now, let's check out that console.

Original: Tifa: "M units," huh? I'm guessing that's some sort of component?
Dialogue: "M units," huh? I'm guessing that's some sort of component?

Original: Cloud: Yep. An enhancement powered by liquefied materia.
Dialogue: Yep. An enhancement powered by liquefied materia.

Original: Barret: Sounds bad.
Dialogue: Sounds bad.

Original: Cloud: Pretty sure I can divert this unit for disposal.
Dialogue: Pretty sure I can divert this unit for disposal.

Original: On-screen: Dispose of an M-unit? (Cost: 1 Keycard)
Dialogue: Dispose of an M-unit? (Cost 1 Keycard)

Original: Barret: What the hell? You got a better plan or something?
Dialogue: What the hell? You got a better plan or something?

Original: Console: M unit flagged for disposal.
Dialogue: M unit flagged for disposal.

Original: Tifa: So far so good.
Dialogue: So far so good.

Original: Barret: Right. Let's move!
Dialogue: Right. Let's move!

Original: Tifa: You think they're watching us? Even now?
Dialogue: You think they're watching us? Even now?

Original: Cloud: Yep. Probably got a live feed.
Dialogue: Yep. Probably got a live feed.

Original: Barret: Nothing we can do about it...'cept smile for the folks at home.
Dialogue: Nothing we can do about it...'cept smile for the folks at home.

Original: Security Officer: Component outbound from B7.
Dialogue: Component outbound from B7.

Original: Engineering Officer: Copy. We've lost contact with B8. Send some men to check it out. We've got a schedule to keep!
Dialogue: Copy. We've lost contact with B8. Send some men to check it out. We've got a schedule to keep!

Original: Security Officer: Intruders, size them!
Dialogue: Intruders, size them!

Original: Security Officer: Engineering, this is B7! We've got hostiles! Requesting backup!
Dialogue: Engineering, this is B7! We've got hostiles! Requesting backup!

Original: Engineering Officer: Negative B7, airbuster prep is priority. You're on your own!
Dialogue: Negative B7, airbuster prep is priority. You're on your own!

Original: Security Officer: Then we'll deal with you ourselves!
Dialogue: Then we'll deal with you ourselves!

Original: Tifa: Looks like there's two consoles this time.
Dialogue: Looks like there's two consoles this time.

Original: Barret: Hah! Double the sabotage!
Dialogue: Hah! Double the sabotage!

Original: Cloud:Ifwe can find the keycards.
Dialogue: If we can find the keycards.

Original: Tifa: Any cards?
Dialogue: Any cards?

Original: Cloud: Just the one.
Dialogue: Just the one.

Original: Tifa: Two choices, and only one single-use card... It's up to you, Cloud.
Dialogue: Two choices, and only one single-use card... It's up to you, Cloud.

Original: Barret: Console talks about big bomber shells. You acquainted?
Dialogue: Console talks about big bomber shells. You acquainted?

Original: Cloud: We called 'em BBs. One's enough to blow you to hell and back.
Dialogue: We called 'em BBs. One's enough to blow you to hell and back.

Original: Barret: Could divert them and give it a couple less shots to take out.
Dialogue: Could divert them and give it a couple less shots to take out.

Original: On-screen: Dispose of a big bomber shell? (Cost: 1 Keycard)
Dialogue: Dispose of a big bomber shell? (Cost 1 Keycard)

Original: Console: Big bomber shell flagged for disposal.
Dialogue: Big bomber shell flagged for disposal.

Original: Tifa: What does an "AI programming core" do?
Dialogue: What does an "AI programming core" do?

Original: Cloud: Increases processing power dedicated to motor function computation. Makes it move real quick.
Dialogue: Increases processing power dedicated to motor function computation. Makes it move real quick.

Original: Tifa: A "real quick" giant robot, huh? That doesn't sound good. Anyway, we should weigh our options carefully.
Dialogue: A "real quick" giant robot, huh? That doesn't sound good. Anyway, we should weigh our options carefully.

Original: On-screen: Dispose of a programming core? (Cost: 1 Keycard)
Dialogue: Dispose of a programming core? (Cost 1 Keycard)

Original: Console: Programming core flagged for disposal.
Dialogue: Programming core flagged for disposal.

Original: Tifa: So, where did we send the discarded stuff?
Dialogue: So, where did we send the discarded stuff?

Original: Cloud: To a storeroom for defective equipment, I'm guessing.
Dialogue: To a storeroom for defective equipment, I'm guessing.

Original: Barret: That so... You think these defective shells and programming cores might be valuable enough to warrant a little...detour?
Dialogue: That so... You think these defective shells and programming cores might be valuable enough to warrant a little...detour?

Original: Cloud: Maybe.
Dialogue: Maybe.

Original: Barret: I say we grab 'em.
Dialogue: I say we grab 'em.

Original: Cloud: Hmph. If we get that far.
Dialogue: Hmph. If we get that far.

Original: Barret: Okay! Listen up, y'all! Everything Shinra has told you is a goddamn lie! Mako is the lifeblood of our planet! Those greedy bastards are bleeding it dry! Y'all gotta rise up
Dialogue: Okay! Listen up, y'all! Everything Shinra has told you is a goddamn lie! Mako is the lifeblood of our planet! Those greedy bastards are bleeding it dry! Y'all gotta rise up—

Original: Tifa: Barret!? Who are you talking to?
Dialogue: Barret!? Who are you talking to?

Original: Barret: The people! Put me on TV, I'mma drop some truth!
Dialogue: The people! Put me on TV, I'mma drop some truth!

Original: Cloud: Thousand gil says they cut the sound.
Dialogue: Thousand gil says they cut the sound.

Original: Security Officer: Good to go?
Dialogue: Good to go?

Original: Security Officer: Locked and loaded!
Dialogue: Locked and loaded!

Original: Security Officer: Heads up! We got company!
Dialogue: Heads up! We got company!

Original: Security Officer: Take 'em down!
Dialogue: Take 'em down!

Original: Security Officer: Engineering, this is B6enemy contact! Enemy contact!
Dialogue: Engineering, this is B6—enemy contact! Enemy contact!

Original: Engineering Officer: Shit! We can't afford any more delays. You need to keep those components comingdo whatever it takes!
Dialogue: Shit! We can't afford any more delays. You need to keep those components coming—do whatever it takes!

Original: Security Officer: Solid copy. B6 will hold the line!
Dialogue: Solid copy. B6 will hold the line!

Original: Barret: Piece o' cake!
Dialogue: Piece o' cake!

Original: Tifa: Find any cards?
Dialogue: Find any cards?

Original: Cloud: Only one. And this time we've got three choices...
Dialogue: Only one. And this time we've got three choices...

Original: Tifa: Take your pick.
Dialogue: Take your pick.

Original: Barret: Hell is this?
Dialogue: Hell is this?

Original: Cloud: M unit. Another type of enhancement.
Dialogue: M unit. Another type of enhancement.

Original: Barret: Your call if you wanna nix it.
Dialogue: Your call if you wanna nix it.

Original: Barret: I tell you what, I ain't never looked forward to an execution more in my entire life!
Dialogue: I tell you what, I ain't never looked forward to an execution more in my entire life!

Original: Tifa: You don't say.
Dialogue: You don't say.

Original: Barret: We're about to make fools outta Shinra while the whole damn city's watching! (chuckles) Times like these you gotta savor!
Dialogue: We're about to make fools outta Shinra while the whole damn city's watching! (chuckles) Times like these you gotta savor!

Original: Tifa: Oh noif you're about to ask me to dance, then don't.
Dialogue: Oh no—if you're about to ask me to dance, then don't.

Original: Barret: C'mon, don't be shy! How 'bout you, Cloud?
Dialogue: C'mon, don't be shy! How 'bout you, Cloud?

Original: Cloud: I don't dance.
Dialogue: I don't dance.
