Dialogue: Wassup? How you pretty ladies doin'? Feeling a little light-headed? Well, we can't have that. What say we escort you to the parlor, so you can make yourselves more comfortable?

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): Let's get this show on the road.
Dialogue: Let's get this show on the road.

Original: Aerith: Where...are you...taking us?
Dialogue: Where...are you...taking us?

Original: Corneo Lackey (1): C'mon now. Upsy-daisy...
Dialogue: C'mon now. Upsy-daisy...

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): Hey! Handle with care, asshole!
Dialogue: Hey! Handle with care, asshole!

Original: Corneo Lackey (1): The hell!? You wanna throw down!?
Dialogue: The hell!? You wanna throw down!?

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): They're Corneo's girls...so if ya leave a mark on 'em, you ain't gettin' off with a warning.
Dialogue: They're Corneo's girls...so if ya leave a mark on 'em, you ain't gettin' off with a warning.

Original: Corneo Lackey (1): Yeah, I know.
Dialogue: Yeah, I know.

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): Managed to wrangle some real lookers this time though, know what I'm sayin'?
Dialogue: Managed to wrangle some real lookers this time though, know what I'm sayin'?

Original: Tifa: Hey, can you hear me?
Dialogue: Hey, can you hear me?

Original: Cloud: Tifa!?
Dialogue: Tifa!?

Original: Tifa: Yes...?
Dialogue: Yes...?

Original: Cloud: You okay?
Dialogue: You okay?

Original: Tifa: ...Mm-hmm.
Dialogue: ...Mm-hmm.

Original: Cloud: Good.
Dialogue: Good.

Original: Tifa: Wait a minute. (gasps) Cloud!? Is that you!? Oh my god, that makeup! And that dress!
Dialogue: Wait a minute. (gasps) Cloud!? Is that you!? Oh my god, that makeup! And that dress!

Original: Cloud: Nailed it, I know. Thank you. Moving on.
Dialogue: Nailed it, I know. Thank you. Moving on.

Original: Cloud: You good?
Dialogue: You good?

Original: Aerith: Yeah. Bit woozy, but I'll manage.
Dialogue: Yeah. Bit woozy, but I'll manage.

Original: Aerith: Hey, Tifa. How you doing?
Dialogue: Hey, Tifa. How you doing?

Original: Tifa: Okay...
Dialogue: Okay...

Original: Aerith: Oh rightI'm Aerith. A friend of Cloud's. We were worried and thought we'd come help you out?
Dialogue: Oh right—I'm Aerith. A friend of Cloud's. We were worried and thought we'd come help you out?

Original: Tifa: Thanks...?
Dialogue: Thanks...?

Original: Cloud: Cut the chatter. We gotta leave.
Dialogue: Cut the chatter. We gotta leave.

Original: Tifa: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Cloud: Right now.
Dialogue: Right now.

Original: Tifa: No! Not until I've got what I came for.
Dialogue: No! Not until I've got what I came for.

Original: Cloud: What?
Dialogue: What?

Original: Tifa: So... After we made it back to the slums, some guys came around asking all kinds of questions. So I did some digging...
Dialogue: So... After we made it back to the slums, some guys came around asking all kinds of questions. So I did some digging...

Original: Cloud: And found out they were Corneo's men.
Dialogue: And found out they were Corneo's men.

Original: Tifa: Right. They were interested in Avalanche... But...I couldn't figure out why. So I thought I'd come and ask the man himself.
Dialogue: Right. They were interested in Avalanche... But...I couldn't figure out why. So I thought I'd come and ask the man himself.

Original: Cloud: Seriously?
Dialogue: Seriously?

Original: Tifa: Thought if I could find a way in, and get some one-on-one time... But then I realized I'd only be one of three candidates. And that if he didn't pick me...it would all be for nothing.
Dialogue: Thought if I could find a way in, and get some one-on-one time... But then I realized I'd only be one of three candidates. And that if he didn't pick me...it would all be for nothing.

Original: Aerith: Then your worries are over, aren't they? Because the other two candidates are right here. Right?
Dialogue: Then your worries are over, aren't they? Because the other two candidates are right here. Right?

Original: Cloud: Right...
Dialogue: Right...

Original: Aerith: So yeah! If we're all in on it, then nothing can go wrong!
Dialogue: So yeah! If we're all in on it, then nothing can go wrong!

Original: Tifa: Uh, I guess not...
Dialogue: Uh, I guess not...

Original: Aerith: YoumeCloud. Makes no difference who gets chosen, does it?
Dialogue: You—me—Cloud. Makes no difference who gets chosen, does it?

Original: Tifa: I dunno, Aerith. It feels wrong getting you involved in all this.
Dialogue: I dunno, Aerith. It feels wrong getting you involved in all this.

Original: Cloud: Don't even bother trying to talk her out of it.
Dialogue: Don't even bother trying to talk her out of it.

Original: Aerith: Aww! Cloud gets me! Took you long enough.
Dialogue: Aww! Cloud gets me! Took you long enough.

Original: Cloud: So what happens now?
Dialogue: So what happens now?

Original: Tifa: I think they'll call for us when it's time.
Dialogue: I think they'll call for us when it's time.

Original: Aerith: This room gives me the creeps.
Dialogue: This room gives me the creeps.

Original: Corneo Lackey: Now ladies, listen up. I'm sure you're still feeling a bit woozy, but tonight's audition's about to begin. Head out the door to the left and up the stairs. Come on ladies, let's hustle.
Dialogue: Now ladies, listen up. I'm sure you're still feeling a bit woozy, but tonight's audition's about to begin. Head out the door to the left and up the stairs. Come on ladies, let's hustle.

Original: Cloud: All right guys. Let's do this.
Dialogue: All right guys. Let's do this.

Original: Tifa: (chuckles) Do you want to do this?
Dialogue: (chuckles) Do you want to do this?

Original: Kotch: Okay, my beautiful ladies! Time to line up for the don!
Dialogue: Okay, my beautiful ladies! Time to line up for the don!

Original: Kotch: Wait. You look kinda familiar. We haven't met before, have we?
Dialogue: Wait. You look kinda familiar. We haven't met before, have we?

Original: Kotch: Eh, whatever. Alright! Y'all good to go? Then let's do this thing! Introducing Wall Market's most elegible bachelor... The one and only Don Corneo!
Dialogue: Eh, whatever. Alright! Y'all good to go? Then let's do this thing! Introducing Wall Market's most elegible bachelor... The one and only Don Corneo!

Original: Don Corneo: Ladies!
Dialogue: Ladies!

Original: Don Corneo: Nice. Very nice! Whichever one shall I pick?
Dialogue: Nice. Very nice! Whichever one shall I pick?

Original: Don Corneo: Shall I pick you? Or maybe...you?
Dialogue: Shall I pick you? Or maybe...you?

Original: Don Corneo: Oh yeah! I've got it! I've got it! Today's bride-to-be is...
Dialogue: Oh yeah! I've got it! I've got it! Today's bride-to-be is...

Original: Aerith: "Today's"?
Dialogue: "Today's"?

Original: Kotch: And tomorrow's or the day after'sif the don takes a shine to you.
Dialogue: And tomorrow's or the day after's—if the don takes a shine to you.

Original: Cloud: Pathetic.
Dialogue: Pathetic.

Original: Don Corneo: Huh? Hey, which one of you said that? Was it you?
Dialogue: Huh? Hey, which one of you said that? Was it you?

Original: Don Corneo: Ohhh, you got a mouth on you! I'm gonna enjoy breaking it in! Today's lucky lady is the big-boned girl! (laughs) Still playing hard to get? I can dig it. Oh yeah.
Dialogue: Ohhh, you got a mouth on you! I'm gonna enjoy breaking it in! Today's lucky lady is the big-boned girl! (laughs) Still playing hard to get? I can dig it. Oh yeah.

Original: Don Corneo: The leftovers are all yours.
Dialogue: The leftovers are all yours.

Original: Kotch: Hell yeah! Okay ladies, y'all coming with me.
Dialogue: Hell yeah! Okay ladies, y'all coming with me.

Original: Don Corneo: Don't be shy, little kitten. Shimmy on over and give daddy some sugar! No need to play coy. Nobody here but you and me...
Dialogue: Don't be shy, little kitten. Shimmy on over and give daddy some sugar! No need to play coy. Nobody here but you and me...

Original: Don Corneo: You're even cuter than I thought!
Dialogue: You're even cuter than I thought!

Original: Cloud: Back off.
Dialogue: Back off.

Original: Don Corneo: Ooh! (laughs) This kitten's got claws! Iloveit! (laughs)
Dialogue: Ooh! (laughs) This kitten's got claws! I love it! (laughs)

Original: Cloud: What was that?
Dialogue: What was that?

Original: Don Corneo: Don't you worry your pretty little head. Just a picture to preserve the moment! And to ensure you don't do anythinginappropriatelike say "No"...
Dialogue: Don't you worry your pretty little head. Just a picture to preserve the moment! And to ensure you don't do anything inappropriate like say "No"...

Original: Cloud: Asshole...
Dialogue: Asshole...

Original: Don Corneo: Oh! Praise me more!
Dialogue: Oh! Praise me more!

Original: Kotch: Ayo, fellas, we've got guests! And y'all got first crack at "entertaining" them! Courtesy of the ever-generous Don Corneo himself! Never forgetthe don provides!
Dialogue: Ayo, fellas, we've got guests! And y'all got first crack at "entertaining" them! Courtesy of the ever-generous Don Corneo himself! Never forget—the don provides!

Original: Scotch: Yeah...
Dialogue: Yeah...

Original: Corneo Lackeys: Corneo!
Dialogue: Corneo!

Original: Scotch: So, ladies. Ready to...get to it?
Dialogue: So, ladies. Ready to...get to it?

Original: Aerith: Yeah...I guess I'm good to go whenever. How 'bout you, Tifa?
Dialogue: Yeah...I guess I'm good to go whenever. How 'bout you, Tifa?

Original: Tifa: Mmm...Four guys between us... Okay. Let's not keep Cloud waiting.
Dialogue: Mmm...Four guys between us... Okay. Let's not keep Cloud waiting.

Original: Aerith: Right.
Dialogue: Right.

Original: Scotch: Wait...I know you... The colosseum!
Dialogue: Wait...I know you... The colosseum!

Original: Corneo Lackey: What the hell!?
Dialogue: What the hell!?

Original: Tifa: Get down!
Dialogue: Get down!

Original: Corneo Lackey: Oh, you stupid W-wait!
Dialogue: Oh, you stupid— W-wait!

Original: Tifa: Good job, Aerith!
Dialogue: Good job, Aerith!

Original: Aerith: It was nothing compared to you!
Dialogue: It was nothing compared to you!

Original: Leslie: Andrea filled me in on the situation. I come bearing giftsyour gear. I'll do what I can to clean this up. Just finish the job.
Dialogue: Andrea filled me in on the situation. I come bearing gifts—your gear. I'll do what I can to clean this up. Just finish the job.

Original: Aerith: Thank you!
Dialogue: Thank you!

Original: Aerith: Okay, let's go rescue Cloud.
Dialogue: Okay, let's go rescue Cloud.

Original: Tifa: Corneo's room, right?
Dialogue: Corneo's room, right?

Original: Leslie: Better hurry.
Dialogue: Better hurry.

Original: Corneo Lackey: Man, I'd love to spend some quality time with girls like that. Bet they're going at it right now. Lucky bastard!
Dialogue: Man, I'd love to spend some quality time with girls like that. Bet they're going at it right now. Lucky bastard!

Original: Corneo Lackey (1): What're you doing here?
Dialogue: What're you doing here?

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): Hey! Ain't you two the rejects!?
Dialogue: Hey! Ain't you two the rejects!?

Original: Don Corneo: (laughs) Don't stop! Tell me what a bad boy I am!
Dialogue: (laughs) Don't stop! Tell me what a bad boy I am!

Original: Cloud: You depraved bastard!
Dialogue: You depraved bastard!

Original: Don Corneo: (laughs) Yes! Yes, I am! Here I come, baby! (screams)
Dialogue: (laughs) Yes! Yes, I am! Here I come, baby! (screams)

Original: Don Corneo: Hey! Who the hell gave you permission to do that!? One of you get in here and teach this bitch some manners!
Dialogue: Hey! Who the hell gave you permission to do that!? One of you get in here and teach this bitch some manners!

Original: Tifa: Sorry, but... Your boys had to learn some manners too.
Dialogue: Sorry, but... Your boys had to learn some manners too.

Original: Don Corneo: What the!?
Dialogue: What the—!?

Original: Aerith: Cloud! Your clothes!
Dialogue: Cloud! Your clothes!

Original: Don Corneo: So you're a man, huh? What are you three up to?
Dialogue: So you're a man, huh? What are you three up to?

Original: Tifa:We'llask the questions. Like: why'd you have men in Sector 7 asking about Avalanche?
Dialogue: We'll ask the questions. Like why'd you have men in Sector 7 asking about Avalanche?

Original: Don Corneo: Huh? Dunno what you're talking about.
Dialogue: Huh? Dunno what you're talking about.

Original: Tifa: Don't play dumb with me. Let's try again. Why did you have men in Sector 7 asking about Avalanche? Spill the beans or...
Dialogue: Don't play dumb with me. Let's try again. Why did you have men in Sector 7 asking about Avalanche? Spill the beans or...

Original: Cloud: I'll cut 'em off.
Dialogue: I'll cut 'em off.

Original: Don Corneo: Alright, alright! I'll talk! I'll talk! Some guy with a gun for an armI was paid to find him!
Dialogue: Alright, alright! I'll talk! I'll talk! Some guy with a gun for an arm—I was paid to find him!

Original: Tifa: Paid by who?
Dialogue: Paid by who?

Original: Don Corneo: I can't tell you that! They'd hunt me down like a dog!
Dialogue: I can't tell you that! They'd hunt me down like a dog!

Original: Tifa: Well you better...'cause if you don't...
Dialogue: Well you better...'cause if you don't...

Original: Aerith: I'llrip'em off.
Dialogue: I'll rip 'em off.

Original: Don Corneo: It was the director of Public Security! Heidegger! It was Heidegger!
Dialogue: It was the director of Public Security! Heidegger! It was Heidegger!

Original: Tifa: Shinra!? And what were they planning?
Dialogue: Shinra!? And what were they planning?

Original: Don Corneo: Some things are better left unsaid, ya know!?
Dialogue: Some things are better left unsaid, ya know!?

Original: Aerith: See, I'm not so sure they are. Better keep talking...
Dialogue: See, I'm not so sure they are. Better keep talking...

Original: Tifa: Or I'll smash 'em.
Dialogue: Or I'll smash 'em.

Original: Don Corneo: (squirms, laughs) Heh. Alright, you got me. I could never say no to a sexy girl. Since Avalanche blew up two reactors, Shinra's decided they ought to stamp them out, home base and all. And I mean "stamp out." By targeting the support pillar and blowing it up.
Dialogue: (squirms, laughs) Heh. Alright, you got me. I could never say no to a sexy girl. Since Avalanche blew up two reactors, Shinra's decided they ought to stamp them out, home base and all. And I mean "stamp out." By targeting the support pillar and blowing it up.

Original: Tifa: The pillar?
Dialogue: The pillar?

Original: Don Corneo: Did I stutter? The plate will come crashing down! (mimes explosion noises) It'll be Sector 6 all over again. I'm sure you've been there and seen the wreckage for yourself. So you know exactly what Sector 7's gonna look like!
Dialogue: Did I stutter? The plate will come crashing down! (mimes explosion noises) It'll be Sector 6 all over again. I'm sure you've been there and seen the wreckage for yourself. So you know exactly what Sector 7's gonna look like!

Original: Tifa: They wouldn't...
Dialogue: They wouldn't...

Original: Aerith: Come on, guys! We gotta go!
Dialogue: Come on, guys! We gotta go!

Original: Don Corneo: Before you do!
Dialogue: Before you do!

Original: Cloud: No.
Dialogue: No.

Original: Don Corneo: Please! This won't take long!
Dialogue: Please! This won't take long!

Original: Don Corneo: As everyone knows, villains only divulge their plans in a certain situation. But what is that situation?
Dialogue: As everyone knows, villains only divulge their plans in a certain situation. But what is that situation?

Original: On-screen: What is that situation?
Dialogue: What is that situation?

Original: Cloud: When they're faced with certain death, jackass.
Dialogue: When they're faced with certain death, jackass.

Original: Don Corneo: Not what we were looking for! But you can find it...in the sewers!
Dialogue: Not what we were looking for! But you can find it...in the sewers!

Original: Cloud: When they think they've already won...right?
Dialogue: When they think they've already won...right?

Original: Don Corneo: Ladies and gentlemen, we have ourselves a winner! You get an all-expenses-paid trip...to the sewers.
Dialogue: Ladies and gentlemen, we have ourselves a winner! You get an all-expenses-paid trip...to the sewers.

Original: Cloud: I dunno. When they've lost their minds?
Dialogue: I dunno. When they've lost their minds?

Original: Don Corneo: Close, but no cigar! Your parting gift...is in the sewers!
Dialogue: Close, but no cigar! Your parting gift...is in the sewers!

Original: Don Corneo: Oh, I'm sorry! Time's up! The answer lies...in the sewers!
Dialogue: Oh, I'm sorry! Time's up! The answer lies...in the sewers!

Original: Don Corneo: Hee hee hahaha! Enjoy the sights and smells!
Dialogue: Hee hee hahaha! Enjoy the sights and smells!

Original: President Shinra: Are we on schedule?
Dialogue: Are we on schedule?

Original: Heidegger: (laughs) The Turks are on top of it. Yes, there will be no delays.
Dialogue: (laughs) The Turks are on top of it. Yes, there will be no delays.

Original: Reeve: Please, Mr. President! I am asking you to reconsiderno, begging. The Sector 7 undercity is home to more than 50,000
Dialogue: Please, Mr. President! I am asking you to reconsider—no, begging. The Sector 7 undercity is home to more than 50,000—

Original: President Shinra: (groans) Director Tuesti.
Dialogue: (groans) Director Tuesti.

Original: Reeve: At least let us issue a warning, sir.
Dialogue: At least let us issue a warning, sir.

Original: Heidegger: The stench of the director's cowardice fills the room yet again.
Dialogue: The stench of the director's cowardice fills the room yet again.

Original: President Shinra: Reeve. Progress requires sacrifice. Learn to live with it.
Dialogue: Reeve. Progress requires sacrifice. Learn to live with it.

Original: Cloud: Where in the...?
Dialogue: Where in the...?

Original: On-screen: Sewer System
Dialogue: Sewer System

Original: Cloud: Damn, it reeks.
Dialogue: Damn, it reeks.

Original: Cloud: Tifa?
Dialogue: Tifa?

Original: Tifa: Cloud... We have to get to the slumsright now!
Dialogue: Cloud... We have to get to the slums—right now!

Original: Cloud: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Tifa: I didn't wanna drag Aerith into all this...
Dialogue: I didn't wanna drag Aerith into all this...

Original: Cloud: She'll understand.
Dialogue: She'll understand.

Original: Tifa: How do you two know each other?
Dialogue: How do you two know each other?

Original: Cloud: I saved her, she saved me... Round and round it goes.
Dialogue: I saved her, she saved me... Round and round it goes.

Original: Tifa: And...that's all there is to it? Sure there isn't something else going on?
Dialogue: And...that's all there is to it? Sure there isn't something else going on?

Original: Aerith: Dammit.
Dialogue: Dammit.

Original: Cloud: Aerith.
Dialogue: Aerith.

Original: Aerith: Cloud... We have to get to Sector 7...
Dialogue: Cloud... We have to get to Sector 7...

Original: Cloud: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Tifa: That bastard!
Dialogue: That bastard!

Original: Tifa: You gotta be kidding me!
Dialogue: You gotta be kidding me!

Original: Cloud: Good to go?
Dialogue: Good to go?

Original: Aerith: You bet!
Dialogue: You bet!

Original: Tifa: Bring it on!
Dialogue: Bring it on!

Original: Tifa: There it goes...
Dialogue: There it goes...

Original: Aerith: Do you think it lives down here, or...?
Dialogue: Do you think it lives down here, or...?

Original: Cloud: Was probably Corneo's pet. And we were dinner.
Dialogue: Was probably Corneo's pet. And we were dinner.

Original: Aerith: (mimics Corneo's laugh)
Dialogue: (mimics Corneo's laugh)

Original: Tifa: Hey... You don't believe that crazy story of his, do you? Shinra wouldn't sacrifice a whole sector just to take out Avalanche, would they? Destroying part of the citykilling all those people, just to get at us?
Dialogue: Hey... You don't believe that crazy story of his, do you? Shinra wouldn't sacrifice a whole sector just to take out Avalanche, would they? Destroying part of the city—killing all those people, just to get at us?

Original: Cloud: I dunno... Is Corneo the kind of guy who'd make up shit just to screw with you?
Dialogue: I dunno... Is Corneo the kind of guy who'd make up shit just to screw with you?

Original: Tifa: I wouldn't put it past him.
Dialogue: I wouldn't put it past him.

Original: Aerith: But...if he was telling the truth... And there's still a chance he was, isn't there? Then...we should go. And if it turns out he was lying, then so what? Right?
Dialogue: But...if he was telling the truth... And there's still a chance he was, isn't there? Then...we should go. And if it turns out he was lying, then so what? Right?

Original: Cloud: Tifa!
Dialogue: Tifa!

Original: Tifa: I knew it. These tunnels are all connected.
Dialogue: I knew it. These tunnels are all connected.

Original: Cloud: What is it?
Dialogue: What is it?

Original: Tifa: I'm pretty sure we can use these tunnels to make our way back to Sector 7. The sewers under Sectors 6 and 7 should be connected. "If you get in trouble, just follow the stench."
Dialogue: I'm pretty sure we can use these tunnels to make our way back to Sector 7. The sewers under Sectors 6 and 7 should be connected. "If you get in trouble, just follow the stench."

Original: Cloud: Another one of those lessons?
Dialogue: Another one of those lessons?

Original: Tifa: An Avalanche saying, actually. We use them to move around the undercity. In emergencies.
Dialogue: An Avalanche saying, actually. We use them to move around the undercity. In emergencies.

Original: Cloud: Sure we're not lost?
Dialogue: Sure we're not lost?

Original: Tifa: Positive. There should be a big waterway just up ahead. Let's find that first.
Dialogue: Positive. There should be a big waterway just up ahead. Let's find that first.

Original: Aerith: Ugh, it reeks down here.
Dialogue: Ugh, it reeks down here.

Original: Tifa: Well the undercity isn't exactly the prettiest place, and we're under that so...
Dialogue: Well the undercity isn't exactly the prettiest place, and we're under that so...

Original: Tifa: Is it safe to go through here?
Dialogue: Is it safe to go through here?

Original: Aerith: It's really dark.
Dialogue: It's really dark.

Original: Tifa: I'm sure we'll be fine. Come on.
Dialogue: I'm sure we'll be fine. Come on.

Original: Tifa: Hey, Cloud... Assuming Corneo was telling us the truth... What do you think Shinra's really up to? I mean, they've gotta have an endgame, but I can't imagine what it is. Destroying a whole chunk of the city just to get back at us doesn't make any kind of sense.
Dialogue: Hey, Cloud... Assuming Corneo was telling us the truth... What do you think Shinra's really up to? I mean, they've gotta have an endgame, but I can't imagine what it is. Destroying a whole chunk of the city just to get back at us doesn't make any kind of sense.

Original: Cloud: Yeah. I can't imagine any way they could profit from it. It's gonna cost them a fortune to rebuild.
Dialogue: Yeah. I can't imagine any way they could profit from it. It's gonna cost them a fortune to rebuild.

Original: Tifa: Corneo's lying. He's gotta be. Guys like him do it all the time out of habit.
Dialogue: Corneo's lying. He's gotta be. Guys like him do it all the time out of habit.

Original: Cloud: Locked up tight.
Dialogue: Locked up tight.

Original: Tifa: But not if we used the skeleton key Jessie made.
Dialogue: But not if we used the skeleton key Jessie made.

Original: Aerith: Huh. Does this mean it's in the water?
Dialogue: Huh. Does this mean it's in the water?

Original: Cloud: We'll see.
Dialogue: We'll see.

Original: Cloud: That's a power generator, all right.
Dialogue: That's a power generator, all right.

Original: Aerith: Wow. Talk about ancient.
Dialogue: Wow. Talk about ancient.

Original: Cloud: It's an antiqueolder than the mako reactors even. It'll be a miracle if it still works.
Dialogue: It's an antique—older than the mako reactors even. It'll be a miracle if it still works.

Original: Cloud: This it?
Dialogue: This it?

Original: Aerith: It worked!
Dialogue: It worked!

Original: Tifa: Wait a minute. I know this place. Sector 7 should be just on the other side of this waterway.
Dialogue: Wait a minute. I know this place. Sector 7 should be just on the other side of this waterway.

Original: Cloud: So this is where Sector 6 ends.
Dialogue: So this is where Sector 6 ends.

Original: On-screen: Sewer System - Trunk Line
Dialogue: Sewer System - Trunk Line

Original: Tifa: And where Sector 7 begins. Once we cross over we can start looking for a way back to the surface.
Dialogue: And where Sector 7 begins. Once we cross over we can start looking for a way back to the surface.

Original: Cloud: Might be harder than you think.
Dialogue: Might be harder than you think.

Original: Tifa: Let's just try to make our way down this tunnel. See if we can't use those gates to clear a path. We can do this. We'll figure it out.
Dialogue: Let's just try to make our way down this tunnel. See if we can't use those gates to clear a path. We can do this. We'll figure it out.

Original: Aerith: Yeah, for sure.
Dialogue: Yeah, for sure.

Original: Tifa: All right! Now we should be able to get across.
Dialogue: All right! Now we should be able to get across.

Original: Cloud: I'll go first, okay?
Dialogue: I'll go first, okay?

Original: Tifa: Dammit. I can't stop thinking about what Corneo said.
Dialogue: Dammit. I can't stop thinking about what Corneo said.

Original: Aerith: I know... Me too.
Dialogue: I know... Me too.

Original: Tifa: It's gotta be a trick. There's no way they'd go that far. But... But what if Corneo really was telling the truth...? We have to get there in time to stop it. We have to.
Dialogue: It's gotta be a trick. There's no way they'd go that far. But... But what if Corneo really was telling the truth...? We have to get there in time to stop it. We have to.

Original: Aerith: Right.
Dialogue: Right.

Original: Tifa: Aerith, what are you not telling me?
Dialogue: Aerith, what are you not telling me?

Original: Aerith: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Cloud: Guys! C'mon! We gotta keep moving!
Dialogue: Guys! C'mon! We gotta keep moving!

Original: Tifa: Coming! I'll go first.
Dialogue: Coming! I'll go first.

Original: Tifa: Okay Aerith! Your turn!
Dialogue: Okay Aerith! Your turn!

Original: Aerith: On my way! Here we...go.
Dialogue: On my way! Here we...go.

Original: Tifa: Almost there!
Dialogue: Almost there!

Original: Tifa: Aerith!
Dialogue: Aerith!

Original: Cloud: Jump!
Dialogue: Jump!

Original: Tifa: That was close.
Dialogue: That was close.

Original: Aerith: Thanks. You saved me.
Dialogue: Thanks. You saved me.

Original: Tifa: (chuckles) Least I could do.
Dialogue: (chuckles) Least I could do.

Original: Aerith: Hear that, Cloud?
Dialogue: Hear that, Cloud?

Original: Aerith: C'mon.
Dialogue: C'mon.

Original: Tifa: Focus!
Dialogue: Focus!

Original: Aerith: Still thinking about the plate?
Dialogue: Still thinking about the plate?

Original: Tifa: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Aerith: The future isn't...set in stone. That's what I always tell myself.
Dialogue: The future isn't...set in stone. That's what I always tell myself.

Original: Tifa: Yeah...? I hope you're right.
Dialogue: Yeah...? I hope you're right.

Original: Aerith: How 'bout this, then? Think of something fun. After saving Sector 7, you're gonna...?
Dialogue: How 'bout this, then? Think of something fun. After saving Sector 7, you're gonna...?

Original: Tifa: I'm gonna... Go shoppingtopside! I'll buy... Stuff for the bar! Decorations, coasters...
Dialogue: I'm gonna... Go shopping—topside! I'll buy... Stuff for the bar! Decorations, coasters...

Original: Aerith: Can I come?
Dialogue: Can I come?

Original: Tifa: You'd better!
Dialogue: You'd better!

Original: Aerith: Then it's a date! (both laugh)
Dialogue: Then it's a date! (both laugh)

Original: Tifa: Cloud can carry all our stuff!
Dialogue: Cloud can carry all our stuff!

Original: Aerith: He'll be our pack chocobo!
Dialogue: He'll be our pack chocobo!

Original: Cloud: What was that about me?
Dialogue: What was that about me?

Original: Tifa: Nothing! (chuckles)
Dialogue: Nothing! (chuckles)

Original: Tifa: Huh!? No way!
Dialogue: Huh!? No way!

Original: Aerith: C'mon, Tifa!
Dialogue: C'mon, Tifa!

Original: Aerith: Cloud! Hold on tight!
Dialogue: Cloud! Hold on tight!

Original: Tifa: On three, okay? One, two, three!
Dialogue: On three, okay? One, two, three!

Original: Cloud: Sorry 'bout that.
Dialogue: Sorry 'bout that.

Original: Aerith: No need to be.
Dialogue: No need to be.

Original: Aerith: Look. That must be the way out!
Dialogue: Look. That must be the way out!

Original: On-screen: Sewer System - Primary Treatment
Dialogue: Sewer System - Primary Treatment

Original: Tifa: I wonder. There must be some way we can lower the water level.
Dialogue: I wonder. There must be some way we can lower the water level.

Original: Tifa: Guys, check it out. Seventh Heaven's water tank has something similar. I'm betting we can use this to control the sewage level.
Dialogue: Guys, check it out. Seventh Heaven's water tank has something similar. I'm betting we can use this to control the sewage level.

Original: Aerith: Hey Cloudyou wanna give it a try?
Dialogue: Hey Cloud—you wanna give it a try?

Original: Cloud: This oughta drain the water...right?
Dialogue: This oughta drain the water...right?

Original: Aerith: No luck?
Dialogue: No luck?

Original: Cloud: Must be busted.
Dialogue: Must be busted.

Original: Tifa: A red light indicates a blockage, apparently. We can use the hand pump to clear the blockage. Sounds about right. I remember having to do this at the bar before.
Dialogue: A red light indicates a blockage, apparently. We can use the hand pump to clear the blockage. Sounds about right. I remember having to do this at the bar before.

Original: Cloud: Alright. I'll
Dialogue: Alright. I'll—

Original: Tifa: Aerith, you mind giving me a hand? Cloud, you stay put. Keep an eye out for more red lights.
Dialogue: Aerith, you mind giving me a hand? Cloud, you stay put. Keep an eye out for more red lights.

Original: Cloud: Wait, I'm not sure
Dialogue: Wait, I'm not sure—

Original: Tifa: Trust me. This is the best way to handle it. We'll be back soon.
Dialogue: Trust me. This is the best way to handle it. We'll be back soon.

Original: Tifa: So maybe this is a little different from the one at the bar. More...industrial?
Dialogue: So maybe this is a little different from the one at the bar. More...industrial?

Original: Aerith: Here goes.
Dialogue: Here goes.

Original: Tifa: Spectacular!
Dialogue: Spectacular!

Original: Aerith: That went well.
Dialogue: That went well.

Original: Tifa: Try to stay in sync.
Dialogue: Try to stay in sync.

Original: Tifa: Keep calm.
Dialogue: Keep calm.

Original: Aerith: Coulda gone better...
Dialogue: Coulda gone better...

Original: Tifa: Alright, I think that did it!
Dialogue: Alright, I think that did it!

Original: Aerith: Wonderful!
Dialogue: Wonderful!

Original: Tifa: Okay, let's head back. Cloud's probably getting worried.
Dialogue: Okay, let's head back. Cloud's probably getting worried.

Original: Cloud: Nicely done.
Dialogue: Nicely done.

Original: Tifa: We make a great team.
Dialogue: We make a great team.

Original: Aerith: Go team!
Dialogue: Go team!

Original: Aerith: Sure is nice to go up for a change.
Dialogue: Sure is nice to go up for a change.

Original: Tifa: Hope the pillar's not much further...
Dialogue: Hope the pillar's not much further...

Original: Cloud: Hang back. I'll go on ahead and secure the exit.
Dialogue: Hang back. I'll go on ahead and secure the exit.

Original: Tifa: Cloud!
Dialogue: Cloud!

Original: Tifa: Looks like they're hungry for more.
Dialogue: Looks like they're hungry for more.

Original: Aerith: We're not delicious! Not even a little bit!
Dialogue: We're not delicious! Not even a little bit!

Original: Cloud: Get going.
Dialogue: Get going.

Original: Tifa: Now!
Dialogue: Now!

Original: Aerith: Okay!
Dialogue: Okay!

Original: Cloud: You too!
Dialogue: You too!

Original: Tifa: But there's too many of them!
Dialogue: But there's too many of them!

Original: Cloud: Not for me.
Dialogue: Not for me.

Original: Tifa: Hurry!
Dialogue: Hurry!

Original: Cloud: Last warning! Back off, or die!
Dialogue: Last warning! Back off, or die!

Original: Tifa: Cloud!
Dialogue: Cloud!

Original: Aerith: C'mon!
Dialogue: C'mon!

Original: Rude: ...Understood. The Avalanche mission's been approved. We are to proceed as planned.
Dialogue: ...Understood. The Avalanche mission's been approved. We are to proceed as planned.

Original: Reno: This is bullshit. What the hell are they thinking?
Dialogue: This is bullshit. What the hell are they thinking?

Original: Rude: "Threats to public order are to be summarily put down." This is what we've always done.
Dialogue: "Threats to public order are to be summarily put down." This is what we've always done.

Original: Reno: "Summarily put down."
Dialogue: "Summarily put down."

Original: Reno: Guess it's a little late to grow a conscience. ...Meh.
Dialogue: Guess it's a little late to grow a conscience. ...Meh.

Original: Cloud: Just on patrol.
Dialogue: Just on patrol.

Original: Aerith: Don't worry. We'll make it in time.
Dialogue: Don't worry. We'll make it in time.

Original: On-screen: Train Graveyard
Dialogue: Train Graveyard

Original: Cloud: We could get lost in here.
Dialogue: We could get lost in here.

Original: Tifa: This is the train graveyard all righta real treasure trove of scrap. Sector 7 should be just past that large maintenance facility over there. I vote we stay past the light so we can see where we're going.
Dialogue: This is the train graveyard all right—a real treasure trove of scrap. Sector 7 should be just past that large maintenance facility over there. I vote we stay past the light so we can see where we're going.

Original: Aerith: Dark, dark, everywhere...
Dialogue: Dark, dark, everywhere...

Original: Cloud: That it?
Dialogue: That it?

Original: Aerith: It's deserted...and kinda creepy.
Dialogue: It's deserted...and kinda creepy.

Original: Tifa: People don't come around here often. And not just because of the monsters, but...because of the stories.
Dialogue: People don't come around here often. And not just because of the monsters, but...because of the stories.

Original: Aerith: What kind?
Dialogue: What kind?

Original: Tifa: Everyone seems to think that the train graveyard...is haunted. "Those who lose their way out there in the dark of night will never, ever find their way back home again."
Dialogue: Everyone seems to think that the train graveyard...is haunted. "Those who lose their way out there in the dark of night will never, ever find their way back home again."

Original: Cloud: Is that right?
Dialogue: Is that right?

Original: Tifa: I mean, it's not like I think it's true or anything, but you know...it's just...
Dialogue: I mean, it's not like I think it's true or anything, but you know...it's just...

Original: Cloud: Then let's hurry.
Dialogue: Then let's hurry.

Original: Tifa: Guys, what was that!?
Dialogue: Guys, what was that!?

Original: Tifa: (screams) Don't scare me like that!
Dialogue: (screams) Don't scare me like that!

Original: Tifa: I think I just heard a little kid... Did you guys hear it too?
Dialogue: I think I just heard a little kid... Did you guys hear it too?

Original: Cloud: Why would there be kids out here this late?
Dialogue: Why would there be kids out here this late?

Original: Tifa: What? Then
Dialogue: What? Then—

Original: Tifa: Huh? What is that!?
Dialogue: Huh? What is that!?

Original: Cloud: You okay?
Dialogue: You okay?

Original: Aerith: All good...I think.
Dialogue: All good...I think.

Original: Tifa: Still in one piece here too.
Dialogue: Still in one piece here too.

Original: Tifa: Guys?
Dialogue: Guys?

Original: Cloud: Seriously?
Dialogue: Seriously?

Original: Aerith: "Come on," huh? Well, that's...inviting.
Dialogue: "Come on," huh? Well, that's...inviting.

Original: Cloud: Alright, let's see what's inside.
Dialogue: Alright, let's see what's inside.

Original: Tifa: Well, whaddya think...?
Dialogue: Well, whaddya think...?

Original: Aerith: Hmm... I'm game!
Dialogue: Hmm... I'm game!

Original: Tifa: But...
Dialogue: But...

Original: Aerith: It'll be fine! We've got a bodyguard, don't forget. Mine! Right?
Dialogue: It'll be fine! We've got a bodyguard, don't forget. Mine! Right?

Original: Cloud: Ghosts aren't my thing.
Dialogue: Ghosts aren't my thing.

Original: Tifa: You're just being modest! After you!
Dialogue: You're just being modest! After you!

Original: Cloud: Mind letting me go, then?
Dialogue: Mind letting me go, then?

Original: On-screen: Abandoned Station - Maintenance Facility
Dialogue: Abandoned Station - Maintenance Facility

Original: Tifa: What was that!?
Dialogue: What was that!?

Original: Aerith: Look! Over there!
Dialogue: Look! Over there!

Original: Aerith: Found you. Hey...can we talk? Just for a bit?
Dialogue: Found you. Hey...can we talk? Just for a bit?

Original: Cloud: Get back.
Dialogue: Get back.

Original: Aerith: It's you...
Dialogue: It's you...

Original: Aerith: Don't!
Dialogue: Don't!

Original: Cloud: That thing's dangerous.
Dialogue: That thing's dangerous.

Original: Aerith: I know, but even so...
Dialogue: I know, but even so...

Original: Tifa: What the!?
Dialogue: What the—!?

Original: Cloud: Run!
Dialogue: Run!

Original: Cloud: You okay?
Dialogue: You okay?

Original: Tifa: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Aerith: Thanks, Cloud. You saved us.
Dialogue: Thanks, Cloud. You saved us.

Original: Cloud: Gonna need to find another way through.
Dialogue: Gonna need to find another way through.

Original: Tifa: Wh-what now?
Dialogue: Wh-what now?

Original: ???: This train will be stopping at the Sector 7 slums...and is bound for the train graveyard. The train will depart shortly. Please stand clear of the closing doors.
Dialogue: This train will be stopping at the Sector 7 slums...and is bound for the train graveyard. The train will depart shortly. Please stand clear of the closing doors.

Original: Aerith: That's not funny, you know.
Dialogue: That's not funny, you know.

Original: Cloud: Guess the crane's up there.
Dialogue: Guess the crane's up there.

Original: Cloud: It's not working. There's no power coming through.
Dialogue: It's not working. There's no power coming through.

Original: Aerith: I wonder if this is another prank? Someone might be messing with the power supply to make us run around.
Dialogue: I wonder if this is another prank? Someone might be messing with the power supply to make us run around.

Original: Tifa: Do you think there's...more in here?
Dialogue: Do you think there's...more in here?

Original: Aerith: Looks like.
Dialogue: Looks like.

Original: Aerith: Aha! Found you!
Dialogue: Aha! Found you!

Original: Tifa: I'm pretty sure I saw a door on the other side of this place. I think our only choice might be to find another route.
Dialogue: I'm pretty sure I saw a door on the other side of this place. I think our only choice might be to find another route.

Original: Aerith: Tifa!
Dialogue: Tifa!

Original: Aerith: "Coming to get you"...?
Dialogue: "Coming to get you"...?

Original: Cloud: I don't have time for your shit.
Dialogue: I don't have time for your shit.

Original: Aerith: "That was fun"... All this time, you were waiting for someone to come and play with you.
Dialogue: "That was fun"... All this time, you were waiting for someone to come and play with you.

Original: Cloud: What're you talking about?
Dialogue: What're you talking about?

Original: Cloud: C'mon, let's get back to the crane.
Dialogue: C'mon, let's get back to the crane.

Original: Tifa: "Those who lose their way out there in the dark of night will never, ever find their way back home again." What do you guys think would've happened if they'd caught us?
Dialogue: "Those who lose their way out there in the dark of night will never, ever find their way back home again." What do you guys think would've happened if they'd caught us?

Original: Aerith: I wonder... Maybe they're the ones who were caught.
Dialogue: I wonder... Maybe they're the ones who were caught.

Original: Cloud: Can we just drop the whole
Dialogue: Can we just drop the whole—

Original: Aerith: What if they're trapped here and can't leave?
Dialogue: What if they're trapped here and can't leave?

Original: Tifa: Just like we hoped! What a relief.
Dialogue: Just like we hoped! What a relief.

Original: Aerith: We should be able to get through now.
Dialogue: We should be able to get through now.

Original: Cloud: Let's find out.
Dialogue: Let's find out.

Original: Aerith: We're through!
Dialogue: We're through!

Original: Tifa: Great. Let's head outside.
Dialogue: Great. Let's head outside.

Original: Tifa: Wait.
Dialogue: Wait.

Original: Aerith: A girl?
Dialogue: A girl?

Original: Tifa: Marlene?
Dialogue: Marlene?

Original: Marlene: ...And...the kids that the black wind carries away have to live in the train graveyard forever and ever! So you have to stay far, far away from there!
Dialogue: ...And...the kids that the black wind carries away have to live in the train graveyard forever and ever! So you have to stay far, far away from there!

Original: Tifa (flashback): All right, then. I will.
Dialogue: All right, then. I will.

Original: Marlene: Oh, you know Betty? Yesterday she went with her daddy to...to...
Dialogue: Oh, you know Betty? Yesterday she went with her daddy to...to...

Original: Marlene: When is...Daddy coming back?
Dialogue: When is...Daddy coming back?

Original: Tifa (flashback): Actually...he might not make it home tonight.
Dialogue: Actually...he might not make it home tonight.

Original: Tifa: Marlene, what are you
Dialogue: Marlene, what are you—

Original: Tifa: We can't waste any more time here.
Dialogue: We can't waste any more time here.

Original: Cloud: What was that about?
Dialogue: What was that about?

Original: Tifa: Nothing you need to worry about. Let's get going.
Dialogue: Nothing you need to worry about. Let's get going.

Original: Aerith: It's moving!
Dialogue: It's moving!

Original: Tifa: Maybe now we can get to the other side.
Dialogue: Maybe now we can get to the other side.

Original: Tifa: This path is blocked too? But we're so close, I can see it.
Dialogue: This path is blocked too? But we're so close, I can see it.

Original: Aerith: Hey, do you think these trains might still run?
Dialogue: Hey, do you think these trains might still run?

Original: Cloud: Could give it a try.
Dialogue: Could give it a try.

Original: Cloud: Good call. Looks like it still works.
Dialogue: Good call. Looks like it still works.

Original: Aerith: I knew it!
Dialogue: I knew it!

Original: Tifa: Everybody good?
Dialogue: Everybody good?

Original: Cloud: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Aerith: Huh? I think that's...
Dialogue: Huh? I think that's...

Original: Tseng (radio): Plate separation code is... Got it?
Dialogue: Plate separation code is... Got it?

Original: Reno (radio): Yeah, yeah, of course I do! We can drop the damn thing whenever... It's just that...
Dialogue: Yeah, yeah, of course I do! We can drop the damn thing whenever... It's just that...

Original: Reno: You got a death wish or something? Because I sure as shit don't.
Dialogue: You got a death wish or something? Because I sure as shit don't.

Original: Tseng (radio): Reno, what's happening? Do we have a problem?
Dialogue: Reno, what's happening? Do we have a problem?

Original: Reno: Not really. Small arms fire from some local boys trying to defend the pillar.
Dialogue: Not really. Small arms fire from some local boys trying to defend the pillar.

Original: Tseng (radio): More would-be heroes, huh? Sending reinforcements. The more players that take the stage, the better.
Dialogue: More would-be heroes, huh? Sending reinforcements. The more players that take the stage, the better.

Original: Reno: So that's what we are, huh?
Dialogue: So that's what we are, huh?

Original: Tseng (radio): Contact me when the mission is complete.
Dialogue: Contact me when the mission is complete.

Original: Cloud: Tifa...
Dialogue: Tifa...

Original: Tifa: They're really gonna drop the plate.
Dialogue: They're really gonna drop the plate.

Original: Cloud: They won't if Barret and the others have anything to say about it.
Dialogue: They won't if Barret and the others have anything to say about it.

Original: Aerith: All we can do now is keep moving.
Dialogue: All we can do now is keep moving.

Original: Tifa: Please... Please let us be in time.
Dialogue: Please... Please let us be in time.

Original: Cloud: Why am I not surprised?
Dialogue: Why am I not surprised?

Original: Aerith: Wowwould you look at that!
Dialogue: Wow—would you look at that!

Original: Tifa: Thanks.
Dialogue: Thanks.

Original: Cloud: Let's go.
Dialogue: Let's go.

Original: Tifa: Almost there. Come on!
Dialogue: Almost there. Come on!

Original: Cloud: Right.
Dialogue: Right.

Original: Aerith: Cloud!
Dialogue: Cloud!

Original: Cloud: Aerith!
Dialogue: Aerith!

Original: Marlene (Tifa's memory): The kids that the black wind carries away have to live in the train graveyard forever and ever!
Dialogue: The kids that the black wind carries away have to live in the train graveyard forever and ever!

Original: Aerith: You're just trying to help, aren't you?
Dialogue: You're just trying to help, aren't you?

Original: Aerith: You. You're the one who...
Dialogue: You. You're the one who...

Original: Boy (vision): Are you ready? Well, are ya!?
Dialogue: Are you ready? Well, are ya!?

Original: Boy (vision, 2): I'm ready now!
Dialogue: I'm ready now!

Original: Girl (vision): Me too!
Dialogue: Me too!

Original: Boy (vision): Found you!
Dialogue: Found you!

Original: Girl (vision): No way!
Dialogue: No way!

Original: Boy (vision): We found you!
Dialogue: We found you!

Original: Boy (vision, 2): Aw, you got me.
Dialogue: Aw, you got me.

Original: Boy (vision): Hey, where's Aerith?
Dialogue: Hey, where's Aerith?

Original: Aerith (vision): I'm ready! I'm ready!
Dialogue: I'm ready! I'm ready!

Original: Aerith (vision): I said I'm ready! Come get me!
Dialogue: I said I'm ready! Come get me!

Original: Aerith (vision): I'm right here... (cries)
Dialogue: I'm right here... (cries)

Original: Cloud: Aerith!
Dialogue: Aerith!

Original: Tifa: Hey. We found you.
Dialogue: Hey. We found you.

Original: Aerith: I guess you did.
Dialogue: I guess you did.

Original: Cloud: Let's go.
Dialogue: Let's go.

Original: Tifa: How do we hurt it?
Dialogue: How do we hurt it?

Original: Aerith: Hit it with magic.
Dialogue: Hit it with magic.

Original: Cloud: It'll bounce right off. Gotta deal with the barrier first.
Dialogue: It'll bounce right off. Gotta deal with the barrier first.

Original: Aerith: Cloud!
Dialogue: Cloud!

Original: Tifa: Look out!
Dialogue: Look out!

Original: Tifa: Hold on, guys. We're coming.
Dialogue: Hold on, guys. We're coming.

Original: Tifa: And you...can go to hell!
Dialogue: And you...can go to hell!

Original: Tifa: Let's go.
Dialogue: Let's go.

Original: Cloud: Right.
Dialogue: Right.

Original: Aerith: Right!
Dialogue: Right!

Original: Tifa: It's that ghost...
Dialogue: It's that ghost...

Original: Tifa: Wow...
Dialogue: Wow...

Original: Aerith: So long.
Dialogue: So long.

Original: Tifa: We made it!
Dialogue: We made it!

Original: Shinra Helicopter: Attention, Avalanche! You are surrounded! Stand down and surrender to Public Security immediately! Shinra does not negotiate with terrorists! Resist and we will use lethal force! I repeat: Shinra doesnotnegotiate with terrorists! Resist and we will use lethal force!
Dialogue: Attention, Avalanche! You are surrounded! Stand down and surrender to Public Security immediately! Shinra does not negotiate with terrorists! Resist and we will use lethal force! I repeat Shinra does not negotiate with terrorists! Resist and we will use lethal force!

Original: Barret: Got your lethal force right here, asshole!
Dialogue: Got your lethal force right here, asshole!

Original: Security Officer (1): Stop! I said stop!
Dialogue: Stop! I said stop!

Original: Security Officer (2): Drop the weapon now!
Dialogue: Drop the weapon now!

Original: Avalanche Member: Screw you, you fascist pricks!
Dialogue: Screw you, you fascist pricks!

Original: Tifa: Dropping a whole plate...just like that. No. No way.
Dialogue: Dropping a whole plate...just like that. No. No way.

Original: Aerith: Tifa!
Dialogue: Tifa!

Original: On-screen: Sector 7 Undercity Station
Dialogue: Sector 7 Undercity Station

Original: Aerith: Please! Let us through!
Dialogue: Please! Let us through!

Original: Cloud: What are you!?
Dialogue: What are you!?

Original: Aerith: Cloud, Tifa! We have to get past, whatever it takes!
Dialogue: Cloud, Tifa! We have to get past, whatever it takes!

Original: Tifa: Right!
Dialogue: Right!

Original: Tifa: There's too many!
Dialogue: There's too many!

Original: Cloud: Aerith?
Dialogue: Aerith?

Original: Aerith: Come on!
Dialogue: Come on!

Original: Barret: What you got!? Come on!
Dialogue: What you got!? Come on!

Original: Tifa: That's Barret!
Dialogue: That's Barret!

Original: Cloud & Tifa: Wedge!
Dialogue: Wedge!

Original: Cloud: You okay!?
Dialogue: You okay!?

Original: Wedge: Cloud... It's Shinra! They're trying to take out the pillar!
Dialogue: Cloud... It's Shinra! They're trying to take out the pillar!

Original: Cloud: I know.
Dialogue: I know.

Original: Wedge: I have to go back Barret and the others are still
Dialogue: I have to go back— Barret and the others are still—

Original: Cloud: Stop! Stay with Wedge. I'm going up.
Dialogue: Stop! Stay with Wedge. I'm going up.

Original: Aerith: Sure.
Dialogue: Sure.

Original: Wedge: I'm going too! I can still fight! Biggs, he They were shooting at me and he
Dialogue: I'm going too! I can still fight! Biggs, he— They were shooting at me and he—

Original: Tifa: Wedge, please. Let Cloud handle it.
Dialogue: Wedge, please. Let Cloud handle it.

Original: Aerith: Don't worry. I'll patch him up.
Dialogue: Don't worry. I'll patch him up.

Original: Wedge: Hang on, guys! Help is coming!
Dialogue: Hang on, guys! Help is coming!

Original: Cloud: Wedgelisten to me. Youstay here with them.
Dialogue: Wedge—listen to me. You stay here with them.

Original: Biggs: 'Bout time you showed up, merc. Gotta do my part to clear the path before you steal the show.
Dialogue: Bout time you showed up, merc. Gotta do my part to clear the path before you steal the show.

Original: On-screen: Sector 7 Slums Pillar
Dialogue: Sector 7 Slums Pillar

Original: Security Officer (1): Ah, for the love of... I'm getting sick of this. Don't they have anything better to do?
Dialogue: Ah, for the love of... I'm getting sick of this. Don't they have anything better to do?

Original: Security Officer (2): Tell me about it. You see how hard we got hit over here? Shit. What's wrong with these people?
Dialogue: Tell me about it. You see how hard we got hit over here? Shit. What's wrong with these people?

Original: Security Officer (2): What the? Avalanche!?
Dialogue: What the—? Avalanche!?

Original: Security Officer (1): Hostile contactone target! Engage!
Dialogue: Hostile contact—one target! Engage!

Original: Security Officer: Bastards just keep coming! Don't think you're gonna get away with this!
Dialogue: Bastards just keep coming! Don't think you're gonna get away with this!

Original: Cloud: Biggs!
Dialogue: Biggs!

Original: Biggs: You made it...though...I might not. Hey. Is Wedge...
Dialogue: You made it...though...I might not. Hey. Is Wedge...

Original: Cloud: Don't worry. He'll bounce back.
Dialogue: Don't worry. He'll bounce back.

Original: Biggs: That's...good to hear. Could've used some extra padding myself. (coughs)
Dialogue: That's...good to hear. Could've used some extra padding myself. (coughs)

Original: Cloud: Don't talk.
Dialogue: Don't talk.

Original: Biggs: It's...pretty bad up there. Cloud. Promise me. Don't let it be for nothing.
Dialogue: It's...pretty bad up there. Cloud. Promise me. Don't let it be for nothing.

Original: On-screen: Don't let it be for nothing.
Dialogue: Don't let it be for nothing.

Original: Cloud: I won't.
Dialogue: I won't.

Original: Biggs: You're a good man. Giving me that...that comfort.
Dialogue: You're a good man. Giving me that...that comfort.

Original: Cloud: What about you?
Dialogue: What about you?

Original: Biggs: I've still got some fight left in me. 'Nough for another platoon or two. Don't gotta be a SOLDIER...to make a difference.
Dialogue: I've still got some fight left in me. 'Nough for another platoon or two. Don't gotta be a SOLDIER...to make a difference.

Original: Biggs: Oh. One more thing. The Leaf House. It's an orphanage. In the...Sector 5 slums. The kids...they're great. I used to visit(coughs)
Dialogue: Oh. One more thing. The Leaf House. It's an orphanage. In the...Sector 5 slums. The kids...they're great. I used to visit—(coughs)

Original: Cloud: That, you'll have to do yourself.
Dialogue: That, you'll have to do yourself.

Original: Biggs: Lemme guess...not a fan of kids.
Dialogue: Lemme guess...not a fan of kids.

Original: Cloud: No.
Dialogue: No.

Original: Biggs: But you have...so much in common.
Dialogue: But you have...so much in common.

Original: Biggs: Good luck...Cloud. Our future...is in your hands.
Dialogue: Good luck...Cloud. Our future...is in your hands.

Original: Cloud: This isn't over.
Dialogue: This isn't over.

Original: Helitrooper: ContactL5! Moving to engage!
Dialogue: Contact—L5! Moving to engage!

Original: Helitrooper: Wutai dogs!
Dialogue: Wutai dogs!

Original: Reno: Testing, testing... Attention, Avalanche scum! We know all about your evil plans to destroy the pillar. But the Turksahem! But Shinrathat's uswon't let you get away with it! So go crawl back into whatever hole you crawled out of, or something!
Dialogue: Testing, testing... Attention, Avalanche scum! We know all about your evil plans to destroy the pillar. But the Turks—ahem! But Shinra—that's us—won't let you get away with it! So go crawl back into whatever hole you crawled out of, or something!

Original: Reno: That oughta do it, right?
Dialogue: That oughta do it, right?

Original: Rude: Eh. Good enough.
Dialogue: Eh. Good enough.

Original: Reno: Wait. I know you... Mister "First Class." (chuckles) First-class asshole! Gotcha now! You ain't got nowhere to run!
Dialogue: Wait. I know you... Mister "First Class." (chuckles) First-class asshole! Gotcha now! You ain't got nowhere to run!

Original: Cloud: Not good.
Dialogue: Not good.

Original: Rude: Throw down your weapon and surrender! Shinra does not negotiate with terrorists!
Dialogue: Throw down your weapon and surrender! Shinra does not negotiate with terrorists!

Original: Reno: Man, screw this cheap-ass play.
Dialogue: Man, screw this cheap-ass play.

Original: Tifa: Get down!
Dialogue: Get down!

Original: Aerith: Thank you!
Dialogue: Thank you!

Original: Wedge: That was a close one...
Dialogue: That was a close one...

Original: Aerith: How is it?
Dialogue: How is it?

Original: Wedge: Much better, thanks.
Dialogue: Much better, thanks.

Original: Tifa: I'm sorry. I can't stay hereI have to help them.
Dialogue: I'm sorry. I can't stay here—I have to help them.

Original: Aerith: Go. Follow your heart.
Dialogue: Go. Follow your heart.

Original: Tifa: Aerith. There's a bar in the center of townSeventh Heaven. I need you to
Dialogue: Aerith. There's a bar in the center of town—Seventh Heaven. I need you to—

Original: Aerith: Get Marlene to safety. Right? It's okay. I'll find her.
Dialogue: Get Marlene to safety. Right? It's okay. I'll find her.

Original: Tifa: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Tifa: Can you take her to the bar for me, Wedge?
Dialogue: Can you take her to the bar for me, Wedge?

Original: Wedge: Consider it done! Now get up there and kick Shinra's ass!
Dialogue: Consider it done! Now get up there and kick Shinra's ass!

Original: Wedge: C'monSeventh Heaven is this way!
Dialogue: C'mon—Seventh Heaven is this way!

Original: Aerith: Wedge, wait!
Dialogue: Wedge, wait!

Original: Wedge: You guys can't stay here! Come on, come on!
Dialogue: You guys can't stay here! Come on, come on!

Original: NPC: Hey, let us through! How else're we supposed to get to Wall Market!?
Dialogue: Hey, let us through! How else're we supposed to get to Wall Market!?

Original: Senior Officer: Sir, you need to step away from the gate!
Dialogue: Sir, you need to step away from the gate!

Original: Wedge: You have to open the gate! If you don't let these people through
Dialogue: You have to open the gate! If you don't let these people through—

Original: Senior Officer: Back off! It's not gonna happen!
Dialogue: Back off! It's not gonna happen!

Original: Aerith: Wedge!
Dialogue: Wedge!

Original: Wedge: I'm no goodnot to anyone up there or down here...
Dialogue: I'm no good—not to anyone up there or down here...

Original: Aerith: That's not true, Wedge. Don't give up hope yet! We can still save a lot of lives!
Dialogue: That's not true, Wedge. Don't give up hope yet! We can still save a lot of lives!

Original: Wedge: You don't think we're gonna stop them from dropping the plate, do you? I wanna believe that we can still win somehow.
Dialogue: You don't think we're gonna stop them from dropping the plate, do you? I wanna believe that we can still win somehow.

Original: Aerith: Mm.
Dialogue: Mm.

Original: Wedge: But...something in my gut tells me we're due for a reckoning. Just this...feeling. Know what I mean?
Dialogue: But...something in my gut tells me we're due for a reckoning. Just this...feeling. Know what I mean?

Original: Aerith: Yeah... I do. But...that's no excuse to give up. I don't wanna look back one day...and wish I'd done it different. Right here, right now, I need to know I did everything I could.
Dialogue: Yeah... I do. But...that's no excuse to give up. I don't wanna look back one day...and wish I'd done it different. Right here, right now, I need to know I did everything I could.

Original: Wedge: (screams) I'm not sure what's gonna happen next. But I am sure I don't wanna regret the choices I make tonight. Our lives are in your hands. If you don't open up, we're all gonna die!
Dialogue: (screams) I'm not sure what's gonna happen next. But I am sure I don't wanna regret the choices I make tonight. Our lives are in your hands. If you don't open up, we're all gonna die!

Original: Senior Officer: Close it!
Dialogue: Close it!

Original: New Recruit: No, sir! I will not obey that order!
Dialogue: No, sir! I will not obey that order!

Original: New Recruit: This way, everyone! Quickly, quickly!
Dialogue: This way, everyone! Quickly, quickly!

Original: Senior Officer: You can't just... Wait!
Dialogue: You can't just... Wait!

Original: Aerith: Wedge! Seventh Heaven is just down this road, isn't it?
Dialogue: Wedge! Seventh Heaven is just down this road, isn't it?

Original: Wedge: Head straight and look rightyou can't miss it!
Dialogue: Head straight and look right—you can't miss it!

Original: Aerith: Don't worry about me!
Dialogue: Don't worry about me!

Original: Wedge: Alright, I'll get these people to safety!
Dialogue: Alright, I'll get these people to safety!

Original: New Recruit: This way, everyone! Quickly,quickly!
Dialogue: This way, everyone! Quickly, quickly!

Original: Wedge: There's no time, guys! You've got to get out of Sector 7 as quickly as you can! We'll have a better chance to survive if we work together!
Dialogue: There's no time, guys! You've got to get out of Sector 7 as quickly as you can! We'll have a better chance to survive if we work together!

Original: Aerith: Get out of Sector 7, please! You need to get as far away from Sector 7 as possible! Right now! Go to Sector 5 or 6anywhere but here!
Dialogue: Get out of Sector 7, please! You need to get as far away from Sector 7 as possible! Right now! Go to Sector 5 or 6—anywhere but here!

Original: Aerith: You all have to get out of Sector 7! Now! Please!
Dialogue: You all have to get out of Sector 7! Now! Please!

Original: Marle: Slow down! Do you know what's going on? What do they want with the pillar?
Dialogue: Slow down! Do you know what's going on? What do they want with the pillar?

Original: Aerith: Well, there's still time, but...
Dialogue: Well, there's still time, but...

Original: Marle: They're going to drop the plate on us?
Dialogue: They're going to drop the plate on us?

Original: Aerith: Yes.
Dialogue: Yes.

Original: Neighborhood Watch Member (1): Those sons of bitches!
Dialogue: Those sons of bitches!

Original: Neighborhood Watch Member (2): What good do they think that'll do!?
Dialogue: What good do they think that'll do!?

Original: Marle: Feel free to cry about it later! Right now, we need to get everyone to safety.
Dialogue: Feel free to cry about it later! Right now, we need to get everyone to safety.

Original: Neighborhood Watch Member (1): Waitthe watch should clear the roads first!
Dialogue: Wait—the watch should clear the roads first!

Original: Marle: Ah, good thinking! Hop to it!
Dialogue: Ah, good thinking! Hop to it!

Original: Marle: Avalanche, I take it?
Dialogue: Avalanche, I take it?

Original: Aerith: Just a friend.
Dialogue: Just a friend.

Original: Marle: Tell Tifa to lay low. We'll take care of things here.
Dialogue: Tell Tifa to lay low. We'll take care of things here.

Original: Aerith: I've got to get to Seventh Heaven!
Dialogue: I've got to get to Seventh Heaven!

Original: Neighborhood Watch Member: We've got this area covered, don't worry!
Dialogue: We've got this area covered, don't worry!

Original: Aerith: That's it!
Dialogue: That's it!

Original: NPC: Oh god. Look out!
Dialogue: Oh god. Look out!

Original: Aerith: Oh no...
Dialogue: Oh no...

Original: Undercity Resident: Look outit's gonna crash!
Dialogue: Look out—it's gonna crash!

Original: Aerith: Marlene!
Dialogue: Marlene!

Original: Neighborhood Watch Member: We need water! Hurry! The fire's spreading!
Dialogue: We need water! Hurry! The fire's spreading!

Original: Aerith: Ow... Marlene...
Dialogue: Ow... Marlene...

Original: Aerith: Oh, no! Need to find another way to get there!
Dialogue: Oh, no! Need to find another way to get there!

Original: Aerith: Gotta get through. Gotta find a way.
Dialogue: Gotta get through. Gotta find a way.

Original: Neighborhood Watch Member: If anyone needs any assistance, please let the watch know!
Dialogue: If anyone needs any assistance, please let the watch know!

Original: Neighborhood Watch Member: This underground passage'll take you to Wall Market.
Dialogue: This underground passage'll take you to Wall Market.

Original: Aerith: Finally!
Dialogue: Finally!

Original: Aerith: Hold on.
Dialogue: Hold on.

Original: Undercity Resident (1): Go, go, go!
Dialogue: Go, go, go!

Original: Undercity Resident (2): Quit pushing!
Dialogue: Quit pushing!

Original: Aerith: Oh, you poor thing!
Dialogue: Oh, you poor thing!

Original: Aerith: I know it must hurt...but you've got to be brave now, okay?
Dialogue: I know it must hurt...but you've got to be brave now, okay?

Original: Marle: C'mon, keep moving! This way! Hey! Hey! Over here! C'mon!
Dialogue: C'mon, keep moving! This way! Hey! Hey! Over here! C'mon!

Original: Aerith: I'll take you to her. Ready?
Dialogue: I'll take you to her. Ready?

Original: Aerith: Almost there, okay?
Dialogue: Almost there, okay?

Original: Aerith: No need to rush. Steady now...
Dialogue: No need to rush. Steady now...

Original: Aerith: I'll be fine. Don't worry about me.
Dialogue: I'll be fine. Don't worry about me.

Original: Neighborhood Watch Member: We can get through this! We just have to work together!
Dialogue: We can get through this! We just have to work together!

Original: Neighborhood Watch Member: Get to Wall Marketnow! It's too dangerous here!
Dialogue: Get to Wall Market now! It's too dangerous here!

Original: Marle: This way, people! Quickly now! Keep moving!
Dialogue: This way, people! Quickly now! Keep moving!

Original: Aerith: Can you take care of her?
Dialogue: Can you take care of her?

Original: Marle: Of course.
Dialogue: Of course.

Original: Betty's Dad: Betty! I've been looking everywhere for you!
Dialogue: Betty! I've been looking everywhere for you!

Original: Betty: Daddy!
Dialogue: Daddy!

Original: Aerith: You'll be fine.
Dialogue: You'll be fine.

Original: Marle: Stop! That way's already
Dialogue: Stop! That way's already—

Original: Aerith: Please, I need to get through!
Dialogue: Please, I need to get through!

Original: Aerith: Almost there!
Dialogue: Almost there!

Original: Tseng: Confirmed, one more bird lost. Probably for the best. After all
Dialogue: Confirmed, one more bird lost. Probably for the best. After all—

Original: Tseng: Change of plans. You can take it from here. Someone's been a little too adventurous.
Dialogue: Change of plans. You can take it from here. Someone's been a little too adventurous.

Original: Aerith: Please be okay.
Dialogue: Please be okay.

Original: Aerith: Hold on, Marlene. I'm coming for you.
Dialogue: Hold on, Marlene. I'm coming for you.

Original: Aerith: You're Marlene, right?
Dialogue: You're Marlene, right?

Original: Marlene: Who...who are you?
Dialogue: Who...who are you?

Original: Aerith: I'm...a friend! Of Tifa's!
Dialogue: I'm...a friend! Of Tifa's!

Original: Marlene: Um... Where is she?
Dialogue: Um... Where is she?

Original: Aerith: Right now, she's with Cloud and the others.
Dialogue: Right now, she's with Cloud and the others.

Original: Marlene: Daddy too?
Dialogue: Daddy too?

Original: Aerith: You mean Barret? Yep. He's there too.
Dialogue: You mean Barret? Yep. He's there too.

Original: Marlene: Wait... Daddy's not coming home?
Dialogue: Wait... Daddy's not coming home?

Original: Aerith: Not yet. That's why I came to find you. Tifa asked me to. She said, "Take care of Marlene." The thing is, this place isn't safe now. I'm gonna take you somewhere safer, okay?
Dialogue: Not yet. That's why I came to find you. Tifa asked me to. She said, "Take care of Marlene." The thing is, this place isn't safe now. I'm gonna take you somewhere safer, okay?

Original: Marlene: Are they gonna destroy the bar? Are they gonna destroy our house?
Dialogue: Are they gonna destroy the bar? Are they gonna destroy our house?

Original: Aerith: I know it's hard. Just remember, you still have your daddy. You can build a new home together. Anywhere. Shall we go?
Dialogue: I know it's hard. Just remember, you still have your daddy. You can build a new home together. Anywhere. Shall we go?

Original: Marlene: You smell nice.
Dialogue: You smell nice.

Original: Aerith: Oh?
Dialogue: Oh?

Original: Marlene: Like...like our flower.
Dialogue: Like...like our flower.

Original: Aerith: I hope you remember it. C'mon.
Dialogue: I hope you remember it. C'mon.

Original: Aerith: Tell you what. We'll grow lots of flowers at your new house.
Dialogue: Tell you what. We'll grow lots of flowers at your new house.

Original: Marlene: Do you think that I could help too?
Dialogue: Do you think that I could help too?

Original: Aerith: Of course you can. Heywhat's your favorite flower?
Dialogue: Of course you can. Hey—what's your favorite flower?

Original: Marlene: (chuckles) Ummm...
Dialogue: (chuckles) Ummm...

Original: Tseng: You led us on a merry chase, Aerith.
Dialogue: You led us on a merry chase, Aerith.

Original: Aerith: Tseng.
Dialogue: Tseng.

Original: Tseng: Before you say another word, know that your options are limited.
Dialogue: Before you say another word, know that your options are limited.

Original: Aerith: There's nothing to be scared of. Okay?
Dialogue: There's nothing to be scared of. Okay?

Dialogue: How about...we make a deal?

Dialogue: Gotta move.

Dialogue: Pop your head out and let me finish this already.

Dialogue: Stairs.

Dialogue: Two birds with one shitload of bullets!

Dialogue: Hey!

Dialogue: Cloud!

Original: Cloud: What the hell!?
Dialogue: What the hell!?

Dialogue: Nice catch!

Original: Cloud: You're crazy!
Dialogue: You're crazy!

Original: Tifa: Just like you. So suck it up, 'cause I'm not leaving.
Dialogue: Just like you. So suck it up, 'cause I'm not leaving.

Dialogue: Dammit! You wanna explain yourself, partner?

Dialogue: Uh... Hand slipped.

Dialogue: Where's Aerith?

Original: Tifa: I sent her to Seventh Heaven to get Marlene out.
Dialogue: I sent her to Seventh Heaven to get Marlene out.

Dialogue: And Wedge?

Original: Tifa: I asked him to show her the way.
Dialogue: I asked him to show her the way.

Original: Cloud: Okay.
Dialogue: Okay.

Original: Tifa: We can still stop this...right?
Dialogue: We can still stop this...right?

Original: Cloud: Yeah.
Dialogue: Yeah.

Original: Tifa: Then let's keep moving!
Dialogue: Then let's keep moving!

Original: Reno: And where do you think you're going? Come out, come out, wherever the hell you are!
Dialogue: And where do you think you're going? Come out, come out, wherever the hell you are!

Original: Reno: Save us all some time and give up.
Dialogue: Save us all some time and give up.

Original: Reno: I don't know about you, but I amoverthis shit!
Dialogue: I don't know about you, but I am over this shit!

Original: Reno: Looks like you guys are having the time of your life.
Dialogue: Looks like you guys are having the time of your life.

Original: Tifa: What was that?
Dialogue: What was that?

Original: Jessie: So, how'd you guys rate my latest and greatest design? Eleven outta ten?
Dialogue: So, how'd you guys rate my latest and greatest design? Eleven outta ten?

Original: Jessie: Today's your unlucky day, 'cause I never miss.
Dialogue: Today's your unlucky day, 'cause I never miss.

Original: Reno: What, what?
Dialogue: What, what?

Original: Rude: Seems we've lost control of the top floor.
Dialogue: Seems we've lost control of the top floor.

Original: Reno: Huh? Our guys are seriously struggling to take down these assholes?
Dialogue: Huh? Our guys are seriously struggling to take down these assholes?

Original: Rude: Anyway, we may need to intervene personally.
Dialogue: Anyway, we may need to intervene personally.

Original: Reno: Whatever you say, partner. Keep 'em busy, will ya?
Dialogue: Whatever you say, partner. Keep 'em busy, will ya?

Original: Tifa: Jessie!
Dialogue: Jessie!

Original: Jessie: Oh, jeez... Tifa... If you could see the look on your face...
Dialogue: Oh, jeez... Tifa... If you could see the look on your face...

Original: Jessie: So...you're the guy...who gets to hear my last words... Heh... Lucky me.
Dialogue: So...you're the guy...who gets to hear my last words... Heh... Lucky me.

Original: Cloud: Like hell they're your last.
Dialogue: Like hell they're your last.

Original: Jessie: It's okay, Cloud... It's okay. They were my bombs. They were all...my victims. I had it...coming.
Dialogue: It's okay, Cloud... It's okay. They were my bombs. They were all...my victims. I had it...coming.

Original: Jessie: My hero. So gentle...
Dialogue: My hero. So gentle...

Original: Cloud: Just try to hang on!
Dialogue: Just try to hang on!

Original: Jessie: (chuckles) So dramatic... I...I just wish that... I could've had you over again... Everyone... With Mom's cooking... I really wanted...to believe...we could...
Dialogue: (chuckles) So dramatic... I...I just wish that... I could've had you over again... Everyone... With Mom's cooking... I really wanted...to believe...we could...

Original: Cloud: Yeah. You owe me a pizza.
Dialogue: Yeah. You owe me a pizza.

Original: Jessie: (chuckles) That's right. I do. But...I don't think...
Dialogue: (chuckles) That's right. I do. But...I don't think...

Original: Jessie: Oh no... Tifa's crying. Did I say something wrong?
Dialogue: Oh no... Tifa's crying. Did I say something wrong?

Original: Jessie: Don't you guys...have somewhere to be? It's not polite...to stare...you know...
Dialogue: Don't you guys...have somewhere to be? It's not polite...to stare...you know...

Original: Tifa: Jessie...
Dialogue: Jessie...

Original: Cloud: Hey...
Dialogue: Hey...

Original: Barret: (screams) I ain't done with you yet! You hear me!? Think you can come up in heredo what you wantand we're gonna take it!?
Dialogue: (screams) I ain't done with you yet! You hear me!? Think you can come up in here—do what you want—and we're gonna take it!?

Original: Tifa: Barret!
Dialogue: Barret!

Original: Barret: Tifa!? Get your ass behind cover! Now! Chopper's gonna chew you up!
Dialogue: Tifa!? Get your ass behind cover! Now! Chopper's gonna chew you up!

Original: Cloud: Still alive and kicking?
Dialogue: Still alive and kicking?

Original: Barret: Damn right! Leadin' man sticks around till the credits roll! Though we gotta keep moving if we wanna make it that far. You ready?
Dialogue: Damn right! Leadin' man sticks around till the credits roll! Though we gotta keep moving if we wanna make it that far. You ready?

Original: Cloud: Yup.
Dialogue: Yup.

Original: Reno: Time for a rematch, huh... Rude!
Dialogue: Time for a rematch, huh... Rude!

Original: Cloud: You!
Dialogue: You!

Original: Reno: It's nothing personal...bitch! Ha!
Dialogue: It's nothing personal...bitch! Ha!

Original: Reno: Missed me!
Dialogue: Missed me!

Original: Barret: You're next, asshole!
Dialogue: You're next, asshole!

Original: Reno: Sorry, losers! Gotta play for keeps today. No time to dick around.
Dialogue: Sorry, losers! Gotta play for keeps today. No time to dick around.

Dialogue: Plate separation authorized. Awaiting confirmation. Plate separation authorized. Awaiting confirmation.

Dialogue: Yeah, yeah, coming right up.

Original: Reno: No you don't! Not when I'm working!
Dialogue: No you don't! Not when I'm working!

Original: Announcement: Plate separation authorized. Awaiting confirmation.
Dialogue: Plate separation authorized. Awaiting confirmation.

Original: Cloud: Press it.
Dialogue: Press it.

Original: Reno: Now, now... You ain't got shit on us.
Dialogue: Now, now... You ain't got shit on us.

Dialogue: Careful. He's quick.

Original: Barret: Yeah, quick at runnin' away, maybe!
Dialogue: Yeah, quick at runnin' away, maybe!

Original: Reno: Ha! In your dreams.
Dialogue: Ha! In your dreams.

Original: Reno: So. Heard you gave Rude a beating.
Dialogue: So. Heard you gave Rude a beating.

Original: Cloud: Had to.
Dialogue: Had to.

Original: Reno: No choice, huh? I guess I ain't got one neither.
Dialogue: No choice, huh? I guess I ain't got one neither.

Original: Reno: Stubborn little shitbirds, ain'tcha?
Dialogue: Stubborn little shitbirds, ain'tcha?

Original: Rude: Prepping for bombing run, how copy?
Dialogue: Prepping for bombing run, how copy?

Original: Reno: Say what!?
Dialogue: Say what!?

Dialogue: I see you're doin' whatever the hell you want. Guess I'm rubbing off on ya.

Original: Cloud: Heads up, guys!
Dialogue: Heads up, guys!

Original: Reno: Dammit...
Dialogue: Dammit...

Original: Reno: (chuckles) Clipped your wings, huh?
Dialogue: (chuckles) Clipped your wings, huh?

Original: Rude: I was planning to join you anyway.
Dialogue: I was planning to join you anyway.

Dialogue: Any landing ya can walk away from... C'mon! Let's teach 'em the Turks two-step!

Original: Rude: Time for you to learn...
Dialogue: Time for you to learn...

Dialogue: What happens when you mess with the Turks! If you're gonna pick a fight with the Turks, you'd better be prepared to leave in a body bag.

Dialogue: Confident, ain't we?

Original: Rude: Reno!
Dialogue: Reno!

Original: Reno: Rude!
Dialogue: Rude!

Original: Announcement: Plate separation authorized. Awaiting confirmation.
Dialogue: Plate separation authorized. Awaiting confirmation.

Original: Cloud: How do we stop it?
Dialogue: How do we stop it?

Dialogue: Who knows?

Dialogue: Where you going!?

Dialogue: Move!

Dialogue: Getting real tired of your shit!

Dialogue: Tifa!

Original: Barret: Where'dja

Dialogue: Plate separation initiated. Plate separation initiated. Commencing separation sequence. Section 1 separation imminent. Evacuate immediately. Plate separation initiated.

Dialogue: You son of a bitch! What have you done!?

Dialogue: Cloud!

Original: Cloud: Tifa!
Dialogue: Tifa!

Dialogue: Five minutes to go.

Dialogue: What do we do!?

Dialogue: Nothing. There is nothing you can do now.

Dialogue: You can't do this!

Dialogue: Tifa! I found Marlene!

Dialogue: Aerith!

Dialogue: Marlene? My Marlene!? What did you do with her!?

Dialogue: Where are you!?

Original: Aerith (computer): I'm at the
Dialogue: I'm at the—

Dialogue: Sir. C'mon.

Dialogue: Your activities unwittingly brought you into contact with the Ancient, who is now back in our custody where she belongs. For this, you have my sincerest gratitude. Alas, the sector in which you stand has been condemned.

Dialogue: "Ancient"?

Dialogue: Run! You have to go now!

Dialogue: And where exactly do you expect them to go?

Dialogue: Aerith!

Dialogue: Total plate separation imminent. Evacuate the area immediately.

Dialogue: No, no, no...

Dialogue: If we don't get the hell outta here right now, we're dead! We gotta think of something! Think dammit think! Look around... Gotta be something! Shit...shit... Shit!

Dialogue: Hey! Over here! Found us a way out!

Dialogue: C'mon, c'mon!

Dialogue: Hey! Anybody out there!?

Dialogue: Barret!?

Dialogue: Hey! Can anybody hear me!?

Dialogue: Marlene... Marlene! Marlene!

Original: Barret: Marlene... Marlene... (cries)
Dialogue: Marlene... Marlene... (cries)

Original: Tifa: It was us. We did this.
Dialogue: It was us. We did this.

Original: Barret: No. You can't think like that. Whatever came before, it was Shinra that pulled the trigger today. Am I right!?
Dialogue: No. You can't think like that. Whatever came before, it was Shinra that pulled the trigger today. Am I right!?

Original: Tifa: ...Yeah.
Dialogue: ...Yeah.

Original: Barret: Hold on to this. This...anger. Okay?
Dialogue: Hold on to this. This...anger. Okay?

Original: Cloud: Barret. Marlene's fine. Aerith found her.
Dialogue: Barret. Marlene's fine. Aerith found her.

Original: Barret: Aerith? Is that the girl they took?
Dialogue: Aerith? Is that the girl they took?

Original: Tifa: Yeah. That's her.
Dialogue: Yeah. That's her.

Original: Barret: The hell's going on!?
Dialogue: The hell's going on!?

Original: Tifa: I asked Aerith to find Marlene and take her somewhere safe.
Dialogue: I asked Aerith to find Marlene and take her somewhere safe.

Original: Barret: And she did? You sure!?
Dialogue: And she did? You sure!?

Original: Barret: Hey! Where you going!?
Dialogue: Hey! Where you going!?

Original: New Recruit: How could this happen...?
Dialogue: How could this happen...?

Original: Senior Officer: I didn't really think that...
Dialogue: I didn't really think that...

Original: New Recruit: I don'tWhat do we do now?
Dialogue: I don't—What do we do now?

Original: Senior Officer: What you were hired to do. Get these people outta here!
Dialogue: What you were hired to do. Get these people outta here!

Original: Senior Officer: So you know, things could've been worse if you hadn't done what you did. Sometimes you can't let yourself be bound by orders.
Dialogue: So you know, things could've been worse if you hadn't done what you did. Sometimes you can't let yourself be bound by orders.

Original: New Recruit: I've made up my mind. I'm not gonna do this job for Shinra anymore. I'm an officer of the people now!
