Original: Yuffie: There it is. The call of the turtle!
Dialogue: There it is. The call of the turtle!

Original: Yuffie: You never stood a chance, little guy!
Dialogue: You never stood a chance, little guy!

Original: On-screen: The Happy Turtle Newsletter 1 obtained.
Dialogue: The Happy Turtle Newsletter 1 obtained.

Original: Yuffie: The gumshoe ninja strikes again!
Dialogue: The gumshoe ninja strikes again!

Original: On-screen: The Happy Turtle Newsletter 2 obtained.
Dialogue: The Happy Turtle Newsletter 2 obtained.

Original: On-screen: Don't let the dog notice you!
Dialogue: Don't let the dog notice you!

Original: On-screen: Hide behind the boxes when the dog's awake!
Dialogue: Hide behind the boxes when the dog's awake!

Original: On-screen: The Happy Turtle Newsletter 3 obtained.
Dialogue: The Happy Turtle Newsletter 3 obtained.

Original: Marle: Just what do you think you're doing, young lady?
Dialogue: Just what do you think you're doing, young lady?

Original: Yuffie: (screams)
Dialogue: (screams)

Original: Marle: And whaddya want withthat, exactly? Better yet, who are you? Heard some punks've been hasslin' the nice people at the Happy Turtle, rippin' down their flyers. Are you one of 'em?
Dialogue: And whaddya want with that, exactly? Better yet, who are you? Heard some punks've been hasslin' the nice people at the Happy Turtle, rippin' down their flyers. Are you one of 'em?

Original: Yuffie: Mm-mm.
Dialogue: Mm-mm.

Original: Marle: So you're trying to sneak a peek at the merc? Not that I blame ya. Boy's easy on the eyes, I'll give him that much.
Dialogue: So you're trying to sneak a peek at the merc? Not that I blame ya. Boy's easy on the eyes, I'll give him that much.

Original: Yuffie: Uh...
Dialogue: Uh...

Original: Marle: But cut your losses, honey. Unless you like your men silent and emotionally unavailable. Merc's built a wall around himself so damn high, even he can't see over it. He'll never tell you what he's thinking. And that attitude of his...! I tried to get through to himbut would he listen? Would he?
Dialogue: But cut your losses, honey. Unless you like your men silent and emotionally unavailable. Merc's built a wall around himself so damn high, even he can't see over it. He'll never tell you what he's thinking. And that attitude of his...! I tried to get through to him—but would he listen? Would he?

Original: Yuffie: Uh, I'm really not here for...whoever he is.
Dialogue: Uh, I'm really not here for...whoever he is.

Original: Marle: Then whatareyou here for?
Dialogue: Then what are you here for?

Original: Yuffie: For, uh...directions! But I'm all good now, thanks!
Dialogue: For, uh...directions! But I'm all good now, thanks!

Original: Yuffie: Hah... That was a close one.
Dialogue: Hah... That was a close one.

Original: Yuffie: I'm comin' for ya, flyer!
Dialogue: I'm comin' for ya, flyer!

Original: Yuffie: Heh heh, gotcha!
Dialogue: Heh heh, gotcha!

Original: Yuffie: (screams)
Dialogue: (screams)

Original: Yuffie: Flyer acquired!
Dialogue: Flyer acquired!

Original: On-screen: The Happy Turtle Newsletter 4 obtained.
Dialogue: The Happy Turtle Newsletter 4 obtained.

Original: Wymer: Hey! Over here! Can't belive those freakin' morons... They damn near got 'emselves eaten tryin' to hide that stupid poster. You stay away from that factory, y'hear? Place has monsters comin' outta the walls.
Dialogue: Hey! Over here! Can't belive those freakin' morons... They damn near got 'emselves eaten tryin' to hide that stupid poster. You stay away from that factory, y'hear? Place has monsters comin' outta the walls.

Original: Wymer: Fiends've been actin' up since the bombingslike they know something we don't. (sighs) Just wish that merc were still around. He'd sort those critters out.
Dialogue: Fiends've been actin' up since the bombings—like they know something we don't. (sighs) Just wish that merc were still around. He'd sort those critters out.

Original: Yuffie: Heh heh, gotcha! You thought you could hide from me, didn't ya!
Dialogue: Heh heh, gotcha! You thought you could hide from me, didn't ya!

Original: On-screen: The Happy Turtle Newsletter 5 obtained.
Dialogue: The Happy Turtle Newsletter 5 obtained.

Original: Yuffie: (gasps) My turtle senses are tingling!
Dialogue: (gasps) My turtle senses are tingling!

Original: Yuffie: Heh heh, gotcha!
Dialogue: Heh heh, gotcha!

Original: On-screen: The Happy Turtle Newsletter 6 obtained.
Dialogue: The Happy Turtle Newsletter 6 obtained.

Original: Yuffie: And that makes six! Won't Old Snapper be impressed when I rock up with these bad boys.
Dialogue: And that makes six! Won't Old Snapper be impressed when I rock up with these bad boys.

Original: On-screen: Return to Old Snapper?
Dialogue: Return to Old Snapper?

Original: Old Snapper: Well, well, well... Look what the tide washed in. That's a one, two...three and a four...five andI can't believe itsix! We have a winner! Three cheers for the Happy Turtle's all-conquering champion! Hip hip, hooray! Hip hip, hooray! Hip hip, hooraaay!
Dialogue: Well, well, well... Look what the tide washed in. That's a one, two...three and a four...five and—I can't believe it—six! We have a winner! Three cheers for the Happy Turtle's all-conquering champion! Hip hip, hooray! Hip hip, hooray! Hip hip, hooraaay!

Original: Yuffie: Please, it was a piece of cake. Only these Midgarian dummies would findthata challenge. Speaking of which... Herefor a fellow tough nut!
Dialogue: Please, it was a piece of cake. Only these Midgarian dummies would find that a challenge. Speaking of which... Here—for a fellow tough nut!

Original: Old Snapper: Would ya look at that... Da-chao beans! Does this mean what I think it does?
Dialogue: Would ya look at that... Da-chao beans! Does this mean what I think it does?

Original: Yuffie: Mm-hm.
Dialogue: Mm-hm.

Original: Old Snapper: Well, whaddya know. A real-life ninja, paying Old Snapper a visit. Truth be told, I'd love to have you 'round to the bar, but...you got your hands full. (chuckles) Not to mention the whole underage thing. Still just a young'n, I s'pose, ninja though you are. Well, I don't plan on movin' from Midgar anytime soon, so once your shell's seen a bit more wear and tear, make sure to come on back. Whip you up the finest food and drink this side of Wutai. Only the best for you.
Dialogue: Well, whaddya know. A real-life ninja, paying Old Snapper a visit. Truth be told, I'd love to have you 'round to the bar, but...you got your hands full. (chuckles) Not to mention the whole underage thing. Still just a young'n, I s'pose, ninja though you are. Well, I don't plan on movin' from Midgar anytime soon, so once your shell's seen a bit more wear and tear, make sure to come on back. Whip you up the finest food and drink this side of Wutai. Only the best for you.

Original: Nayo: You guys all set?
Dialogue: You guys all set?

Original: On-screen: You all set?
Dialogue: You all set?

Original: Nayo: Okay. Streets are kind of a maze, so stay close.
Dialogue: Okay. Streets are kind of a maze, so stay close.

Original: Nayo: Take all the time you need.
Dialogue: Take all the time you need.

Original: Nayo: Yuffie? Where are you going?
Dialogue: Yuffie? Where are you going?

Original: Sonon: So Nayo, where we headed?
Dialogue: So Nayo, where we headed?

Original: Nayo: To pick up your IDs. There's no way to get topside without 'em.
Dialogue: To pick up your IDs. There's no way to get topside without 'em.

Original: Yuffie: But I thought Zhijie was getting our High-D's. What happened with that?
Dialogue: But I thought Zhijie was getting our High-D's. What happened with that?

Original: Nayo: He is, but those are different. It takes more than one IDor even twoto survive in this town. Don't forget, Midgar was built by Shinra, for Shinra.
Dialogue: He is, but those are different. It takes more than one ID—or even two—to survive in this town. Don't forget, Midgar was built by Shinra, for Shinra.

Original: Yuffie: Those tyrants!
Dialogue: Those tyrants!

Original: Sonon: Put the claws away, Boss. Least while we're in Shinra territory.
Dialogue: Put the claws away, Boss. Least while we're in Shinra territory.

Original: Yuffie: Reowr!
Dialogue: Reowr!

Original: Sonon: Whoa.
Dialogue: Whoa.

Original: Nayo: So, Yuffie, what do you think of the undercity?
Dialogue: So, Yuffie, what do you think of the undercity?

Original: Yuffie: Way too crowded. I can't stand it. Ugh, and the stench! How can anyone live here?
Dialogue: Way too crowded. I can't stand it. Ugh, and the stench! How can anyone live here?

Original: Sonon: Gotta agree with you about the smell, but you get used to it quick enough.
Dialogue: Gotta agree with you about the smell, but you get used to it quick enough.

Original: Nayo: And the crowds stop bothering you eventually. The place can grow on you if you give it a chance.
Dialogue: And the crowds stop bothering you eventually. The place can grow on you if you give it a chance.

Original: Yuffie: Uh...wait a second. Are you actually saying you like it here? I thought you hated it.
Dialogue: Uh...wait a second. Are you actually saying you like it here? I thought you hated it.

Original: Nayo: Midgar isn't the enemyShinra is. I know Ws don't really see the distinction, but...we do.
Dialogue: Midgar isn't the enemy—Shinra is. I know Ws don't really see the distinction, but...we do.

Original: Yuffie: Then what was that stuff on the news? About a reactor blowin' up and all. No way that was an accident. It had to be Avalanche.
Dialogue: Then what was that stuff on the news? About a reactor blowin' up and all. No way that was an accident. It had to be Avalanche.

Original: Nayo: Shh!
Dialogue: Shh!

Original: Yuffie: Sorry...
Dialogue: Sorry...

Original: Yuffie: Uh, what's up?
Dialogue: Uh, what's up?

Original: Nayo: Those guys there are from the splinter cell.
Dialogue: Those guys there are from the splinter cell.

Original: Yuffie: Splinter cell?
Dialogue: Splinter cell?

Original: Nayo: They used to be with Avalanche, but left after a "policy dispute."
Dialogue: They used to be with Avalanche, but left after a "policy dispute."

Original: Biggs: Well, look who it is. Lovin' your work! So how many reactors is that now? Wait... Where's Cloud?
Dialogue: Well, look who it is. Lovin' your work! So how many reactors is that now? Wait... Where's Cloud?

Original: Barret: We lost him.
Dialogue: We lost him.

Original: Biggs: You what?
Dialogue: You what?

Original: Tifa: Hewillbe okay though...right?
Dialogue: He will be okay though...right?

Original: Barret: Well...of course he will! A little fall ain't gonna stop a hard-ass like him. He'll come swaggerin' back before long, you mark my words.
Dialogue: Well...of course he will! A little fall ain't gonna stop a hard-ass like him. He'll come swaggerin' back before long, you mark my words.

Original: Tifa: Yeah...I guess he will.
Dialogue: Yeah...I guess he will.

Original: Barret: Now can we talk about President Shithead? Spoutin' all that crap about us!? That lyin' son of a bitch! Working for Wutai!? Avalanche ain't nobody's
Dialogue: Now can we talk about President Shithead? Spoutin' all that crap about us!? That lyin' son of a bitch! Working for Wutai!? Avalanche ain't nobody's—

Original: Tifa: Barret.
Dialogue: Barret.

Original: Biggs: Speakin' of sons of bitches...I heard the Wall Market's very own Don Corneo has his stooges out lookin' for ya.
Dialogue: Speakin' of sons of bitches...I heard the Wall Market's very own Don Corneo has his stooges out lookin' for ya.

Original: Tifa: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Barret: Is that so?
Dialogue: Is that so?

Original: Barret: Don't got time for no low-level mobsters. We got Shinra in our sights.
Dialogue: Don't got time for no low-level mobsters. We got Shinra in our sights.

Original: Barret: Tifa. You and I both know this is far from over. Right? Might as well get some restwhile we still can.
Dialogue: Tifa. You and I both know this is far from over. Right? Might as well get some rest—while we still can.

Original: Tifa: Right.
Dialogue: Right.

Original: Tifa: You know what? I think I am gonna look into this.
Dialogue: You know what? I think I am gonna look into this.

Original: Biggs: Good luck out there.
Dialogue: Good luck out there.

Original: Nayo: They're the ones who blew up the reactors.
Dialogue: They're the ones who blew up the reactors.

Original: Yuffie: Cool. Should we say hi?
Dialogue: Cool. Should we say hi?

Original: Sonon: Nah, better not. After what they've done, you gotta assume Shinra's on their tail. Should keep our distance.
Dialogue: Nah, better not. After what they've done, you gotta assume Shinra's on their tail. Should keep our distance.

Original: Nayo: Yeah. My thoughts exactly.
Dialogue: Yeah. My thoughts exactly.

Original: Nayo: The people in the splinter cell, they couldn't care less about collateral damage...long as Shinra goes down.
Dialogue: The people in the splinter cell, they couldn't care less about collateral damage...long as Shinra goes down.

Original: Yuffie: So, what's wrong with that? Sounds good to me.
Dialogue: So, what's wrong with that? Sounds good to me.

Original: Nayo: We're not out to blow Midgar up or tear it downwe want to save it from Shinra. Look around. Nine outta ten of the people living here are innocent bystanders. We can't level their home to take down one company.
Dialogue: We're not out to blow Midgar up or tear it down—we want to save it from Shinra. Look around. Nine outta ten of the people living here are innocent bystanders. We can't level their home to take down one company.

Original: Yuffie: Well, that company almost leveledourhome, and they've gotta learn their lesson.
Dialogue: Well, that company almost leveled our home, and they've gotta learn their lesson.

Original: Nayo: Yeah, I get that.
Dialogue: Yeah, I get that.

Original: Sonon: Gotta admit, I'm surprised you agreed to work with us.
Dialogue: Gotta admit, I'm surprised you agreed to work with us.

Original: Nayo: We're just doing what we think is necessary...to build a brighter future. That's all there is to it.
Dialogue: We're just doing what we think is necessary...to build a brighter future. That's all there is to it.

Original: Sonon: In other words, you're working with us so we don't work with your old buddiesknowing what would happen if we did.
Dialogue: In other words, you're working with us so we don't work with your old buddies—knowing what would happen if we did.

Original: Nayo: Uh, can we table this for later, maybe? Not sure now's the best time for heavy topics.
Dialogue: Uh, can we table this for later, maybe? Not sure now's the best time for heavy topics.

Original: Yuffie: Yeah, couldn't agree more. Consider it tabled!
Dialogue: Yeah, couldn't agree more. Consider it tabled!

Original: Nayo: So...what exactly does this "ultimate materia" do? I'm guessing you have big plans for it?
Dialogue: So...what exactly does this "ultimate materia" do? I'm guessing you have big plans for it?

Original: Yuffie: Like after we steal it? Well, the more materia you have, the stronger you are, right? So once we've got theultimatemateria, we'll be stronger than anyone!
Dialogue: Like after we steal it? Well, the more materia you have, the stronger you are, right? So once we've got the ultimate materia, we'll be stronger than anyone!

Original: Nayo: I guess you will...
Dialogue: I guess you will...

Original: Yuffie: (chuckles) It's gonna be awesome!
Dialogue: (chuckles) It's gonna be awesome!

Original: Sonon: And not just that. By sneaking into Shinra HQ and snatching their most prized possession from under their noses...not only will we deal a massive blow to their morale...but we'll prove to them that while Wutai might be down, we're not out. That the gist of it, Boss?
Dialogue: And not just that. By sneaking into Shinra HQ and snatching their most prized possession from under their noses...not only will we deal a massive blow to their morale...but we'll prove to them that while Wutai might be down, we're not out. That the gist of it, Boss?

Original: Yuffie: Uh, sure is!
Dialogue: Uh, sure is!

Original: Corneo Lackey (1): See that one?
Dialogue: See that one?

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): Well hello there, hot stuff... How'd ya like a shot at the big time?
Dialogue: Well hello there, hot stuff... How'd ya like a shot at the big time?

Original: Yuffie: (chuckles)
Dialogue: (chuckles)

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): With those looks, I guarantee you're golden.
Dialogue: With those looks, I guarantee you're golden.

Original: Yuffie: (chuckles)
Dialogue: (chuckles)

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): So whaddaya say? Ready to be queen of the undercity?
Dialogue: So whaddaya say? Ready to be queen of the undercity?

Original: Yuffie: Hey! What am I? Chopped liver!?
Dialogue: Hey! What am I? Chopped liver!?

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): The kid doesn't need to hear this.
Dialogue: The kid doesn't need to hear this.

Original: Corneo Lackey (1): Now be a good girl and cover your ears, okay?
Dialogue: Now be a good girl and cover your ears, okay?

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): You'd be living and working in the most luxurious residence in all of Wall Ma
Dialogue: You'd be living and working in the most luxurious residence in all of Wall Ma—

Original: Nayo: You want me to be one of Corneo's brides, is that it? Which makes you a "person of influence," right?
Dialogue: You want me to be one of Corneo's brides, is that it? Which makes you a "person of influence," right?

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): Oh, I see you know your stuff. But I'd say I'm more of a "helping hand." So, why don't you help me help you?
Dialogue: Oh, I see you know your stuff. But I'd say I'm more of a "helping hand." So, why don't you help me help you?

Original: Corneo Lackey (3): Let's get going.
Dialogue: Let's get going.

Original: Nayo: What're you doing!? Get your hands off me? Ugh!
Dialogue: What're you doing!? Get your hands off me? Ugh!

Original: Corneo Lackey (3): Now, don't go playin' ha
Dialogue: Now, don't go playin' ha—

Original: Yuffie: (laughs) Know any kids who can dothat? No you don't, 'causeI'man adult.
Dialogue: (laughs) Know any kids who can do that? No you don't, 'cause I'm an adult.

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): (laughs)
Dialogue: (laughs)

Original: Yuffie: Also, I'm pretty hot stuff myself, thank you very much.
Dialogue: Also, I'm pretty hot stuff myself, thank you very much.

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): Hah. Sure, whatever helps you sleep at night,little girl. But if you wanna pull up a seat at the grown-ups' table...be my guest.
Dialogue: Hah. Sure, whatever helps you sleep at night, little girl. But if you wanna pull up a seat at the grown-ups' table...be my guest.

Original: Sonon: Hey, at least you tried.
Dialogue: Hey, at least you tried.

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): You're gonna eat those words, you smuh piece of shit.
Dialogue: You're gonna eat those words, you smuh piece of shit.

Original: Corneo Lackey (4): Boss! Boss! You're not gonna believe this! The hottie of the century just fell righ t into our laps!
Dialogue: Boss! Boss! You're not gonna believe this! The hottie of the century just fell righ t into our laps!

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): She did?
Dialogue: She did?

Original: Corneo Lackey (4): (laughs) Goods under the hood, junk in the trunk, and down for a bumpy ride!
Dialogue: (laughs) Goods under the hood, junk in the trunk, and down for a bumpy ride!

Original: Corneo Lackey (2): Sorry, ladies, but after careful consideration, we've decided to go with a more "qualified" applicant. Let's go.
Dialogue: Sorry, ladies, but after careful consideration, we've decided to go with a more "qualified" applicant. Let's go.

Original: Corneo Lackey (3): See ya around!
Dialogue: See ya around!

Original: Yuffie: Okay...
Dialogue: Okay...

Original: Yuffie: So, who were those creeps anyway?
Dialogue: So, who were those creeps anyway?

Original: Nayo: Don Corneo's "talent scouts." They'll say and do just about anything to get unsuspecting girls back to the don's mansion.
Dialogue: Don Corneo's "talent scouts." They'll say and do just about anything to get unsuspecting girls back to the don's mansion.

Original: Sonon: I thought it looked seedy. Guess you'dhaveto be a scumbug to build a place like that.
Dialogue: I thought it looked seedy. Guess you'd have to be a scumbug to build a place like that.

Original: Yuffie: Oho? And how doyouknow what it looks like?
Dialogue: Oho? And how do you know what it looks like?

Original: Sonon: I saw it while I was scouting the area.
Dialogue: I saw it while I was scouting the area.

Original: Nayo: Well, we're here. Now we just have to wait.
Dialogue: Well, we're here. Now we just have to wait.

Original: Yuffie: Wait for who?
Dialogue: Wait for who?

Original: Nayo: Not sure. We used to have someone who could make fake IDs in-house, but...they went off with the splinter cell. We've never dealt with this particular vendor before.
Dialogue: Not sure. We used to have someone who could make fake IDs in-house, but...they went off with the splinter cell. We've never dealt with this particular vendor before.

Original: Yuffie: Hey, uh... What's up with that guy?
Dialogue: Hey, uh... What's up with that guy?

Original: Nayo: Mako poisoning. That's what happens if you don't make the grade as a SOLDIER...or when the military's done using you.
Dialogue: Mako poisoning. That's what happens if you don't make the grade as a SOLDIER...or when the military's done using you.

Original: Sonon: Just another one of Shinra's victims.
Dialogue: Just another one of Shinra's victims.

Original: Yuffie: Them again!? Oh, Shinra's so gonna get it!
Dialogue: Them again!? Oh, Shinra's so gonna get it!

Original: Counterfeiter: If it's Shinra you've got beef with... You'll be needing these. Can't access the plate without 'em. They're gonna scan for those things on the train, so make sure to keep 'em on you.
Dialogue: If it's Shinra you've got beef with... You'll be needing these. Can't access the plate without 'em. They're gonna scan for those things on the train, so make sure to keep 'em on you.

Original: Nayo: Thank you.
Dialogue: Thank you.

Original: Yuffie: Hey, hold up!
Dialogue: Hey, hold up!

Original: Yuffie: Try it. You'll love it.
Dialogue: Try it. You'll love it.

Original: Yuffie: Foreigners and their weak jaws...
Dialogue: Foreigners and their weak jaws...

Original: Nayo: We should probably head back and wait for Zhijie.
Dialogue: We should probably head back and wait for Zhijie.

Original: Yuffie: Enjoy your materia while you still can, Shinra, 'cause we're comin'!
Dialogue: Enjoy your materia while you still can, Shinra, 'cause we're comin'!

Original: Sonon: Not yet, Boss. With things the way they are, we can't just go strolling up to the front gates. We're gonna need Avalanche to help us bypass security before we can do anything.
Dialogue: Not yet, Boss. With things the way they are, we can't just go strolling up to the front gates. We're gonna need Avalanche to help us bypass security before we can do anything.

Original: Yuffie: Aw! Hmph.
Dialogue: Aw! Hmph.

Original: Robed Man: Re...un...ion...
Dialogue: Re...un...ion...

Original: Yuffie: A-wha...?
Dialogue: A-wha...?

Original: Nayo: Huh. What's this about?
Dialogue: Huh. What's this about?

Original: Nayo: "Change of plans. Go to the pillar. Will explain there. Hurry.Zhijie"
Dialogue: "Change of plans. Go to the pillar. Will explain there. Hurry.—Zhijie"

Original: Yuffie: "Change of plans"?
Dialogue: "Change of plans"?

Original: Sonon: TheS7pillar?
Dialogue: The S7 pillar?

Original: Nayo: Otherwise known as "the roof of the slums." Follow me, guys.
Dialogue: Otherwise known as "the roof of the slums." Follow me, guys.

Original: Sonon: Why's he need us to hurry? I don't like the sound of this.
Dialogue: Why's he need us to hurry? I don't like the sound of this.

Original: Yuffie: Well, if you ask me, it's high time things picked up around here.
Dialogue: Well, if you ask me, it's high time things picked up around here.

Original: Nayo: You like living in the fast lane, huh.
Dialogue: You like living in the fast lane, huh.

Original: Yuffie: Yeah, I'm not your garden-variety Wutaian. I'm a rare bloom!
Dialogue: Yeah, I'm not your garden-variety Wutaian. I'm a rare bloom!

Original: Sonon: More like a mutant.
Dialogue: More like a mutant.

Original: Yuffie: Ooh, I'msogonna use that!
Dialogue: Ooh, I'm so gonna use that!

Original: Nayo: Almost there.
Dialogue: Almost there.

Original: Yuffie: Hey! That's Zhijie.
Dialogue: Hey! That's Zhijie.

Original: Sonon: You're right. Hold up.
Dialogue: You're right. Hold up.

Original: Security Officer: Hey, I'm talking to you! Answer me! Well?
Dialogue: Hey, I'm talking to you! Answer me! Well?

Original: Zhijie: Uh... Look! A moogle!
Dialogue: Uh... Look! A moogle!

Original: Security Officer: Stop!
Dialogue: Stop!

Original: Sonon: We gotta help.
Dialogue: We gotta help.

Original: Nayo: You two go after Zhijie. I'll head back and tell the others what happened.
Dialogue: You two go after Zhijie. I'll head back and tell the others what happened.

Original: Sonon: That way.
Dialogue: That way.

Original: Sonon: Boss. We might not be back for a while. Best to stock up before leaving.
Dialogue: Boss. We might not be back for a while. Best to stock up before leaving.

Original: Yuffie: Do you have any idea what Zhijie actually did?
Dialogue: Do you have any idea what Zhijie actually did?

Original: Sonon: Whatever it was, he probably did it for us.
Dialogue: Whatever it was, he probably did it for us.

Original: Yuffie: Well, now I feel bad.
Dialogue: Well, now I feel bad.

Original: Sonon: No time for that, Boss.
Dialogue: No time for that, Boss.

Original: Yuffie: Right.
Dialogue: Right.

Original: Zhijie: Shit...
Dialogue: Shit...

Original: Security Officer (1): Got nowhere to run.
Dialogue: Got nowhere to run.

Original: Security Officer (2): Tell us what you know. Now.
Dialogue: Tell us what you know. Now.

Original: Zhijie: (chuckles) How 'bout later? I'm not stupid.
Dialogue: (chuckles) How 'bout later? I'm not stupid.

Original: Security Officer (2): Hey!
Dialogue: Hey!

Original: Security Officer (1): After him!
Dialogue: After him!

Original: Yuffie: Oho! Talk about fast. Is he one of us?
Dialogue: Oho! Talk about fast. Is he one of us?

Original: Sonon: We don't have time to get into that, Boss. You can ask him yourself once he's safe. Come on.
Dialogue: We don't have time to get into that, Boss. You can ask him yourself once he's safe. Come on.

Original: On-screen: Shipping Facility
Dialogue: Shipping Facility

Original: Zhijie: You got grit, I'll give ya that.
Dialogue: You got grit, I'll give ya that.

Original: Security Officer: Piece of shit. He's toying with us.
Dialogue: Piece of shit. He's toying with us.

Original: Yuffie: This some kind of factory or something? It reminds me of a place I passed through when I first got here. And if it's anything like that, it'll be crawlin' with monsters.
Dialogue: This some kind of factory or something? It reminds me of a place I passed through when I first got here. And if it's anything like that, it'll be crawlin' with monsters.

Original: Zhijie: Sorry!
Dialogue: Sorry!

Original: Security Officer (1): (sighs) Dammit.
Dialogue: (sighs) Dammit.

Original: Security Officer (2): We should radio the other squads.
Dialogue: We should radio the other squads.

Original: Yuffie: Aha! Been lookin' for you!
Dialogue: Aha! Been lookin' for you!

Original: Security Officer (1): The hell!?
Dialogue: The hell!?

Original: On-screen: Operate conveyor belt?
Dialogue: Operate conveyor belt?

Original: Yuffie: Hey, you think Nayo's alright?
Dialogue: Hey, you think Nayo's alright?

Original: Sonon: She's a local, remember. She'll be fine.
Dialogue: She's a local, remember. She'll be fine.

Original: Yuffie: You know, she's actually pretty cool. I feel bad saying this, but after what happened back home, I just kinda assumed no one in Avalanche could be trusted. Like, they were all the same as the ones I fought.
Dialogue: You know, she's actually pretty cool. I feel bad saying this, but after what happened back home, I just kinda assumed no one in Avalanche could be trusted. Like, they were all the same as the ones I fought.

Original: Sonon: Yeah. I can imagine.
Dialogue: Yeah. I can imagine.

Original: Yuffie: But it looks like Avalanche has changed a lot since that went down, huh?
Dialogue: But it looks like Avalanche has changed a lot since that went down, huh?

Original: Yuffie: C'mon.
Dialogue: C'mon.

Original: Zhijie: You guys just don't know when to quit.
Dialogue: You guys just don't know when to quit.

Original: Yuffie: (screams) Man, that stings... Alright, now you've done it! When this is over, you're gettin' it good! Enjoy your freedom while you can, Zhijie!
Dialogue: (screams) Man, that stings... Alright, now you've done it! When this is over, you're gettin' it good! Enjoy your freedom while you can, Zhijie!

Original: Security Officer (1): Ten-four. Be there as soon as we can. Unit 3 says they've got the suspect detained near pillar maintenance. We'd better not keep them waiting.
Dialogue: Ten-four. Be there as soon as we can. Unit 3 says they've got the suspect detained near pillar maintenance. We'd better not keep them waiting.

Original: Security Officer (2): What? Pillar maintenance? How'd they let him get that far?
Dialogue: What? Pillar maintenance? How'd they let him get that far?

Original: Security Officer (1): Hell if I know. Come on.
Dialogue: Hell if I know. Come on.

Original: Yuffie: You heard the main.
Dialogue: You heard the main.

Original: Sonon: WaitBoss! No!
Dialogue: Wait—Boss! No!

Original: Yuffie: (stumbles)
Dialogue: (stumbles)

Original: Security Officer: Freeze!
Dialogue: Freeze!

Original: Yuffie: (chuckles)
Dialogue: (chuckles)

Original: Sonon: (sighs)
Dialogue: (sighs)

Original: Yuffie: Well that sucked. Why did tailing people have to be so hard?
Dialogue: Well that sucked. Why did tailing people have to be so hard?

Original: Sonon: You gotta learn to think before ya act, Boss. Gonna get yourself killed one of these days.
Dialogue: You gotta learn to think before ya act, Boss. Gonna get yourself killed one of these days.

Original: Yuffie: Eh. Sure, whatever. Now how do we find Zhijie?
Dialogue: Eh. Sure, whatever. Now how do we find Zhijie?

Original: Sonon: I've got an idea about that, but let's get to a vantage point first.
Dialogue: I've got an idea about that, but let's get to a vantage point first.

Original: On-screen: Storage Depot
Dialogue: Storage Depot

Original: Sonon: Alright, see that massive structure up ahead? That's the pillar those troopers were talking about. Assuming the maintenance facility's near there, we should probably head toward it. Sound good?
Dialogue: Alright, see that massive structure up ahead? That's the pillar those troopers were talking about. Assuming the maintenance facility's near there, we should probably head toward it. Sound good?

Original: Yuffie: Yeah, works for me.
Dialogue: Yeah, works for me.

Original: Sonon: C'mon.
Dialogue: C'mon.

Original: Yuffie: Now how are we gonna get across. Hmmm...
Dialogue: Now how are we gonna get across. Hmmm...

Original: Yuffie: Oho! Is that a switch I see?
Dialogue: Oho! Is that a switch I see?

Original: Sonon: Hey, about what you said earlier.
Dialogue: Hey, about what you said earlier.

Original: Yuffie: Which was...?
Dialogue: Which was...?

Original: Sonon: About Avalanchehow it's changed.
Dialogue: About Avalanche—how it's changed.

Original: Yuffie: Oh. That.
Dialogue: Oh. That.

Original: Sonon: These people are too soft. But those splinter cell guys?Theysound like the ones we should've teamed up with. Don'tcha think?
Dialogue: These people are too soft. But those splinter cell guys? They sound like the ones we should've teamed up with. Don'tcha think?

Original: Yuffie: Yeah... I guess so.
Dialogue: Yeah... I guess so.

Original: Sonon: I feel bad for complaining, considering all they've done for us.
Dialogue: I feel bad for complaining, considering all they've done for us.

Original: Yuffie: I know what you mean, though... They're all just really good people, huh.
Dialogue: I know what you mean, though... They're all just really good people, huh.

Original: Sonon: And that's the problem. Midgar doesn't need good people. Not that we care what happens to it.
Dialogue: And that's the problem. Midgar doesn't need good people. Not that we care what happens to it.

Original: Yuffie: Right...
Dialogue: Right...

Original: On-screen: Waste Disposal Plant
Dialogue: Waste Disposal Plant

Original: Sonon: Hey, Boss... Wanna try treading a little lighter this time? No point fighting if we don't have to.
Dialogue: Hey, Boss... Wanna try treading a little lighter this time? No point fighting if we don't have to.

Original: Yuffie: Yeah, yeah, I know...! Gotta be quiet... Very quiet... As quiet as a mouse...
Dialogue: Yeah, yeah, I know...! Gotta be quiet... Very quiet... As quiet as a mouse...

Original: Yuffie: Eek!
Dialogue: Eek!

Original: Yuffie: (chuckles) Uh... Good morning!
Dialogue: (chuckles) Uh... Good morning!

Original: Sonon: (sighs) Why me?
Dialogue: (sighs) Why me?

Original: Yuffie: Alright, it can't be far now. Let's get our rears in gear! Big "g", little "o", go, go, go!
Dialogue: Alright, it can't be far now. Let's get our rears in gear! Big "g", little "o", go, go, go!

Original: Yuffie: Up ahead. Building just screams "important."
Dialogue: Up ahead. Building just screams "important."

Original: Sonon: Pillar maintenance. It has to be.
Dialogue: Pillar maintenance. It has to be.

Original: Yuffie: Bleh, why'd there have to be so many guards?
Dialogue: Bleh, why'd there have to be so many guards?

Original: On-screen: Main Pillar Maintenance
Dialogue: Main Pillar Maintenance

Original: Sonon: I think you know exactly why. Gotta say, they might call this place a maintenance facility...but it looks more like an arms factory to me. Let's keep it tight, Boss. We can't afford any more mistakes. Zhijie's life depends on it.
Dialogue: I think you know exactly why. Gotta say, they might call this place a maintenance facility...but it looks more like an arms factory to me. Let's keep it tight, Boss. We can't afford any more mistakes. Zhijie's life depends on it.

Original: Yuffie: Understood.
Dialogue: Understood.

Original: Security Officer (1): Now spill it! Who gave you that information!?
Dialogue: Now spill it! Who gave you that information!?

Original: Zhijie: Oh, his name was something like...Heidegger?
Dialogue: Oh, his name was something like...Heidegger?

Original: Security Officer (2): Wrong answer!
Dialogue: Wrong answer!

Original: Security Officer (1): I'm gonna ask you again.
Dialogue: I'm gonna ask you again.

Original: Zhijie: Alright, alright, I'll tell you. It was Rufus.
Dialogue: Alright, alright, I'll tell you. It was Rufus.

Original: Security Officer (1): You don't say...
Dialogue: You don't say...

Original: Zhijie: (screams) ...Or was it Hojo? (chuckles)
Dialogue: (screams) ...Or was it Hojo? (chuckles)

Original: Yuffie: Huh. Nice goin', Zhijie.
Dialogue: Huh. Nice goin', Zhijie.

Original: Sonon: Ready to do this, Boss?
Dialogue: Ready to do this, Boss?

Original: Yuffie: Born ready!
Dialogue: Born ready!

Original: Sonon: Great. I'll draw their attention. You grab our guy.
Dialogue: Great. I'll draw their attention. You grab our guy.

Original: Yuffie: A diversion, huh? I like it. But don't forget:I'mthe leading lady.
Dialogue: A diversion, huh? I like it. But don't forget I'm the leading lady.

Original: Yuffie: Hey, you! Evildoers! Over here!
Dialogue: Hey, you! Evildoers! Over here!

Original: Security Officer (2): What the hell?
Dialogue: What the hell?

Original: Security Officer (1): Who's there!?
Dialogue: Who's there!?

Original: Yuffie: That's exactly what I was hoping you'd ask!
Dialogue: That's exactly what I was hoping you'd ask!

Original: Yuffie: And...action!
Dialogue: And...action!

Original: Yuffie: Some know me as a beguiling ninja! Others as the world's greatest materia hunter. But! Who am I truly? Well, excited onlookers, wonder no more!
Dialogue: Some know me as a beguiling ninja! Others as the world's greatest materia hunter. But! Who am I truly? Well, excited onlookers, wonder no more!

Original: Yuffie: Before you stands a rare bloom: the single white rose of Wutai...the one-and-only Yuffie! (coughs)
Dialogue: Before you stands a rare bloom the single white rose of Wutai...the one-and-only Yuffie! (coughs)

Original: Security Officer (2): Never mind, it's just some kid.
Dialogue: Never mind, it's just some kid.

Original: Security Officer (1): Right?
Dialogue: Right?

Original: Yuffie: Hey, who're you callin' a kid!? (stumbles)
Dialogue: Hey, who're you callin' a kid!? (stumbles)

Original: Yuffie: Uh...guh...uhk...
Dialogue: Uh...guh...uhk...

Original: Sonon: Award-winning performance, Boss.
Dialogue: Award-winning performance, Boss.

Original: Yuffie: (chuckles)
Dialogue: (chuckles)

Original: Security Officer (2): Who are you anyway!?
Dialogue: Who are you anyway!?

Original: Security Officer (2): Wutaians? Got eyes on hostiles. Requesting backup.
Dialogue: Wutaians? Got eyes on hostiles. Requesting backup.

Original: Yuffie: No freakin' way!
Dialogue: No freakin' way!

Original: Sonon: Centipede model, huh?
Dialogue: Centipede model, huh?

Original: Yuffie: Couldn't they have made it less gross?
Dialogue: Couldn't they have made it less gross?

Original: Yuffie: Oho... Running away, are we?
Dialogue: Oho... Running away, are we?

Original: Yuffie: Or maybe it's doing one of those..."tactical retreats"?
Dialogue: Or maybe it's doing one of those..."tactical retreats"?

Original: Sonon: Boss!
Dialogue: Boss!

Original: Yuffie: It's spitting little critters!
Dialogue: It's spitting little critters!

Original: Sonon: Drones? What does it needthemfor?
Dialogue: Drones? What does it need them for?

Original: Yuffie: They've got lasers too! And where there's lasers...
Dialogue: They've got lasers too! And where there's lasers...

Original: Sonon: There's missiles.
Dialogue: There's missiles.

Original: Yuffie: How're we supposed to dodge those things!?
Dialogue: How're we supposed to dodge those things!?

Original: Sonon: By not letting it launch 'em.
Dialogue: By not letting it launch 'em.

Original: Yuffie: So now you've come crawling down.
Dialogue: So now you've come crawling down.

Original: Sonon: This'll make thigns easier.
Dialogue: This'll make thigns easier.

Original: Sonon: Boss!
Dialogue: Boss!

Original: Yuffie: Get wrecked!
Dialogue: Get wrecked!

Original: Sonon: Wait, what?
Dialogue: Wait, what?

Original: Sonon: Looks like it wants to get serious.
Dialogue: Looks like it wants to get serious.

Original: Yuffie: Oh, we'll make it serious, alrightdead serious.
Dialogue: Oh, we'll make it serious, alright—dead serious.

Original: Yuffie: (chuckles) You see that?
Dialogue: (chuckles) You see that?

Original: Sonon: That's how ninjas do it.
Dialogue: That's how ninjas do it.

Original: Yuffie: Yep.
Dialogue: Yep.

Original: Zhijie: Nice work! You saved my ass.
Dialogue: Nice work! You saved my ass.

Original: Yuffie: (gasps) Hahaha... It was nothin'!
Dialogue: (gasps) Hahaha... It was nothin'!

Original: Zhijie: Well, it did earn ya these. Employee ID cards. They'll get you into the Shinra Building. And pretty much any floorbasement included. That's where Advanced Weaponry's got their lab set up...and where they conduct their materia research. If what you're looking for's anywhere in that place, it's gonna be there.
Dialogue: Well, it did earn ya these. Employee ID cards. They'll get you into the Shinra Building. And pretty much any floor—basement included. That's where Advanced Weaponry's got their lab set up...and where they conduct their materia research. If what you're looking for's anywhere in that place, it's gonna be there.

Original: Yuffie: Got it.
Dialogue: Got it.

Original: Zhijie: You guys should probably get movin'. Word is, Shinra's got something big lined up for us. Nothing less than the destruction of Sector 7. But, whatever it is they're planning, you're better off out of it.
Dialogue: You guys should probably get movin'. Word is, Shinra's got something big lined up for us. Nothing less than the destruction of Sector 7. But, whatever it is they're planning, you're better off out of it.

Original: Yuffie: Right.
Dialogue: Right.

Original: Zhijie: Imma go report to the others. Good luck up there. See ya soon.
Dialogue: Imma go report to the others. Good luck up there. See ya soon.

Original: Sonon: Yeah. Next time, I'm buying. I'll show you how Wutaians really party.
Dialogue: Yeah. Next time, I'm buying. I'll show you how Wutaians really party.

Original: Zhijie: Deal.
Dialogue: Deal.

Original: Yuffie: Don't forget to tell the splinter cellabout Sector 7, I mean!
Dialogue: Don't forget to tell the splinter cell—about Sector 7, I mean!

Original: Zhijie: I won't.
Dialogue: I won't.

Original: Sonon: Well, Boss, sounds like we'd better get going. Let's head up as soon as you're ready.
Dialogue: Well, Boss, sounds like we'd better get going. Let's head up as soon as you're ready.

Original: Yuffie: Ready!
Dialogue: Ready!

Original: Undercity Resident (1): To think this is where those bastards plotted their attacks. Right under our noses.
Dialogue: To think this is where those bastards plotted their attacks. Right under our noses.

Original: Undercity Resident (2): Too bad they made it out before the military could get here. Like chickens flying the coop...
Dialogue: Too bad they made it out before the military could get here. Like chickens flying the coop...

Original: Sonon: Prob'ly best if we don't stick around. Let's catch the train.
Dialogue: Prob'ly best if we don't stick around. Let's catch the train.

Original: Yuffie: 'Kay.
Dialogue: Kay.

Original: Security Officer: Stay back. That's close enough.
Dialogue: Stay back. That's close enough.

Original: Sonon: Boss. I don't think we'll be back here anytime soon, so make sure you're ready for anything, okay?
Dialogue: Boss. I don't think we'll be back here anytime soon, so make sure you're ready for anything, okay?

Original: On-screen: Ready for anything?
Dialogue: Ready for anything?

Original: Yuffie: I think we're good here. Let's roll.
Dialogue: I think we're good here. Let's roll.

Original: Yuffie: What's with all these people?
Dialogue: What's with all these people?

Original: Train Attendant: Due to the recent incident at Mako Reactor 5, only a limited number of trains are currently in service. Please note that the Sector 5 Undercity Station is closed until further notice. Thank you.
Dialogue: Due to the recent incident at Mako Reactor 5, only a limited number of trains are currently in service. Please note that the Sector 5 Undercity Station is closed until further notice. Thank you.

Original: Nayo: Shh!
Dialogue: Shh!

Original: Polk: Splinter cell's done its best to make things hard for ya. Miss this train and there's no telling when the next'll be.
Dialogue: Splinter cell's done its best to make things hard for ya. Miss this train and there's no telling when the next'll be.

Original: Billy Bob: Looks like it's now or never, guys.
Dialogue: Looks like it's now or never, guys.

Original: Nayo: Sorry we couldn't give you a proper send-off. Just know that we're rooting for you, okay?
Dialogue: Sorry we couldn't give you a proper send-off. Just know that we're rooting for you, okay?

Original: Yuffie: All aboard!
Dialogue: All aboard!

Original: Yuffie: Oh boy...
Dialogue: Oh boy...

Original: Sonon: Gonna be sick?
Dialogue: Gonna be sick?

Original: Yuffie: (gulps) I'll be fine...as long as I'm standing up...
Dialogue: (gulps) I'll be fine...as long as I'm standing up...

Original: Yuffie: Don't laugh.
Dialogue: Don't laugh.

Original: Sonon: Melphie always got motion sick. Chocobos, boats... Sure trains would've done it too.
Dialogue: Melphie always got motion sick. Chocobos, boats... Sure trains would've done it too.

Original: Yuffie: Who's Melphie?
Dialogue: Who's Melphie?

Original: Sonon: My sister.
Dialogue: My sister.

Original: Yuffie: Huh...
Dialogue: Huh...

Original: Sonon: She trained under your father at the same time as me. And she had such promise...
Dialogue: She trained under your father at the same time as me. And she had such promise...

Original: Yuffie: "Had"?
Dialogue: "Had"?

Original: Sonon: The war was ending... But a Shinra mech went haywire near a crowd, and...she had to do something.
Dialogue: The war was ending... But a Shinra mech went haywire near a crowd, and...she had to do something.

Original: Sonon: They deserve what's comin' to 'em.
Dialogue: They deserve what's comin' to 'em.

Original: Yuffie: Yeah... They do. But I'mnotyour sister.
Dialogue: Yeah... They do. But I'm not your sister.

Original: President Shinra: Are we on schedule?
Dialogue: Are we on schedule?

Original: Heidegger: (laughs) The Turks are on top of it. Yes, there will be no delays.
Dialogue: (laughs) The Turks are on top of it. Yes, there will be no delays.

Original: Reeve: Please, Mr. President! I am asking you to reconsiderno, begging. The Sector 7 undercity is home to more than 50,000
Dialogue: Please, Mr. President! I am asking you to reconsider—no, begging. The Sector 7 undercity is home to more than 50,000—

Original: President Shinra: (groans) Director Tuesti.
Dialogue: (groans) Director Tuesti.

Original: Reeve: At least let us issue a warning, sir.
Dialogue: At least let us issue a warning, sir.

Original: Heidegger: The stench of the director's cowardice fills the room yet again.
Dialogue: The stench of the director's cowardice fills the room yet again.

Original: President Shinra: Reeve. Progress requires sacrifice. Learn to live with it.
Dialogue: Reeve. Progress requires sacrifice. Learn to live with it.

Original: On-screen: Shinra Building - Entrance
Dialogue: Shinra Building - Entrance

Original: Sonon: Whoa, look at all these people...
Dialogue: Whoa, look at all these people...

Original: Yuffie: Enough to make you sick. Let's get this over with.
Dialogue: Enough to make you sick. Let's get this over with.

Original: Newspaper Reporter: Excuse me! I have some questions! You work for Shinra, isn't that right? Then would you care to on rumors that Sector 7 will be the terrorists' next target? They're going to hit the reactor, aren't they?
Dialogue: Excuse me! I have some questions! You work for Shinra, isn't that right? Then would you care to on rumors that Sector 7 will be the terrorists' next target? They're going to hit the reactor, aren't they?

Original: Security Officer: You! Stop right there!
Dialogue: You! Stop right there!

Original: Sonon: Elevators're right there. Let's catch one.
Dialogue: Elevators're right there. Let's catch one.

Original: Yuffie: You're up, High-D!
Dialogue: You're up, High-D!

Original: Yuffie: C'mon, c'mon, c'mon!
Dialogue: C'mon, c'mon, c'mon!

Original: Security Officer: Hold the door.
Dialogue: Hold the door.

Original: Security Officer: What floor?
Dialogue: What floor?

Original: Sonon: The basement. Advanced Weaponry.
Dialogue: The basement. Advanced Weaponry.

Original: Elevator: Going down. Doors closing.
Dialogue: Going down. Doors closing.

Original: Scarlet: Perfect. Just perfect. Hm?
Dialogue: Perfect. Just perfect. Hm?

Original: Scarlet: (chuckles) But oh, how the mighty are fallenWutai...colluding with Avalanche and resorting to terrorism? Hm. I always thought the Wutaians an honorable people. They used to be, certainly... But now? Now they're nothing but blood-sucking flies, buzzing around Shinra's face.
Dialogue: (chuckles) But oh, how the mighty are fallen—Wutai...colluding with Avalanche and resorting to terrorism? Hm. I always thought the Wutaians an honorable people. They used to be, certainly... But now? Now they're nothing but blood-sucking flies, buzzing around Shinra's face.

Original: Scarlet: Would you not agree? In light of recent events, I mean.
Dialogue: Would you not agree? In light of recent events, I mean.

Original: Yuffie: I would. A hundred percent! (chuckles)
Dialogue: I would. A hundred percent! (chuckles)

Original: Scarlet: What a lovely smile.
Dialogue: What a lovely smile.

Original: Yuffie: Open up!
Dialogue: Open up!

Original: Scarlet: I think not. Foreign visitors should take the scenic route. ...And savor the opportunity to meet our latest autonomous weapons. (laughs)
Dialogue: I think not. Foreign visitors should take the scenic route. ...And savor the opportunity to meet our latest autonomous weapons. (laughs)

Original: Sonon: Dammit! I'll never get a better chance. That was Scarlet, director of Advanced Weaponry. It was one ofhermachines that killed Melphie!
Dialogue: Dammit! I'll never get a better chance. That was Scarlet, director of Advanced Weaponry. It was one of her machines that killed Melphie!

Original: Yuffie: Calm down, Sonon. Calm down. Remember: we're here for a reason.
Dialogue: Calm down, Sonon. Calm down. Remember we're here for a reason.

Original: Sonon: Right, Boss... I'm sorry.
Dialogue: Right, Boss... I'm sorry.

Original: Yuffie: Don't be. I was ready to strangle her myself. And that's before she sent us off in the wrong direction...
Dialogue: Don't be. I was ready to strangle her myself. And that's before she sent us off in the wrong direction...

Original: Sonon: Wheredidshe send us?
Dialogue: Where did she send us?

Original: Yuffie: Only one way to find out. Don't worry, we'll get to Materia Research eventually. Just a little longer, my precious...
Dialogue: Only one way to find out. Don't worry, we'll get to Materia Research eventually. Just a little longer, my precious...

Original: On-screen: B16 - Advanced Weaponry: Inspection
Dialogue: B16 - Advanced Weaponry Inspection

Original: Yuffie: Just look at this place. Weapons here, weapons there, weapons everywhere! They're ready for some serious action.
Dialogue: Just look at this place. Weapons here, weapons there, weapons everywhere! They're ready for some serious action.

Original: Sonon: It sounds like you are, too.
Dialogue: It sounds like you are, too.

Original: Yuffie: Duh. Unlike my old man, I'm not some lazy drunk. I fight for what I believe in, somethinghe'dnever understand.
Dialogue: Duh. Unlike my old man, I'm not some lazy drunk. I fight for what I believe in, something he'd never understand.

Original: Sonon: Wonder how he's holding up...
Dialogue: Wonder how he's holding up...

Original: Yuffie: Behind bars, you mean? Not well, if the government's got anything to say about it. Good on 'em. Jail's where he belongs.
Dialogue: Behind bars, you mean? Not well, if the government's got anything to say about it. Good on 'em. Jail's where he belongs.

Original: Sonon: That's my master you're talking about. Mind laying off him a little?
Dialogue: That's my master you're talking about. Mind laying off him a little?

Original: Yuffie: You know what? Let's drop it. Not exactly my favorite topic. It's only gonna make me mad. More importantly...
Dialogue: You know what? Let's drop it. Not exactly my favorite topic. It's only gonna make me mad. More importantly...

Original: Scarlet: My god, you people are deadly boring. Luckily, I know exactly how to liven things up...with a little experiment. Just don't go dying on methat wouldn't yield very interesting results, now would it?
Dialogue: My god, you people are deadly boring. Luckily, I know exactly how to liven things up...with a little experiment. Just don't go dying on me—that wouldn't yield very interesting results, now would it?

Original: Announcement: Unit calibration complete. Initiating combat data-collection sequence.
Dialogue: Unit calibration complete. Initiating combat data-collection sequence.

Original: Announcement: Data collection complete. Re-calibrating for next test.
Dialogue: Data collection complete. Re-calibrating for next test.

Original: Announcement: Unit calibration complete. Initiating combat data-collection sequence.
Dialogue: Unit calibration complete. Initiating combat data-collection sequence.

Original: Announcement: Data collection complete. Re-calibrating for next test.
Dialogue: Data collection complete. Re-calibrating for next test.

Original: Yuffie: What? There's more?
Dialogue: What? There's more?

Original: Announcement: Unit calibration complete. Initiating combat data-collection sequence.
Dialogue: Unit calibration complete. Initiating combat data-collection sequence.

Original: Announcement: Data collection complete.
Dialogue: Data collection complete.

Original: Scarlet: Credit where credit is due. You exceeded my every expectation. And for being such good sports...you may now leave.
Dialogue: Credit where credit is due. You exceeded my every expectation. And for being such good sports...you may now leave.

Original: Yuffie: Why did I ever think for a second she'd be nice to us!? She knows damn well it's gonna be a pain in the ass gettin' up there.
Dialogue: Why did I ever think for a second she'd be nice to us!? She knows damn well it's gonna be a pain in the ass gettin' up there.

Original: Yuffie: There we go. Honestly, howdoI do it? Now then, Sonon, how ya feel about givin' me a boost?
Dialogue: There we go. Honestly, how do I do it? Now then, Sonon, how ya feel about givin' me a boost?

Original: Sonon: Ecstatic.
Dialogue: Ecstatic.

Original: Sonon: And...go!
Dialogue: And...go!

Original: Yuffie: Okay, get to climbin'!
Dialogue: Okay, get to climbin'!

Original: Subordinate: Madam Director. The intruders are about to reach the research facility.
Dialogue: Madam Director. The intruders are about to reach the research facility.

Original: Scarlet: And we'll let them. Meanwhile, find out what it is they want.
Dialogue: And we'll let them. Meanwhile, find out what it is they want.

Original: Subordinate: Uh...?

Scarlet: You do have eyes, don't you? Then you can see that, while they are simpletons, they've made it further than any normal Wutaian ever could. Clearly, they are ninjas.Teenageninjas. And they've come such a long way. We simply must roll out the red carpet. My trusty steed should provide a fitting welcome, I think. Keep me apprised, would you?
Dialogue: You do have eyes, don't you? Then you can see that, while they are simpletons, they've made it further than any normal Wutaian ever could. Clearly, they are ninjas. Teenage ninjas. And they've come such a long way. We simply must roll out the red carpet. My trusty steed should provide a fitting welcome, I think. Keep me apprised, would you?

Original: Subordinate: Ma'am. Cut system power to the research facility. Bar access to confidential data, then retrace their steps. Find out why they're here. Above all, donotlet them out of your sight.
Dialogue: Ma'am. Cut system power to the research facility. Bar access to confidential data, then retrace their steps. Find out why they're here. Above all, do not let them out of your sight.

Original: Subordinates: Sir!
Dialogue: Sir!

Original: Yuffie: Oh, materia, where are you?
Dialogue: Oh, materia, where are you?

Original: On-screen: B15 - Advanced Weaponry: Production
Dialogue: B15 - Advanced Weaponry Production

Original: Yuffie: Hm? Is that materia I smell?
Dialogue: Hm? Is that materia I smell?

Original: Shock Trooper: End of the line, Wutai scum!
Dialogue: End of the line, Wutai scum!

Original: Yuffie: This their idea of mood lighting? 'Cause it's bad.
Dialogue: This their idea of mood lighting? 'Cause it's bad.

Original: Sonon: Might be the power. That thing's off too.
Dialogue: Might be the power. That thing's off too.

Original: Yuffie: Talk about hitting the jackpot! This must be where they make their materia!
Dialogue: Talk about hitting the jackpot! This must be where they make their materia!

Original: Sonon: Maybebut they're not what we came for. Let's keep movin', Boss.
Dialogue: Maybe—but they're not what we came for. Let's keep movin', Boss.

Original: Yuffie: Totally. After I grab a few souvenirs.
Dialogue: Totally. After I grab a few souvenirs.

Original: Announcement: Level one power grid: online. Initiating mako energy saturation. Deploying security grate.
Dialogue: Level one power grid online. Initiating mako energy saturation. Deploying security grate.

Original: Yuffie: Wait, is that a security grate or aladder? Thanks, Shinra!
Dialogue: Wait, is that a security grate or a ladder? Thanks, Shinra!

Original: On-screen: B14 - Advanced Weaponry: Maintenance
Dialogue: B14 - Advanced Weaponry Maintenance

Original: Yuffie: Huh, that's weird... Not even a whiff of materia up here... But then there's nowhere else to go.
Dialogue: Huh, that's weird... Not even a whiff of materia up here... But then there's nowhere else to go.

Original: Announcement: Level two power grid: online. Initiating mako energy saturation. Deploying security grate.
Dialogue: Level two power grid online. Initiating mako energy saturation. Deploying security grate.

Original: Yuffie: Not long now, my precious. You'll be safe in my arms soon!
Dialogue: Not long now, my precious. You'll be safe in my arms soon!

Original: Announcement: Entry lock released.
Dialogue: Entry lock released.

Original: Yuffie: And what do we have here? A secret materia vault perhaps?
Dialogue: And what do we have here? A secret materia vault perhaps?

Original: On-screen: Go to which floor? Currently on B14 (Maintenance)
Dialogue: Go to which floor? Currently on B14 (Maintenance)

Original: On-screen: Go to which floor? Currently on B15 (Production)
Dialogue: Go to which floor? Currently on B15 (Production)

Original: On-screen: B13 - Advanced Weaponry: Development
Dialogue: B13 - Advanced Weaponry Development

Original: Yuffie: Uh...uh-oh.
Dialogue: Uh...uh-oh.

Original: Yuffie: (groans) Aw, c'mon! How could we have gotten so lost!?
Dialogue: (groans) Aw, c'mon! How could we have gotten so lost!?

Original: Sonon: Easy now. Focus. Ah, I know. Spare a Da-chao bean?
Dialogue: Easy now. Focus. Ah, I know. Spare a Da-chao bean?

Original: Yuffie: Sure...
Dialogue: Sure...

Original: Yuffie: You ate it!
Dialogue: You ate it!

Original: Sonon: You sound surprised.
Dialogue: You sound surprised.

Original: Yuffie: Man, I'm glad you're here!
Dialogue: Man, I'm glad you're here!

Original: Sonon: Likewise.
Dialogue: Likewise.

Original: Yuffie: It really helpsknowing I'm not alone in all this.
Dialogue: It really helps—knowing I'm not alone in all this.

Original: Sonon: Yeah, same here.
Dialogue: Yeah, same here.

Original: Yuffie: Aha! Think I found our way across!
Dialogue: Aha! Think I found our way across!

Original: Sonon: Right. Shall we?
Dialogue: Right. Shall we?

Original: Announcement: Employee identity confirmed. Access granted. Occupancy limited to one subject. Proceed to gate to begin training exercise.
Dialogue: Employee identity confirmed. Access granted. Occupancy limited to one subject. Proceed to gate to begin training exercise.

Original: Yuffie: Training? Really? Just give us what we came for already!
Dialogue: Training? Really? Just give us what we came for already!

Original: Sonon: Might still be worth a shot. Could be something in it for us. Just...be careful, 'kay?
Dialogue: Might still be worth a shot. Could be something in it for us. Just...be careful, 'kay?

Original: On-screen: Run the basic training program?
Dialogue: Run the basic training program?

Original: Announcement: Access granted. Occupancy limited to one subject. Proceed to gate to begin training exercise.
Dialogue: Access granted. Occupancy limited to one subject. Proceed to gate to begin training exercise.

Original: On-screen: Select a training program to run.
Dialogue: Select a training program to run.

Original: On-screen: Run the SOLDIER training program?
Dialogue: Run the SOLDIER training program?

Original: Yuffie: Sonon! Checkthatout!
Dialogue: Sonon! Check that out!

Original: Sonon: It does look more important than the others...
Dialogue: It does look more important than the others...

Original: Yuffie: This has to be it! Oh, sweet baby, come to mama!
Dialogue: This has to be it! Oh, sweet baby, come to mama!

Original: Yuffie: Can't see squat. Light. Light! I need more light!
Dialogue: Can't see squat. Light. Light! I need more light!

Original: Announcement: Level three power grid: online. Initiating mako energy saturation. Deploying security grate.
Dialogue: Level three power grid online. Initiating mako energy saturation. Deploying security grate.

Original: Yuffie: Now we're cookin'! I'm comin', materia, ready or not!
Dialogue: Now we're cookin'! I'm comin', materia, ready or not!

Original: On-screen: Go to which floor? Currently on B13 (Development)
Dialogue: Go to which floor? Currently on B13 (Development)

Original: Yuffie: Man... Another stupid dud!
Dialogue: Man... Another stupid dud!

Original: Yuffie: Wha? Uh-oh...
Dialogue: Wha—? Uh-oh...

Original: Yuffie: Quit holdin' out on us, Shinra! We're here for materia, not these dorks!
Dialogue: Quit holdin' out on us, Shinra! We're here for materia, not these dorks!

Original: Scarlet: Sohave you found out what they want yet?
Dialogue: So—have you found out what they want yet?

Original: Subordinate: We think so. We can't say for certain, as their behavior is...erratic. But they appear to be searching for materia.
Dialogue: We think so. We can't say for certain, as their behavior is...erratic. But they appear to be searching for materia.

Original: Scarlet: Excuse me? You mean to say that these savages have gone to all this trouble formateria?
Dialogue: Excuse me? You mean to say that these savages have gone to all this trouble for materia?

Original: Subordinate: So far as we can tell, yes.
Dialogue: So far as we can tell, yes.

Original: Scarlet: How very dull. Be that as it may, I suppose I should talk to them.
Dialogue: How very dull. Be that as it may, I suppose I should talk to them.

Original: Subordinate: Ma'am!
Dialogue: Ma'am!

Original: Scarlet: Enjoying yourselves, I trust?
Dialogue: Enjoying yourselves, I trust?

Original: Yuffie: (screams)
Dialogue: (screams)

Original: Scarlet: Awed by a simple hologram? How precious. But I know just what you needto loosen up a little. After such a long journey...you must be so tense!
Dialogue: Awed by a simple hologram? How precious. But I know just what you need—to loosen up a little. After such a long journey...you must be so tense!

Original: Yuffie: (screams)
Dialogue: (screams)

Original: Scarlet: Luckily, I have toys for thatall far more entertaining than this.
Dialogue: Luckily, I have toys for that—all far more entertaining than this.

Original: Sonon: What do you want!?
Dialogue: What do you want!?

Original: Scarlet: Oh dear. Is that any way to talk to your host? Really though, as guests, it's more about what you want. And I think you'll find it just up ahead. Hurry now. Don't keep me waiting.
Dialogue: Oh dear. Is that any way to talk to your host? Really though, as guests, it's more about what you want. And I think you'll find it just up ahead. Hurry now. Don't keep me waiting.

Original: Sonon: So, Boss. What're you thinking?
Dialogue: So, Boss. What're you thinking?

Original: Yuffie: That we're walking into a trap, I guess. But it's nothing we can't handle, right?
Dialogue: That we're walking into a trap, I guess. But it's nothing we can't handle, right?

Original: Sonon: Couldna said it better myself.
Dialogue: Couldna said it better myself.

Original: Scarlet: Welcome to our state-of-the-art weapons testing facility. This is where we push every piece of ordnance to its limits...and beyond. Such tests are an invaluable part of the development process. Go on, see where the magic happens.
Dialogue: Welcome to our state-of-the-art weapons testing facility. This is where we push every piece of ordnance to its limits...and beyond. Such tests are an invaluable part of the development process. Go on, see where the magic happens.

Original: On-screen: Testing Grounds
Dialogue: Testing Grounds

Original: Research Program: Commencing ordnance testing.
Dialogue: Commencing ordnance testing.

Original: Research Program: Select ordnance type to deploy for this trial.
Dialogue: Select ordnance type to deploy for this trial.

Original: Research Program: Selection confirmed. Initiating ordnance deployment procedure.
Dialogue: Selection confirmed. Initiating ordnance deployment procedure.

Original: Research Program: Subjects approaching test site. Test will begin momentarily.
Dialogue: Subjects approaching test site. Test will begin momentarily.

Original: Research Program: Beginning analysis.
Dialogue: Beginning analysis.

Original: Research Program: Analysis concluded. Continuing trial.
Dialogue: Analysis concluded. Continuing trial.

Original: Scarlet: My, my, how impressive! Seems I may have underestimated how resilient you ninjas can be.
Dialogue: My, my, how impressive! Seems I may have underestimated how resilient you ninjas can be.

Original: Yuffie: "May have"!? How 'bout "did", you old hag!?
Dialogue: "May have"!? How 'bout "did", you old hag!?

Original: Scarlet: (chuckles) You Wutaians, so fesity. But let's see how you fare against what I have in store for you next. It's quite the treat, I assure you. Only the best for our honored guests, after all. Whenever you're ready.
Dialogue: (chuckles) You Wutaians, so fesity. But let's see how you fare against what I have in store for you next. It's quite the treat, I assure you. Only the best for our honored guests, after all. Whenever you're ready.

Original: On-screen: Heavy Weapons Platform Testing
Dialogue: Heavy Weapons Platform Testing

Original: Yuffie: Where are we?
Dialogue: Where are we?

Original: Yuffie: That thing...can't be operational, can it?
Dialogue: That thing...can't be operational, can it?

Original: Sonon: We better hope not, boss.
Dialogue: We better hope not, boss.

Original: Scarlet: At long last, Wutai's finest deign to join us. You've performed admirably.
Dialogue: At long last, Wutai's finest deign to join us. You've performed admirably.

Original: Yuffie: Quit acting all superior. We both know you're afraid of us!
Dialogue: Quit acting all superior. We both know you're afraid of us!

Original: Scarlet: (chuckles) Is that so? Well, maybe I am!
Dialogue: (chuckles) Is that so? Well, maybe I am!

Original: Yuffie: You should know there's more where we came fromlots more! And you'll never see 'em comin'! Just imagine a whole clan of ninjas landing on your doorstep!
Dialogue: You should know there's more where we came from—lots more! And you'll never see 'em comin'! Just imagine a whole clan of ninjas landing on your doorstep!

Original: Scarlet: Oh my! We must do something right away!
Dialogue: Oh my! We must do something right away!

Original: Yuffie: Well, you can't!
Dialogue: Well, you can't!

Original: Scarlet: Don't say that. Won't you at least give us a chance?
Dialogue: Don't say that. Won't you at least give us a chance?

Original: Yuffie: What the
Dialogue: What the—

Original: Scarlet: Allow me to present...the latest innovation in Shinra battle armor... Designed by yours truly. This'll be a memory to cherish for the rest of your lives. All thirty seconds of them.
Dialogue: Allow me to present...the latest innovation in Shinra battle armor... Designed by yours truly. This'll be a memory to cherish for the rest of your lives. All thirty seconds of them.

Original: Yuffie: Oh look, we're surrounded!
Dialogue: Oh look, we're surrounded!

Original: Sonon: But not for much longer, eh, Boss?
Dialogue: But not for much longer, eh, Boss?

Original: Yuffie: Right on! They're as good as scrap!
Dialogue: Right on! They're as good as scrap!

Original: Scarlet: Rather rude to ignore your playmates, is it not?
Dialogue: Rather rude to ignore your playmates, is it not?

Original: Yuffie: Hey, no fair!
Dialogue: Hey, no fair!

Original: Yuffie: WhaCome back!
Dialogue: Wha—Come back!

Original: Scarlet: Oh, I will, my dear. But I rather suspect you'll wish that I hadn't.
Dialogue: Oh, I will, my dear. But I rather suspect you'll wish that I hadn't.

Original: Yuffie: So what! Just smash it up!
Dialogue: So what! Just smash it up!

Original: Scarlet: A moment, if you please.
Dialogue: A moment, if you please.

Original: Yuffie: Hey! Don't you know that's cheating!?
Dialogue: Hey! Don't you know that's cheating!?

Original: Scarlet: (chuckles) Pardon the wait.
Dialogue: (chuckles) Pardon the wait.

Original: Yuffie: More? How many of those things you got?
Dialogue: More? How many of those things you got?

Original: Scarlet: Useless!
Dialogue: Useless!

Original: Scarlet: Not nearly mobile enough. Should've known those actuators weren't up to the task. Time for an overhaul.
Dialogue: Not nearly mobile enough. Should've known those actuators weren't up to the task. Time for an overhaul.

Original: Yuffie: Hellooo!
Dialogue: Hellooo!

Original: Scarlet: Hm?
Dialogue: Hm?

Original: Yuffie: My, my, my, how the tables have turned...
Dialogue: My, my, my, how the tables have turned...

Original: Scarlet: (laughs) Proud of yourself, little savage?
Dialogue: (laughs) Proud of yourself, little savage?

Original: Sonon: What're you doing!?
Dialogue: What're you doing!?

Original: On-screen: Deepground
Dialogue: Deepground

Original: Weiss: Sleep well?
Dialogue: Sleep well?

Original: Nero: Weiss? This is a surprise. To what do I owe the pleasure?
Dialogue: Weiss? This is a surprise. To what do I owe the pleasure?

Original: Weiss: These idiots want to "digitally replicate" me, so I'm indulging them.
Dialogue: These idiots want to "digitally replicate" me, so I'm indulging them.

Original: Researcher (1): All set.
Dialogue: All set.

Original: Researcher (2): Transporting...
Dialogue: Transporting...

Original: Nero: (laughs) When will Shinra learn? There is no replicatingyou. They ought to know better.
Dialogue: (laughs) When will Shinra learn? There is no replicating you. They ought to know better.

Original: Weiss: (chuckles) Looking forward to this?
Dialogue: (chuckles) Looking forward to this?

Original: Nero: I am. It has been too long since my last hunt.
Dialogue: I am. It has been too long since my last hunt.

Original: Sonon: What'd you do? Tell us!
Dialogue: What'd you do? Tell us!

Original: Scarlet: (sighs) Is this how it's done in Wutai? You just howl until you get what you want?
Dialogue: (sighs) Is this how it's done in Wutai? You just howl until you get what you want?

Original: Yuffie: That's enough, Sonon. I got this. Alright, lady, out with it. Tell us where you're hiding the new materia. Don't play dumb now. We know you've been cooking up something super-powerful.
Dialogue: That's enough, Sonon. I got this. Alright, lady, out with it. Tell us where you're hiding the new materia. Don't play dumb now. We know you've been cooking up something super-powerful.

Original: Scarlet: Well, well... Wutai must have some highly skilled intelligence operatives. That...or we have a mole in our midst.
Dialogue: Well, well... Wutai must have some highly skilled intelligence operatives. That...or we have a mole in our midst.

Original: Yuffie: What was...?
Dialogue: What was...?

Original: Sonon: I'll check on it.
Dialogue: I'll check on it.

Original: Yuffie: Alright, but make it quick.
Dialogue: Alright, but make it quick.

Original: Scarlet: Youarecorrect that we're in the process of creating an exquisite new materia. However, it is far from complete.
Dialogue: You are correct that we're in the process of creating an exquisite new materia. However, it is far from complete.

Original: Yuffie: Yeah, right. You must think I'm stupid.
Dialogue: Yeah, right. You must think I'm stupid.

Original: Scarlet: Would I lie to you? Regrettable though it is, other plans have been deemed a higher priority.
Dialogue: Would I lie to you? Regrettable though it is, other plans have been deemed a higher priority.

Original: Yuffie: What other plans?
Dialogue: What other plans?

Original: Scarlet: (chuckles) Well...just between you and me... My colleagues and I...are going to drop Plate Number 7 on the slums. And then we're going to blame it on Avalanche and Wutai.
Dialogue: (chuckles) Well...just between you and me... My colleagues and I...are going to drop Plate Number 7 on the slums. And then we're going to blame it on Avalanche and Wutai.

Original: Yuffie: I don't get it. You're gonna drop a plate? And?
Dialogue: I don't get it. You're gonna drop a plate? And?

Original: Yuffie: What the!?
Dialogue: What the—!?

Original: Scarlet: Oh dear. I think your friend might've run into trouble. Aren't you going to save him?
Dialogue: Oh dear. I think your friend might've run into trouble. Aren't you going to save him?

Original: Scarlet: Quickly now! (laughs)
Dialogue: Quickly now! (laughs)

Original: Sonon: There you are!
Dialogue: There you are!

Original: Yuffie: Who're these assholes!?
Dialogue: Who're these assholes!?

Original: Sonon: No clue. They just appeared!
Dialogue: No clue. They just appeared!

Original: Yuffie: I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but...
Dialogue: I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but...

Original: Sonon: Just hit me with it.
Dialogue: Just hit me with it.

Original: Yuffie: There is no ultimate materianot yet. She said it's still in the works. And she mentioned somethin' else. They're gonna drop Plate Number 7.
Dialogue: There is no ultimate materia—not yet. She said it's still in the works. And she mentioned somethin' else. They're gonna drop Plate Number 7.

Original: Sonon: They're gonna dowhat?
Dialogue: They're gonna do what?

Original: Yuffie: They're gonna drop Plate Number 7 on the slums...apparently.
Dialogue: They're gonna drop Plate Number 7 on the slums...apparently.

Original: Sonon: But that's the whole upper part of the sector!
Dialogue: But that's the whole upper part of the sector!

Original: Yuffie: Wait! So Zhijie was being serious!?
Dialogue: Wait! So Zhijie was being serious!?

Original: Sonon: This is bad.
Dialogue: This is bad.

Original: Yuffie: Let's go!
Dialogue: Let's go!

Original: Sonon: Right behind ya! We may not have that materia, but we do have good intel.
Dialogue: Right behind ya! We may not have that materia, but we do have good intel.

Original: Deepground SOLDIER: They're cornered. Box 'em in!
Dialogue: They're cornered. Box 'em in!

Original: Yuffie: No way I'm givin' up!
Dialogue: No way I'm givin' up!

Original: Sonon: That's the spirit. Let 'em have it!
Dialogue: That's the spirit. Let 'em have it!

Original: Yuffie: I'm not goin' down till I've been to the Happy Turtle!
Dialogue: I'm not goin' down till I've been to the Happy Turtle!

Original: Sonon: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Deepground SOLDIER: Opening doors. Set it up!
Dialogue: Opening doors. Set it up!

Original: Deepground SOLDIER: Grenade out!
Dialogue: Grenade out!

Original: Sonon: Yuffie!
Dialogue: Yuffie!

Original: Yuffie: (screams)
Dialogue: (screams)

Original: On-screen: Combat Simulator Prototype
Dialogue: Combat Simulator Prototype

Original: Yuffie: Is it over?
Dialogue: Is it over?

Original: Sonon: Somehow, I seriously doubt it...
Dialogue: Somehow, I seriously doubt it...

Original: Yuffie: Ow... Man, I so don't wanna go back out there...but I don't think we've got a choice.
Dialogue: Ow... Man, I so don't wanna go back out there...but I don't think we've got a choice.

Original: Yuffie: Work, you stupid...
Dialogue: Work, you stupid...

Original: Yuffie: No good. Door won't budge.
Dialogue: No good. Door won't budge.

Original: Sonon: Meaning we're trapped.
Dialogue: Meaning we're trapped.

Original: Scarlet: I want them...to suffer.
Dialogue: I want them...to suffer.

Original: Scarlet: The rest, I leave to you.
Dialogue: The rest, I leave to you.

Original: Combat Simulator: Pain Sensation Level set to: maximum.
Dialogue: Pain Sensation Level set to maximum.

Original: Yuffie: What was that?
Dialogue: What was that?

Original: Sonon: They figure we need a challenge. Meaning we're in for a world of hurt.
Dialogue: They figure we need a challenge. Meaning we're in for a world of hurt.

Original: Yuffie: No fair!
Dialogue: No fair!

Original: Combat Simulator: Pain Sensation: Max. Deploying additional combatants.
Dialogue: Pain Sensation Max. Deploying additional combatants.

Original: Yuffie: Where are these freaks even coming from!? 'Cause I'd really like 'em to stop!
Dialogue: Where are these freaks even coming from!? 'Cause I'd really like 'em to stop!

Original: Combat Simulator: Pain Sensation: Max. Deploying additional combatants.
Dialogue: Pain Sensation Max. Deploying additional combatants.

Original: Yuffie: Joke's on you, Shinra, if you think we're dying in this ugly box!
Dialogue: Joke's on you, Shinra, if you think we're dying in this ugly box!

Original: Combat Simulator: Pain Sensation: Max. Deploying additional combatants.
Dialogue: Pain Sensation Max. Deploying additional combatants.

Original: Yuffie: Okay, this is gettin' old!
Dialogue: Okay, this is gettin' old!

Original: Sonon: There's gotta be a projection mechanism around here somewhere. If we can just find it...
Dialogue: There's gotta be a projection mechanism around here somewhere. If we can just find it...

Original: Sonon: Boss!
Dialogue: Boss!

Original: Yuffie: What the!? Why can't I hit it!?
Dialogue: What the—!? Why can't I hit it!?

Original: Sonon: Cause that tentacled freak won't let you. We're gonna have to tough this one out.
Dialogue: Cause that tentacled freak won't let you. We're gonna have to tough this one out.

Original: Sonon: Boss, the projector! While it's down!
Dialogue: Boss, the projector! While it's down!

Original: Yuffie: Leave it to me!
Dialogue: Leave it to me!

Original: Yuffie: Now can wepleaseget outta here already?
Dialogue: Now can we please get outta here already?

Original: Sonon: Who could've done this?
Dialogue: Who could've done this?

Original: Researcher (1): Subjects on site. It's time. Initiate the Tsviet field test.
Dialogue: Subjects on site. It's time. Initiate the Tsviet field test.

Original: Researcher (2): Sir.
Dialogue: Sir.

Original: Yuffie: What are you doing? Aren't you all on the same team?
Dialogue: What are you doing? Aren't you all on the same team?

Original: Nero: "Team"? Fool. There are no "teams" in Deepground.
Dialogue: "Team"? Fool. There are no "teams" in Deepground.

Original: Yuffie: Deep...ground?
Dialogue: Deep...ground?

Original: Nero: The place where my brother and I like to play.
Dialogue: The place where my brother and I like to play.

Original: Yuffie: Cool. Now, mind moving aside?
Dialogue: Cool. Now, mind moving aside?

Original: Sonon: Let's take a different tack.
Dialogue: Let's take a different tack.

Original: Yuffie: Well, can't blame a girl for trying.
Dialogue: Well, can't blame a girl for trying.

Original: Nero: Now...let the games begin.
Dialogue: Now...let the games begin.

Original: Yuffie: What's with this company? They have a "freaks only" policy?
Dialogue: What's with this company? They have a "freaks only" policy?

Original: Sonon: Careful. This "freak's" no pushover.
Dialogue: Careful. This "freak's" no pushover.

Original: Nero: Do I frighten you?
Dialogue: Do I frighten you?

Original: Nero: You cannot run from me.
Dialogue: You cannot run from me.

Original: Sonon: Now, Boss. While he's distracted!
Dialogue: Now, Boss. While he's distracted!

Original: Nero: I have you now.
Dialogue: I have you now.

Original: Sonon: Sonon, help! Get this creep off'a me!
Dialogue: Sonon, help! Get this creep off'a me!

Original: Researcher (1): Abnormal readings detected. The control program's been compromised!
Dialogue: Abnormal readings detected. The control program's been compromised!

Original: Researcher (2): Containment protocol!
Dialogue: Containment protocol!

Original: Yuffie: You're dead!
Dialogue: You're dead!

Original: Sonon: Boss!
